hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Manny the Man
text: The London House Cupola is breathtaking and the perfect private place for a romantic proposal. We were blown away by Manny's ability to pull a proposal off...down to every single detail. Kind, discreet and lots of fun! We could not have enjoyed our day more! Thanks to Manny, Lindsay and Sid as well as the beautiful music!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Views and Location
text: We stayed here for a family vacation to go to a baseball game and do touristy things. We stayed in a room with a river view and it was absolutely amazing. We went up to the rooftop bar and the view from our room was actually better. We found the rooftop to be overpriced and felt very touristy as opposed to people staying in the hotel. The room itself was spacious and clean, loved the robes. Unfortunately it had a door to adjoin the room next door and the couple next door had a late night argument that sounded like it was in our room. However, the location of the hotel is perfect for River Walk activities as well as walking up Michigan Ave for shopping. We ate in two of the restaurants in the hotel and were happy with them. There is no business center and I sat in the lobby in the early morning to do some work and it was a bit noisy and crowded. Overall, highly recommend.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Phenomenal Service
text: I had a wonderful time at the Londonhouse. So great that I booked twice in one week for the holidays along with my wife's birthday. Special shout to Saif and Nicole T making me feel right at home. I am originally born and raised in Chicago and its nothing better than visiting back home and being treated like a human being. These guys are not lost in the nonsense going on in this world right now. They are dedicated individuals to making sure everyone who walks in that door is good to go and therefore they will forever be blessed!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel in a great location!
text: We chose this hotel because it offered great views of the Chicago River and the New Year fireworks! We were very happy with the accommodations and the entire staff was very courteous and helpful. There are many hotels in the area, but I am very happy we chose the LondonHouse!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great customer service
text: I had a great time at LondonHouse. The staff, especially Corey when checking in, were all friendly and helpful. It has great amenities and felt clean and safe to stay. Overall, I would highly recommend staying at this beautiful location.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great trip!
text: My niece‚Äôs first trip to Chicago! Great atmosphere and location. Service was great and staff was very friendly and accommodating. Location was perfect for our itinerary and the views from our room were perfect.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Clean. Great location.
text: Loved our stay. Room with a River view was amazing, spacious & clean. Felt safe and the location was perfect to walk about the city. The only bummer comment would be that early morning room service wasn‚Äôt available due to pandemic circumstances - understandable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent location for a proposal.
text: The LH cupola is an amazing location for a proposal. Manny was very friendly and everything was just up to the mark. The location is so beautiful and perfect for the occasion. Thank you. We had a very good time.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nice hotel in a great location
text: We stayed here for one night in late December.  The location cannot be beat.  Valet was quick and easy, as was the check-in process.  All of the staff were extremely friendly.  The rooms are nice and comfortable. We stayed here because of the location, and we were not disappointed.  Close to great restaurants, shopping and theaters.  All walking distance, even in the cold weather.  The river and city views were spectacular from our 8th floor room.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Those views‚Ä¶
text: Excellent hotel in a great location. The views were unbelievable day and night from our vista king room. The price was reasonable for a weekend and the room exceeded our expectations and it is clear why this is the number one rated hotel in Chicago. The rooftop bar that is the main attraction was slightly too ‚Äòinstagrammy‚Äô for our tastes but this had no effect on or stay or should put off any other types of people from staying in this fab hotel!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Clean, beautiful, friendly
text: London house is top notch. Nicole at the front desk was extremely friendly and selected an outstanding room for us. This is the place to stay when visiting Chicago. Location is excellent and the rooms are beautiful.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engagement Proposal
text: Top-Notch Phenomenal venue and service.  Manny was incredible from start to finish ensuring every detail went perfect as planned.  Thank you for helping create a moment in time captured for us to share forever. We are so grateful!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Hotel, Amazing Value
text: This hotel is top-notch. Rooms are well appointed with a great bed. The view from our room was amazing! Staff was great, very nice and helpful. Had a particularly lovely interaction with Edgar at the front desk, he helped to check us in and check us out. He was very nice and provided excellent service. Breakfast was very good at the restaurant. Elevator situation is a bit confusing. Guests weren't told that they needed to select the floor for each passenger. This meant that often the elevator you were assigned would be full of a family of six. I'm guessing that this is less of a problem on weekends that aren't a major holiday. But for the price, this hotel is a no-brainer; beautiful rooms, great staff, and a fantastic location.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Stay
text: We absolutely enjoyed our stay at the hotel. Everything was clean and the staff was very friendly, and they were very attentive to make sure our stay was great. I always stay at Hiltons because I travel a lot for work, and this was one of the best experiences I‚Äôve had this year in a Hilton hotel. I‚Äôll definitely be staying here again when I come back to Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location, Top Notch Service
text: This was our second time staying at the London House.  Staff is always friendly and eager to help. We were able to check in early upon arrival, which was appreciated. On-site restaurants are great and the location is unbeatable.  River views are amazing from the rooms and rooftop.  Rooms are updated and tastefully decorated.  Big plus for the complimentary bathrobes!  We will stay here again when we return to Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: I must say the place is costly so need a pocket full
text: After landing at the airport, the next destination was to the hotel and check-in. I have done all the research for the best hotels in Chicago. I found London House Hotel meeting my requirements. But I must say the place is costly so need a pocket full of dollars to pay the bills. Well, I am not that rich to afford this hotel but to stay in a luxury hotel has always been my dream. So, this time I have made my dream come true. London House Hotel, Chicago is a very trendy, comfy, luxurious, and travelers-friendly place. The swimming pool, dining area, room, and sitting area are clean and refined. The city view from the room window, Food, floor staff, and the attendants is good.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A Couple of Days
text: We stayed at the hotel a couple of nights over the weekend. Every staff person we interacted with was friendly and helpful. The room was perfect for our needs. The hotel is perfectly situated downtown and many of the places we wanted to see or visit were within walking distance. The one qualm is with the elevators which aren‚Äôt as fast as one would like. The bar and terrace on floors 20 / 21 are great. So in any case a very good experience.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Proposal
text: My proposal at the London House Cupola was absolutely perfect! Planning and working with Manny to set everything up was great and he was very helpful and prompt with everything. I wouldn‚Äôt change a thing and me and my fianc√© were very happy and pleased with the experience!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Cupola Proposal
text: LondonHouse Cupola is the best place for proposal. The views of the city are amazing from the cupola. I was able to surprise my girlfriend and both our family during my Proposal. Cupola provides the privacy that you need in the big city with the views that are stunning. The Cupola itself looks like a place that is part of Castle. This makes it perfect to have your Proposal in the Castle vibe in the city of Chicago. Really loved the my experience here at LondonHouse. They made my proposal day one of the best day for my fiance and my family. I really appreciate all of the help I got from Manny to create great memories at the  LondonHoue Cupola. I recommend everyone to visit the Cupola at least once especially if you're a Chicagoan.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: It was a great weekend because of the hotel stay.
text: The location, the room, overall hotel was excellent. It was very clean. When we arrived we were greeted by every employee we seen. The woman that helped us was great shout out to Nicke T. She was very helpful and even got us a great room with a great view. She also gave us recommendations for the city and made us feel very welcome.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Surprise proposal went great!
text: Manny and his team were fantastic in helping me surprise my (new) fianc√© in my proposal at the LondonHouse Cupola! They helped figure out Al the details 2 months in advance. It was such a sweet moment and a day we‚Äôll never forget. Thank you!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful
text: My wife and I just returned from Chicago from a Long Overdue Personal Vacation. The London House is Spectacular, from the Greetings walking in and our room was Exceptional. We ate at Ocean Prime and it was Beyond Words and the Rooftop Bar was Exciting with Spectacular View. All the staff we encountered were very friendly and giving of their time! We will definitely be Repeat Travelers.Thank You,George

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing review for an amazing hotel!
text: My husband and I staid at this hotel last weekend for business and it was amazing! Check in with Nicole T. was so smooth and warming. We talked for about 5 minutes and she made check in feel like home. We were able to upgrade the room and the view was very much everything!!!! Loved the room from the view, the bathroom, the robes, house shoes lol, literally everything was amazing. Only thing missing was a microwave. Check out was even smoother!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect stay
text: My wife and I came into Chicago for an overnight and we thought this hotel was in an excellent location.  We were right.  We were able to walk to the Art Institute of Chicago, an excellent restaurant for breakfast and a short cab ride to another outstanding restaurant for dinner.  The room was overlooking the river and we didn‚Äôt have to see the Trump Tower. I asked for some extra espresso pods about the time we came back from dinner they were there.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The only place to stay in Chicago!
text: I've spent over 100 nights at this hotel. Finally back after a two year hiatus during the pandemic. The service and amenities are stellar. The staff is even better! The LondonHouse remains the best in the game!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent experience!
text: From the valet, through the check in process, to the cleanliness of the hotel and room, our stay was great! The views of the river from our room were also great. We would absolutely recommend a stay at this property while visiting the downtown Chicago area.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: 100% amazed
text: It‚Äôs our first time staying here at London House in Chicago and we could not be more impressed. Since the moment we arrived at checked in with Edgar, we felt right at home! He did an amazing job making the check in quick and easy, and definitely secured our decision to come back. Rate 1-10? We give it a 11! The view is breathtaking too!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Trouble with customer service
text: I had trouble with customer service throughout my entire stay. The lady that booked my stay was unprofessional and uninformed. She stated that I would have a riverfront view, and upon arrival I found out the room that was booked was not a riverfront room. I spent over an hour on the phone with three different employees explaining my situation. They finally said it was their mistake and that I would have a riverfront room with no additional charge. I checked my expenses from the trip a few days later and realized I was charged an additional $90 for the new room. I had lots of trouble with customer service, but the location and rooms were perfect.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Always great
text: I stay at the London House as often as I can when I am in Chicago. The rooms are spacious, beds comfortable, toiletries are great, and the location is perfect. I always get great service but want to especially recognize Nabi. I have been coming there for years and, even through COVID, he has a smile on his face, remembers me, and makes me feel welcome.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel in the heart of Chicago
text: With all the choices in Chicago I'm so glad we decided on LondonHouse! Not only was the room comfortable with a great view of the city and river below, but the staff was super friendly and accommodating as well. Nicole went above to make our stay as enjoyable as possible. Bed was comfortable, room was beautifully designed including great amenities like a Nespresso machine and Malin+Goetz shower products. We would definitely visit again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Proposal
text: What a dreamy, movie-like experience was my engagement proposal at the LH Rooftop Cupola. Surprised as I was, Manny played his role until the very end, and was super helpful throughout the photoshoot. Adventurous yet safe, with unmatched views and service. The food was also delicious.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: 12-08-2021 Proposal
text: Manny did an excellent job at meeting and exceeding my expectations. He was able to make such a memorable moment come true in such short notice. I was able to meet with him a week prior to discuss any questions I had and he was able to answer every question as well as give me tips and advice. He always stayed in communication. His level of professionalism and experience are A+++. I would highly recommend and use Manny for any of my future planning.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nick & Sarah's Engagement
text: Overall this experience was amazing! I proposed to my girlfriend late Saturday night and surprised her with family and friends! Manny was incredible to work with and really helped me pull off this special night! It was truly an amazing experience, and most importantly, she was completely surprised and caught off guard!I was able to surprise her with a private area in the Cupola on the rooftop with rose petals, a bottle of Dom and a ring!The entire evening was something out of a movie and I can't thank Manny and LondonHouse enough for the incredible experience!If you are looking for a great place to propose in Chicago, this is the best place to do it!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great place!!
text: Great hotel!  Great people and amenities.  Excellent location.  River rooms had amazing views. The higher the better.  Roof top bar was great fun.  Beautifully decorated for Christmas.  I will be back.  Hotel is win!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: my daughters wedding
text: I had the best experience!! the food was amazing and everything was beautiful and everyone was so helpful!!totally worth the value.  We loved the rooftop decorations and the bar on the 21 floor.  The brunch was amazing as well.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Can‚Äôt recommend highly enough - outstanding hotel
text: Wow, not much to say except ‚Äústay here!‚Äù A beautiful, super central hotel with the most excellent, wonderful staff you‚Äôll ever meet - customer service is outstanding and they literally can‚Äôt do enough for you! Even after meeting me once, they remembered my name and used it when I saw them in the lift etc - so personable.Hotel room wise, bathroom is absolutely huge with lovely double shower. Bedroom is stylish and bed is dreamy! I‚Äôd highly recommend the rooftop bar too - decorated beautifully for Christmas with some amazing views. Drinks prices were steep but so are any rooftop bars of the same calibre. Will absolutely return on my next trip to Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing is an understatement
text: The hotel was fabulous! Wonderful staff, amenities, and food/beverage options, with very comfortable and clean rooms. Nicole helped me during my stay and she was such a delight! She highlighted what I should expect my whole stay and noted that if I had any issues to reach out. She also gave me a beautiful view of the city!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nice and feels like nice vacation
text: If you are trying to choose one of the hotels in this area choose this one. I stayed in London House, my cousin stayed in Hyatt and his room compare to mine was like so dated. This hotel is nicer, cleaner and fells safer. Ask for room with a view and walk to the Chicago Art Museum. The Bean is only 10 mins away.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The Perfect Marriage Proposal
text: What can I say, Manny at the Londonhouse absolutely made everything magical.  The Hotel itself is absolutely amazing but what Manny did executing my surprise proposal in the Cupola was amazing.  My future wife was completely surprised and shocked, I couldn‚Äôt have asked for anything more.  Something I thought would be stressful was really smooth and easy.  Everything about the hotel made this day unforgettable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: One of my favourite stays in Chicago
text: From the moment I entered this hotel I felt welcomed!  Throughout the check-in process Ken was amazing.  In fact throughout my short stay Ken was extremely engaging and accommodating.  Thanks for making my stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Edgar & Rebecca Proposal
text: It was a amazing experience. Everything was perfect and my partner was surprised thoroughly. And we enjoy the whole atmosphere and area. We are excited to get back our photos. Will definitely come back to enjoy other amenities.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House Cupola Proposal
text: I recently proposed to my now fianc√© at the Cupola at LH and it exceeded expectations. From initial contact, Manny was great to work with. His attention to detail and organization of the entire event was superb. Lindsay and Sid, the photographers, were wonderful to work with as well. Manny ensured everything ran smoothly the day of and provided several accommodations throughout the proposal. Wd couldn't be happier with our experience.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location, Superb Room
text: We selected The LondonHouse because we wanted a luxury hotel. We loved every minute of our stay. A beautiful fresh room overlooking the Chicago River. Very busy yet the quietest hotel we have ever stayed. We walked everywhere from this location . .  . the Art Institute, Millennium Park, The Nederlander theatre, the Remington , Petterinos. We highly recommend it. . . worth every penny!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse made my proposal incredibly special
text: I recently proposed to my fiance at the LondonHouse Coppola and I can‚Äôt begin to describe how fantastic they were. Manny organized everything and did and incredible job and the photos that Lindsay took were amazing. They made sure that everything for that special occasion was perfect and went off without a hitch.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Back in Chicago!
text: Very good room with views of the Chicago Riverfront Walk at the Corner of Wacker and Michigan.  Very hospitable reception staff.  My second stay this year.  Last one was in September.  Convenient location.  Great area for walking, running, shopping, dining, and also easy job to Lakeshore Drive.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Thanksgiving getaway
text: Walked in the day of and reserved an awesome room. The staff was beyond great and made our stay that much better with handling everything for us. Everyone on staff was extremely kind and offered any assistance they could to make our stay that much better. Will be back for NYE.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The only place to stay!
text: Arrived around 12:30 pm, parked bags with bell hop, got checked in, and the person checking me in said she'd give me a text when my room was ready, which was around 2:30 (check-in is not until 4). Just a lovely room. I requested a great view and got it. Room service every morning was impeccable and the best coffee I've had in a long time. Highly recommend the omelet. Requested no housekeeping because COVID, fresh towels were promptly delivered. Masks required throughout the hotel, I felt really safe. Gwen in in-room dining has a connection to my current state. It was fun to visit with her about it. All the staff helpful and friendly without overdoing it. I would stay there again and again. One reviewer complained that housekeeping "ruined the mood" by walking in the room. There's a door tag for privacy which he needed to use.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Just okay
text: Overall good hotel. They ‚Äúupgraded‚Äù for more cost per night because the room I booked didn‚Äôt have much of a view according to the front desk. View was okay not amazing. Housekeeping likes to tap on door so they walked in on us. Killed the mood. I‚Äôve had better experiences elsewhere. Only major plus was location but there are at least 5 other places in that area.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: 10/10 HIGHLY RECOMMEND
text: This hotel was amazing! When we first arrived it was pretty late but Nicole T. and Arturo G. at the front desk were so nice and helpful they gave us a suite with a beautiful view of the river. The room was spacious and clean. We even had a view from our bathroom. Nicole was awesome! She gave us 2 free drinks at the lobby bar. Her warmth and hospitality made our trip that much better. The hotel itself was central to everything. We were able to walk to almost everything. We are definitely staying here on our next trip to Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Outstanding in every way!
text: Love, love, loved my time at LondonHouse Chicago. Yes, it's a perfect location, the rooms are impeccable with amazing views, and the amenities are terrific. All that said, what really made my visit special was the outstanding and caring staff and their attention to detail.  In particular, Mary was the best concierge I've ever had and went out of her way to listen and make perfect recommendations based on my interests. Talking with her is like spending time with an old friend. Ken at the front desk also was fantastic and accommodating to my schedule and needs. I had a wonderful stay and can't wait to return. Thanks for a great experience! Highly recommended.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful Stay
text: Amazing service, great food, clean room and excellent location! Wonderful stay and experience for me and my family. Great hotel for business or family/relaxing weekend. Can‚Äôt wait to return soon. Land & Lake Kitchen on ground level was excellent too!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful Location, Great Staff
text: Staff was very accommodating and warm on our trip. I'd highly recommend anyone staying in Chicago to stay here - you're in the lap of luxury! Hoping to schedule my next trip out to Chicago soon - and will be staying here!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location of a nostalgic hotel
text: The hotel is is in a great location just across the river on Michigan Ave. near great shopping and other wonderful attractions. We had a room that had views of the lake, city, and river which was wonderful. I love the elevator system‚Ä¶where you tell it your floor first. The rooms are a little small, the bathroom was almost just as big as the living space. Even though you are high up, you can still hear the hustle and bustle of downtown in the middle of the night.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Good Hotel In A Great Location
text: We enjoyed our stay at the London House hotel in downtown Chicago from November 12th to 16th.  As a Hilton Diamond member we were upgraded to a larger room with a floor to ceiling window view of the Chicago river.  Only issue was wifi connection was not stable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Luxury and location
text: Stayed 3 nights in celebration of my son‚Äôs 21st birthday. Wonderful staff and perfect location. Room well appointed and spotlessly clean. Especially liked nepresso coffee, room lighting and waterfall shower/pressure. Special shout-out to Edgar at the front desk who went out of his way to help make our stay fantastic.  Kudos to the hotel staff.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect engagement spot
text: Staff was welcoming, the hotel Christmas decorations were gorgeous, the champagne in the room was amazing. We loved it so much. Highly recommend to any couple for their most romantic evening. We will be back to commemorate this special day for sure.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: We Won't Stay Anywhere Else!
text: We celebrated our anniversary last year with a stay at this gorgeous hotel, and our experience was nothing short of wonderful! The views are fantastic, the service- impeccable, and we have booked ourselves a stay to come back for the holidays this year. When we called to see if we could be in the same room as last time, Bess, the front desk manager, made the experience so easy by helping us get our favorite room again! She even remembered that we had a special situation last year with a cake we needed to store in the refrigerator (can't come to Chicago without getting our fav!) - and when I told her we'd have another one to store this year, she told us they would be happy to help. This place is beautiful, is located perfectly, and we feel so taken care of. Thanks, Bess and team- you rock!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lovely and enjoyable
text: By the time we reached the hotel,(8:22 pm) we were tired and hungry.  It was a long day. Nicole T. was sympathetic and caring, while we were talking about our day.  She brightened our demeanor with her warm smile and she made us laugh.  She suggested eating at the hotel and gave us complementary drink passes.  The room was lovely.  Clean, the decor was spot on and the king size bed was very comfortable.  Bathroom shower was heavenly.  Beautiful views of the city.  Ken, another staff associate, was very helpful and friendly in resolving an issue.  Thank you Ken, for making our stay even more enjoyable.  Excellent housekeeping.  Called for an extra blanket and received it in minutes.  Highlight of our stay is the rooftop; had drinks and took photos of the city.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Love this Hotel
text: Friendly staff- great customer service, great views. Food is always great here- lots of great on property restaurants as well. Room is exceptionally clean always. Easy walk to downtown restaurants and activities. Recommend highly.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great place and the best bellman!
text: We stayed in a corner king room which was lovely. Our Bellman, Mark Z, was a delight. He helped with luggage, suggested lunch spots, got a taxi with wheelchair access and kept our bags on day of departure while we wandered the city.  He was so accommodating and friendly and made us feel very welcome. We had lunch at the Land and Lake kitchen. The manager was taking orders and checking on us regularly. Food was delivered very quickly. Great service. Had cocktails and appetizers at the LH Rooftop bar. A lovely setting.  Very accommodating staff and excellent food. We will be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cheers to the front desk!
text: This hotel is extremely comfortable, welcoming, and relaxing, but its staff really sets it apart. I arrived after a long, tiring day of travel only to find that both the hotel and I had made two separate snafus with my reservation. Anthony H. immediately applied himself to my Gordian knot of a reservation with calm, patient, reassuring professionalism. While I waited, I watched Nicole T. at the other desk welcome a succession of guests and couldn't help but notice what great energy she has: she is warm, upbeat, tirelessly friendly, established a rapport with everyone who walked in, and gave personalized attention to each guest. And then she helped Anthony figure out my reservation, getting me a great room without the extra expense I thought I'd be stuck with. I truly appreciate both of them going out of their way to smooth out the bumps with professionalism and a genuine personal touch.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Yay For Great Service
text: Bess Ubolkaew is the best!  I had to make reservations for 11 people and was lucky enough to get Bess to help me with forms, receipts, and answers to all my questions.  She was quick with email responses and very kind and supportive.  I really appreciate everything she did to help me do my job getting reservations for our group.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful service
text: Just recently stay at London House Chicago with my wife and loved it.  What a vibe this hotel has and so close to everything.  Loved Maria at the front desk gave us great recommendations around the city for my wife and I to explore.   Definitely made the trip better with the perfect local tips she gave us.  London House Chicago you got a gem in Maria.  Can't wait to be back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Maria at the front desk
text: Maria at the front desk was phenomenal. She was excellent at providing all the information needed and attitude was down to earth and fun. Very welcoming she made the stay wonderful!üôåüèæ she is very beautiful as well. I enjoyed the stay because of her.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great service and friendly staff!
text: I came here last weekend and to be honest was having a rough week. So it was really uplifting to be treated as great as I was by the staff. They are incredibly friendly and helpful. One particular staff member there named Maria helped me out a lot. She even listened to me vent about my problems and encouraged me to try to be positive about it. Will definitely be back and thanks once again Maria! You're amazing!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Highly recommend
text: Great Staff, friendly and knowledgeable about the area. Overlooks Chicago River and Tribune building. Downtown walking area all around Michigan Ave.  About half a mile from Lake Michigan and the Navy pier.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Good customer service
text: I check in and nicke t the front desk Representative she had the best customer service and she made sure my stay was the best she upgraded my room to a river view and give me beverage vouchers for my stay ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: All in all- it was a great stay
text: First, I want to thank the staff and management of this hotel for going above and beyond expectations when it came to resolving what I believe to be a minor issue. I was quite impressed with their gesture.I will say the room I stayed in was very nice with an exceptional view facing north to Michigan Ave and the Wrigley Building.The room was clean and quiet and the hotel is centrally located with most attractions within a short walk. The afternoon Nespresso was also great. Thanks again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Second time staying for our anniversary. Stunning views, beautiful hotel, great location
text: This was our second time staying at the LondonHouse to celebrate our anniversary. The first time we stayed was two years ago for our first. It was a great stay then. This time, I emailed the hotel prior to let them know we'd be celebrating our anniversary here again and I requested a room on a high floor with great views. They replied saying they'd give us a room with a river/city view. When we arrived, Corey at the front desk helped check us in. We arrived about 45-60 minutes prior to check in time, and fortunately our room was ready early! Corey gave us 2 free drink tickets, which we ended up not getting the chance to use since we were out and about in the city. Corey told us our room had been upgraded. Since it was the same room type, I assume our room view was upgraded. We were on the top floor with a beautiful river/city view! It was perfect. The bed was firm yet comfortable with really nice sheets and bedding. The design and decor was modern and pretty. The mini fridge had plenty of room for the champagne we brought, some snacks, leftovers, and a couple other drinks. The bathroom was very nice too! The hotel itself is ornate and beautiful! And the rooftop is amaaaazing. We went up at the end of the night, ordered a couple drinks, and admired the stunning views from a table near a heater. It wasn't overly crowded and we were definitely able to enjoy the views!! Definitely our favorite place to stay when we stay in River North. Great location!! We will certainly be back in the future.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Really good stay
text: This is a top notch hotel.  Everything done well.  Great bed and room.  We declined to pay for an upgrade for a view and the view was still fantastic.  The rooftop is worth seeing both during the day and at night.  Book with confidence that you are staying in a superior hotel. We ate at both Ocean Prime and the more casual restaurant downstairs (sorry I do not recall the name but it was on the ground floor and a sort of diner)   I would not rave about either or knock them.  We ate their out of convenience, and neither were an issue nor were they exceptional for the price.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal
text: I proposed in the cupola. Manny was very detail oriented, he arranged everything & made sure that everything was perfect. It was a very special moment. I just want to thank Manny for all his hard work & communication. The views were breathtaking, the proposal setup was amazing. Thank you Manny & The LondonHouse

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Service
text: Beautiful hotel and clean rooms. Great location and walkable to interesting places to visit. Staff was welcoming and provided great service. Yessica made sure to go above and beyond to make our stay comfortable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: We love LondonHouse!
text: Our stay at the LondonHouse was wonderful! It‚Äôs our favorite hotel in Chicago. Nicole at the front desk was extremely welcoming and helpful, upgrading our room and getting us exactly what we needed. We‚Äôll be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A perfect girls trip for the weekend
text: Great location, perfect for a quick trip! Lots of restaurants around.The suite we had was pretty spacious, very clean. Only thing about the room we didn‚Äôt appreciate was the bathroom door. It wouldn‚Äôt close properly.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful
text: Our corner suite was perfect. Everything was extremely clean, cosy, comfortable and lovely decorated.  The views were stunning and the roof top bar was a perfect place to relax and take in the city sites.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Weekend getaway
text: Let me start by saying this trip was just perfect.  It all started with the warm welcome of the staff.  The hotel is absolutely gorgeous.  2 people that I wanted to give a special thank to: Anthony and Nicole.  You guys truly gave a new meaning to customer service.  Being that this was me and my wife first trip to the Windy City together and our very first stay at this hotel, I couldn‚Äôt have been more pleased with the accommodations.  Everything was first class!!They gave us a great room with beautiful views of the city and the river.  We will definitely be coming back here for our next weekend getaway.  Love and light.  Ty

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Rooftop Proposal - LondonHouse Cupola
text: I wanted to find a quiet place in the city to surprise my girlfriend (now fianc√©e!) when I popped the question. After reaching out to the reservations desk at the LondonHouse, I got in touch with Manny, who provided detailed information on how their rooftop proposal package works. I reserved an hour on their rooftop where roses, a bottle of Dom Perignon, and flameless candles would await my unsuspecting girlfriend. Manny also arranged for a professional photographer, Lindsay, and a musician to play Hanging by a Moment for us (the background for that song and our relationship probably doesn‚Äôt save the fact that it‚Äôs clich√© as heck). A few weeks before the proposal, Manny called me and explained exactly how this would go down, specifically how we would be escorted to the rooftop while he chatted with us under the guise that we were having ‚Äúdrinks on the rooftop‚Äù. When we arrived, everything went incredibly smoothly - exactly as Manny described. The shock and surprise on her face when she realized what was happening is something that I‚Äôll absolutely treasure for a long time to come. After the proposal, Lindsay stayed with us for about 30-45 minutes to take pictures. She was absolutely wonderful and made sure to get all of the photos we felt we needed. After spending a few more minutes alone, Manny brought us down to the hotel restaurant on the 21st floor where he had made a reservation for us. In all, the whole experience from start to finish was simply excellent. There are cheaper ways to pop the question (the whole thing with the reservation, musician, and photographer ran close to $3,000), but the once-in-a-lifetime question deserves an experience to match. And that‚Äôs what I got.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location
text: A beautiful hotel in a prime location. Not overly pricy given the area and holiday weekend. Plenty of rooms and the rooms are spacious and up to date with new amenities. Staff with very kind and helpful. Highly recommend rooftop bar.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A Divine visit to the city!
text: The London House has the best sheets!  That matters a lot to me.  The bed and pillows were so soft and comfortable that I slept soundly for over 10 hours one night!As a Diamond member of the Hilton family, I get a few perks.  One of these was a credit to use at any of their restaurants or bars.  I chose to use it for breakfast in the on-site restaurant.  The breakfasts are delicious!  Even without that perk, I would eat in the Land and Lake (I think this is the correct name) restaurant.  Excellent!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel
text: Phenomenal hotel and experience. Although it‚Äôs on a busy street, that makes the experience even better! Brunch was good (French toast to die for). Bar was great, super good selection of scotch. Room and river view was great too.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic Hotel and Experience
text: We had two rooms facing the river and they were both fantastic. The rooms were spacious, clean, well designed, and just extremely comfortable. We used the Valet service and our cars were available within 15 minutes whenever we wanted them. The convenience of the hotel made it very easy to just walk out and tour the shops on Michigan Avenue. It was so close to everything that we had so much time to explore and enjoy. We ran into one of the hotel managers, Matthew Sheehan, and he warm, genuine, knowledgeable, and just incredibly accommodating. We also went to both the rooftop and the gym, We didn't get a chance to go up to the Cupola, although I heard the view up there is fantastic. All good. Enjoy

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House
text: Great hotel . Really good location. Big really comfortable room . Would stay there again . Did not get a chance to do the rooftop so I‚Äôll have to go back to do that . We enjoyed the breakfast it was good .

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The absolute best! Don't stay anywhere else!
text: I've traveled all around the world and this is by far the best hotel experience I have had. My now wife and I  stayed at the LondonHouse for four nights recently for our wedding which took place at the top of the LondonHouse Rooftop and it was made so special from all of the staff that we had a chance to connect with during our time there. From the moment of check inn, Nicole and Arturo at the front desk were so great to my wife and I. Friendly and knowledgeable, they made it feel very welcoming upon arrival. Had a few packages waiting for me upon arrival which security brought right up to the room and no issues even though the packages arrived a few days before we did. We had a vista room which was extremely clean and had a stunning floor to ceiling window overlooking the river. The room has everything you need and is perfect for a couple. Housekeeping was very nice and still made the beds everyday which is something we have not seen in the many hotels we have stayed in since COVID. No issues with the room at all.The Rooftop Restaurant and Bar was excellent. The empanadas are something we have not shut up about since we have come home. Between the view, the food, and music, it is impossible to not have a good time at the rooftop.Now to the two people that made the stay so special. There are no words to describe how special  Mary (the concierge) and Manny (who manages the rooftop ) made the experience for us. With an elopement, we didn't expect to have any family or friends at our special day, but little did we know that these two great people would became a part of our extended family during our time there.  Mary and I made a friendship connection before our stay as she helped me with a very tough to get reservation at Gibsons Italia for our wedding night. When I arrived at the hotel it was like meeting a friend you haven't seen in a while and were extremely happy to see. With her very warming and helpful disposition, she helped my wife and I who had never been to Chicago feel like we knew everything we needed to know about the city. She went above and beyond to make us feel like family during our time there and even surprised us with a very special flower and card on our wedding day which has since been framed and hung in our home. Manny was another person who we made a connection with before our arrival as he was the one who helped us book the rooftop location and set us up for the best day ever. He went above and beyond all day to making us feel as though we just had to enjoy the day with zero stress. He even ran back to the room for us when we forgot out wedding certificate to sign! He made my wife feel like a true princess that day and made her feel so special, I am forever thankful to him for that. He was engaging to talk to and just a truly wonderful soul to get to know over our time there. I could write about these two forever, but if you have the chance to meet them on your stay, you will be better off for it. The views from the rooftop and hotel amenities  are second to none in the city, but the people who work here are what will forever make it special to us. Thanks to everyone, you are truly the best!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Wedding Reception Hall in Downtown Chicago!
text: Words cannot describe how grateful we are for choosing LondonHouse as our wedding venue! It all starts with Steve, the wedding coordinator. Steve is the most knowledgeable, patient and flexible person!! Steve made the entire experience fly so smoothly, from the tasting to the brunch after the wedding. We cannot express how thankful we are that LondonHouse has Steve as their wedding coordinator as he made the entire wedding planning with LondonHouse go so smoothly! He responded to all our emails the same day, answered all of our questions and concerns, as well as provided valuable suggestions that we incorporated in wedding planning. We both were worried for the tasting, as we both are picky eaters, but Steve made the experience amazing as he helped us alter the courses to our specifications and liking. We are truly thankful to Steve and the entire staff at LondonHouse for making our wedding the wedding of our dreams. We strongly recommend LondonHouse for any couple that is looking to host their wedding in Downtown Chicago! Not only is the reception hall beautiful with the Chicago River view but the staff is truly professional and amazing. The hotel is truly high class and luxury from the hotel rooms to the staff.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best place to stay in Chicago
text: This is our second time staying here and it gets better with each stay.  Perfect location. Lobby bar is beyond fantastic. Hotel staff is very friendly and helpful. Absolutely loved every minute of our stay.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great First Stay
text: My husband and I stayed here for the first time but not the last. The room was immaculate. I requested housekeeping every day, and this was efficient and excellent! Thanks, housekeeping! The rooftop bar is amazing. Breakfast was good. The desk people were responsive to any requests we had.We were right across the river from the beautiful TRUMP tower, which is spectacular. Great view from our room.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Paradise in the Windy City
text: London House ChicagoPaloma and her team (especially Edgar) made me feel really welcome at the Hilton London House in Chicago.  Edgar was able to check me in immediately to a room with 2 beds early that morning which was ideal as I was at Chicago to join the rest of my family to see my son Thomas.  I immediately liked Edgar although he was an NFL Raiders fan ü§£ü§£ü§£). It was like I knew him for all of my life. We were joking with each other but at the same time he was easing my path and provided me with a fantastic room.  He does his job really well and provided great customer service without me even having to ask for it. People from Paloma‚Äôs team (Paloma, Edgar, Maria) were very responsive and checked in to how I liked my room. I really enjoyed my room, my view on the 14th floor (Room 1419) the hotel, and the hotel‚Äôs location. I didn‚Äôt get a chance to make it up to the rooftop lounge but ill definitely be staying at this hotel again.  Everything in the room was nice.  It was quiet and the ice maker and elevators were close by. Choose London House Chicago on your next trip to the Windy City!- Mike Wright (go Steelers ü§£)

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: 2021 Chicago Trip
text: The best Hilton property we have ever stayed at. Staff is wonderful and pleasant to interact with. Our room had a spectacular view of the city and was clean, quiet, and comfortable. Breakfast was superb and the wait staff was very attentive and friendly. We have stayed at many Hilton properties including Curio and Tapestry hotels; this one is number 1 on our list. We will be back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing location, amazing amenities for first time visitors
text: Our first time in Chicago for our anniversary was wonderful, the lobby was beautiful with very warm staff. We instantly felt at home checking in, and when we arrived to our room it was absolutely stunning with great views. Having the vouchers for breakfast was also wonderful and was a great way to start off our mornings. The rooftop bars and restaurants had great food and drinks and were second to none with their views. Overall an amazing experience with an even better location. Being able to walk to all major experiences and sights in the town was something we didn‚Äôt fake for granted. Thank you Hilton. And especially thank you Arturo for the warm welcome and service that was above and beyond. Thank you for your service from one veteran to another.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Top notch
text: I was SO impressed by this property. A beautiful lobby, great service from staff at every point, a well-appointed and quiet room, delicious room service, and a location that's ideal for doing just about anything around the city. I would definitely return, and it was a great first trip back to Chicago since March 2020.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The best greeting in Chicago by Ricky!
text: The location is perfect. And also receptionist gave us warm greeting. Ricky was so kind even though we arrived in the early morning before 6 AM. He started our Chicago trip with good charm. Thank you!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Loved EVERYTHING
text: We were absolutely amazed with the hospitality of this hotel. Our room with the view of the river and city was GORGEOUS and breathtaking. Every employee that we encountered was super helpful and friendly. One of the BEST hotels that I‚Äôve stayed in. PERFECT location and awesome service. I would DEFINITELY stay at The London House again! Jam

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Hotel Location and View from Rooftop Bar!
text: We enjoy the London House although I have only stayed their twice. The Vista Suites with a view of the Chicago River and bridges to the west is one of the best views in Chicago as well as from the rooftop lounge and patio.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: HH review
text: Great service. Had a great experience. The hotel was lovely. The accommodations were great and the service was fantastic. The location was in close proximity to restaurants, clubs, and a number of other fun activities.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Incredible stay
text: We celebrated my wife's Bday, the hotel is amazing, conveniently located. Great view too.  Nicole T...checked us into our room with a big smile and positive energy! We will be back! Thank you Nicole T. & Hilton London house. Pics are view from our room.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best location in Chicago for any hotel.
text: We loved our first stay here at the London House. We stayed here on a busy Friday night in September. I‚Äôm a Hilton Honors Diamond member. At check in my wife and I received 2 drink vouchers for the lobby bar and 2 $20 dollar vouchers for breakfast. The gentleman that checked us in at the front desk upgraded us from $12 dollar vouchers for breakfast to $20 dollar vouchers because it was our first time staying at the London House. We stayed on the 15th floor in a king room overlooking the river. The view of the river is amazing. The room was small but perfect for our needs. The room had a small smart fridge and a large flat screen TV.  The room had a good sized bathroom with shower. The beds are fairly comfortable. The elevators here are fast. We didn‚Äôt hear anyone in adjacent rooms. We had breakfast at the downstairs restaurant Land and Lake. We waited about 15 minutes at 8:45am. The food was great. The service was awesome. The location of the hotel can‚Äôt be beat. It is near the L train redline lake station, union station, and millennium station for the metra. Lots of restaurants and shopping is nearby. There is valet parking for $72 per night.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: An amazing getaway!
text: We decided to do a quick getaway for our 13th anniversary. With so many choices in Magnificent mile I was hoping that I chose the right one.  We walked up to the desk and instantly Nicole T helped me realize I definitely did! She was so helpful and upgraded our room for a discount for our anniversary, found us a reservation at Ocean Prime since we couldn't find any availability anywhere. The room was clean, comfortable and had an amazing view. The view from the rooftop restaurant was always great.  We will definitely be coming back again and again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Stay!
text: This was our 2nd time at this hotel (within the last year). The customer service is top-notch... Customer Service: Paloma P is a jewel of the hotel. She is very responsive and wants everyone's stay to reflect the true opulence of the hotel. She is the reason we came back to this hotel. Antonio is wonderful. He brought our luggage to our room and introduced the appliances. If we needed anything, he was there to help. Nicole T. was such a wonderful representative at check-in. I watched her check in the couple before us (as well as us) and she truly gives every guest a wonderful personable experience. I hope the hotel acknowledges these wonderful employees.Rooms: updated, nice, wonderful views of the river, roomy (family of 4 fit comfortably - two adults & 2 kids - on two separate stays we have booked the 2 queen vista room and 1 bedroom, both were comfortable for all 4 of us). The showers are wonderful (glass, large, very clean - a big thing for me when I book hotels)Location: Great location. You can walk anywhere downtown you need to go... Navy Pier, "The Bean", 7-Eleven, restaurants, shows, Walgreens, shopping (Forever 21, Zara, etc), and much more. Also very convenient to catch the train from O'Hare to the hotel.We will definitely be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Just wonderful
text: We stayed at this property in July and loved it. It was clean and extremely comfortable. Great bedding, great bathroom. No complaints. We had a river view that was spectacular. (Yeah, we did have to look at the Trump hotel, but I was happy to stick my tongue out at them daily, so don't let that view deter you. After all, he LOST so the view of that hotel was a happy reminder of that.)

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nicole =Outstanding Customer Service=Outstanding Hotel
text: I can‚Äôt imagine the stress today in working in customer service today in the travel industry. Yet, Nicole at the LondonHouse handles every situation with kindness, graciousness and professionalism. Thank you to her and this very nice hotel for going above and beyond. When you combine a great hotel with a wonderful location with this quality of customer service you truly have perfection.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Get away weekend
text: We had a couple of Hilton properties picked out for our weekend getaway and my husband suggested we stay here. I am glad he chose this hotel. The employees were amazingly friendly especially at their restaurant and the rooms had fabulous views of the river and partial lake view. The rooftop bar was simply awesome. The view and atmosphere was spectacular. You are located right in the magnificent mile for shopping. Across the river was A boat tour we took that is a must do while staying here. We suggest the lake and architectural tour. Well worth the money. Back to the hotel‚Ä¶ Rooms were clean and spacious. Bed was very comfortable and loved how our tv could swing from the bedroom to sitting area. Great idea. They seriously paid attention to detail and this is why I HIGHLY suggest staying here the next time you stay in Chicago. We will be back‚Ä¶

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Ideal Wedding Venue
text: LondonHouse delivered one of the most breathtaking and memorable weddings that my wife and I could ever dream of. When we toured the LondonHouse, the primary reasons my wife and I chose this venue was the location downtown Chicago for our guests, the elegance of the hotel and wedding venue, and the wedding coordinator, Steve Sleczka. Upon meeting Steve, his decades of experience in the wedding industry were apparent, and he was paramount to pulling off an amazing wedding. He was responsive throughout the 12 months between booking Londonhouse and our wedding date, was organized throughout the process, and was proactive in reaching out to both my wife and I to keep us up to date and keep the stress levels low. The organization of the day of our wedding was beyond imaginable. The bridal suite was perfect for my wife and the bridal party, and my groomsman and I were extremely well taken care of. Our guests continued to comment on how beautiful the hotel rooms, rooftop bar, and the hotel was. Our guests were treated spectacularly, as were my wife and I. We continued to comment on how absolutely nothing went wrong on our wedding day, from the photographer, transportation from the hotel to our church and back, the cocktail hour, the dinner and the reception. Steve and his team had our day planned down to the minute, and my wife and I could not ask anything more of Londonhouse. The staff working their wedding services are worth their weight in gold, and you would be hard pressed to find a hotel that is better suited to host a wedding.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Proposal at London House
text: Words cannot express how great of a moment Manny made my fiance‚Äôs and I‚Äôs proposal night. From start to finish it was nothing but great memories. Communication before the proposal was excellent and the decor within the cupola very romantic. Everything i‚Äôve requested from a photographer and cover song was done better than I could have imagined. The views from pictures don‚Äôt do justice as being there is a 100x better. We‚Äôd like to thank Manny over at London House for making such a night very memorable. We will definitely be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay
text: We had a great stay at LondnHouse Chicago. Hotel was great. Upscale, modern decor. The location was absolutely perfect. Staff was very helpful and went above and beyond. We will definitely be back when we are in Chicago again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best rooftop in Chicago
text: Love this hotel!  Best rooftop in Chicago and some of the best views in the city!  Most importantly a great team providing top notch customer service. Special shout-out to Nicole T for 5 star service the entire weekend from check in to check out!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Incredible place
text: Our room was not ready when we arrived at 4:01 but the staff and management were incredibly kind and helpful and made us feel at home . The room was incredible and with an amazing view . This was just a weekend getaway but I will definitely come back again because this has been better than any Hilton I have stayed so far , I‚Äôm very impressed and look forward to my next trip to Chicago .

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Central location and amazing view of the river!
text: We chose this hotel for its location; it was within walking distance to the Magnificent Mile area (360 Chicago and Starbucks Reserve), the Chicago Loop (millennium park), the South Loop (museums), and the West Loop (many great restaurants). But, best of all, it was the river view! It is totally worth paying extra for this amazing view of the river and the many bridges. There are only 5 rooms per floor that have floor to ceiling glass windows; the higher the floor, the better the view. We stayed in room 1107 and enjoyed the wonderful view at sunrise and sunset. Highly recommend this hotel!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: I was impressed
text: First time in Chicago! What a beautiful cityThe London House is in the middle of it all, we were actually able to walk to many of the museums, the bean, restaurants, shopping .. you get the point. And the view it's amazing! You can see the whole city right from your room (vista room) I actually thought it was a marketing technique at first, you know on the website they show you this amazing picture and when you get there you have to squeeze your face against the window to see a sliver of it. But no, it was right there! Just like the website! The room was clean, comfortable (I slept great), wify was great but my favorite was the staff! Everyone seems as happy to be there as I was, excited to answer my questions and incredibly helpful!So in conclusion, If you are visiting and want to explore while experiencing a stress free stay, The London House. If you are a local.. treat yourself!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect location
text: From the moment we pulled up to the valet parking, the person who greeted us took care that we were set up with our luggage as we checked in and headed to the roof for the best view of the river, this is the best location in our view of the city from the river walk to the heart of the city. Would definitely recommend this to all interested

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Exceptional Service
text: I stayed here for two nights and visited the rooftop both nights. Every staff member from the front desk to the rooftop bar was excellent. I want to specifically shout out Dawn for being the sweetest most amazing bartender I‚Äôve ever met. She made sure I had a place to sit as soon as someone left and we had amazing conversation. She knew I was alone and treated me like family and for that I will be returning without a doubt. Thank you Dawn for being an amazing person and making my stay that much more special!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Top spot
text: Property is fantastic and super convenient to all the Chicago sights for those looking to stay downtown. Staff was professional and super helpful. Maria & Paloma we‚Äôre especially great. Overall great experience. Will be our go to spot in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great customer Service
text: Fikret from Valet Services at the London House assisted me with getting a taxi to the airport. I let him know of my urgency and that i was running late for my flight. He was very professional, accommodating and assisted me with getting a ride in a timely manner.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Incredible Views of the City & Amazing Service - A Place Where Memories Are Made
text: The London House Cupola is the perfect venue and backdrop if you are looking for a private more intimate wedding ceremony.  The staff was amazing on assisting us on the details for not only the ceremony but our lunch on the rooftop.  We loved it so much, we did a second reservation when we had guests come into town so they could see the views and experience the service.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The best location
text: The best location and one of the most beautiful hotels in Chicago. Love the modern vintage decor! I love the communication tool they use there‚Äîtexting! I can text the hotel from anywhere asking any questions or making any requests. They responded right away!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Anniversary Celebration!!
text: We had a great time celebrating our 35th Wedding Anniversary. This was our first time staying at this hotel and we loved it! The room was very clean and the service was great! My husband left several hats and they were shipped via UPS. However, UPS lost our package and I was in constant contact with the Loss Prevention Supervisor. He was very, very helpful. I was not happy with UPS at all and I had to reach out to him several times. He really helped and I appreciate his service and professionalism!! Thanks again Allen!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent boutique hotel in the perfect location!
text: LondonHouse Chicago is the perfect mix of luxury, location, and convenience. It is upscale but not stuffy.  Perfect for a kid-less anniversary vacation. The staff (namely Nicole T.) were very friendly and accommodating. Nicole offered us an opportunity to upgrade our room to one with an amazing view of the city and river, and we‚Äôre glad she suggested it. We enjoyed cocktails on the rooftop bar our first night and enjoyed spectacular views of the city at night. Guest services promptly delivered additional pillows within 30 minutes of our request. The room had a fridge but not a microwave, which made leftovers from an amazing steak dinner a bit less enjoyable the next day. That‚Äôs our only complaint about this wonderful hotel. We can‚Äôt wait until we are able to return to Chicago and stay there again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Better than I had hoped for !
text: The whole experience at LondonHouse Chicago was seamless.  From check in to check out and during the stay, everyone on staff was wonderful.  I ran into people from many of the different departments within the hotel (on the floor, in the elevator, inside the front entrance etc.) and all of them had a great attitude and were friendly.  I work in a 4 star hotel, so am sensitive to most of the comings and goings on within the hotel.  The hospitality was excellent..A special shout out to Mary, the Concierge who was amazing.  She helped add the special touches, ideas, suggestions and knowledge that made my trip special and memorable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: I will come back next year
text: Hello! My stay here was amazing. I stayed in a corner suite, loved every minute of it. The room was really clean and I have a really big OCD especially with hotels in Chicago. I‚Äôve stayed in the Homewood last year and hated every second of it even if the staff was great with how limited they were. The Front desk manager Bess, she was amazing and the rest of the team.. Paloma, Yessica, Nidza, Anthony, Ken and Andrea.. if I forgot someone, sorry! I was going through all my Kipsu messages hoping to get everyone‚Äôs name. I was explained everything about my stay when I had questions and being a Diamond member the f&b credit was worth it! The land and lake was divine!! I am going back next year! Though I am praying we get reservations for the roof top bar as we couldn‚Äôt get in this round :(. Room service is amazing too! Very affordable. So we are re-planning! Thank you all for an amazing birthday. See you next year.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very nice and modern hotel in great location
text: The location in Chicago is very good - central to sights, the Riverwalk, and many restaurants. The view of our room onto Michigan Ave was ok, would‚Äôve preferred river view, but oh well, no big deal. The rooms are very clean and very modern. Complimentary breakfast (Gold and Diamond members) in the first-floor restaurant, Land & Lake, (well it was a $12/ea. Voucher ‚Äì not really complimentary) was great and the servers were very nice. Valet parking is super expensive ($72) but hey, this is Chicago, nothing is cheap here LOL. The rooftop bar offers a great view of the Chicago River, but you pay the price for that with your drinks. A great stay and we will for sure come back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Recent stay at the London House Hotel
text: Great place to stay.  Edgar at the front desk was very accommodating.I experienced some traveling issues on the way in and Edgar helped make sure I got a room and extra hospitality.I have stayed here in the past and will stay here again!River views are amazing.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful view
text: I can‚Äôt imagine a better location in Chicago than this hotel - central to shopping, sights, the Riverwalk and restaurants.  The view from our room was amazing.  The large TV directly facing the bed won our informal ‚Äúbest TV‚Äù award amongst the 7 hotels we stayed.  Breakfast in the first floor restaurant was great with super nice servers.  (Valet parking was ridiculously expensive but the alternative of lugging suitcases from a self parking lot a few blocks away wasn‚Äôt appealing).  Overall a fantastic stay and we can‚Äôt wait to go back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nicole T is Gracious, Confident,  & Welcoming.
text: Nicole T at the registration  desk has an amazing & welcoming energy.  She got me to upgrade without being pushy.  She was just charming, knowledgeable, & quite smooth.  She exuded the grace and elegance that is needed in the hospitality industry.  She is the standard by which all hospitality professionals should be measured.  Well done!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful getaway with a perfect stay!
text: The location was perfect. Staffs were very friendly and helpful. Room service was quick and efficient. We were upgraded to a junior suite and the room was well appointed with operable windows. The view from the room was amazing. Definitely recommend this hotel and will stay there again, anytime.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Matthew has Super Powers!
text: Not only did the manager, Matthew, advise that my wife's room was ready (at noon-we all know how rare that is) he was able to snag the last available upgrade to a river-view room for $40. Worth every penny!Matthew may not have actual "Super Powers" but he was friendly, patient and accommodating. His help went a long way to making my wife feel special by starting her vacation off with a great room! Thanks again!If you decide to book here-the river view rooms are worth the extra bucks-see the pics that my wife took from her room.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Matthew has Super Powers!
text: My wife booked this hotel on Priceline. She arrived today and asked if I could call to see if, by chance, her room was ready (around noon time). I called and spoke to Matthew at the front desk. Not only did he advise that her room was ready (we all know how rare that is), he said that there was a river-view room available (also ready) for a very reasonable $40 per night extra. Maybe Matthew doesn't have actual "super powers" but he was friendly, patient and accommodating. High marks from wife and I and a great start to her mini vacation. The views alone are worth double the upgrade fee. See the pics.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The Perfect Proposal
text: The London House was a wonder to work with for one of the most important days of my life. They were incredibly helpful and beyond accommodating to make the day special for me and my fianc√©. I would highly recommend the London House Cupola for a proposal.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lovely Chicago Hotel, Cannot Wait to Visit Again
text: We stayed at the Londonhouse beginning on Thursday, September 2, 2021 for a 3 night stay with departure on Sunday.We checked in using the front desk in the lobby, and the representative was very helpful and even upgraded us to a slightly larger room with great view of the Chicago River -- thanks to my Diamond status.The common areas and lobby are beautiful. I did not get to use the fitness center or spa.We checked into our room, 1021 on the 10th Floor. The elevator system worked well except when it was a very busy night on the rooftop. They would take some elevators out of service to service just the rooftop. As far as the room, we found it to be very clean and overall a simply stellar experience. The bathroom was beautiful. We loved the little touches like the artwork above the bed, the decor on the shelf next to the bed, the Nespresso machine, the robes/slippers in the closet, etc. We just overall liked the design and decor -- not to mention the view as I mentioned above.We tried both the Rooftop for drinks on Friday, September 3 with a reservation at 10pm as well as Land & Lake on five occasions. We had breakfast here each morning, as well as lunch our arrival day and happy hour on one day.Land & Lake got very busy later in the morning; however, I feel that the staff was always very friendly and efficient. The food came out quickly, and I thought it was good quality at a decent price. Overall a 5/5 on Land & Lake.The Rooftop had great views.  We had a reservation at 10pm on Friday night. We had a reserved table when we arrived, which was nice; however, I think they need to limit people visiting to only reservations or only parties for which they have a table. We had a few issues; however, they were quickly remedied by the staff. Overall, it was a beautiful evening and would return again. I would recommend possibly considering adding doors to the ice machine area during a future renovation, as they can get a little loud at times. However, we appreciated the location closer to the machine and elevator. So, in summaryRoom 5+/5Room Location 5/5Service 5/5Land & Lake 5/5Rooftop 4/5I can tell that the staff genuinely cares about this property, and I cannot wait to visit again.  I hope you will give it a try as well.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The STAFF IS INCREDIBLE!!! I'll stay here again based on them alone!
text: I never write reviews anymore, but I had to come on here and give an enormous shout out to BES (Bes is the best!!) at the front desk. So wonderful, cheerful, and accommodating. Amazing energy also!SPA: Trina is incredible! I booked a 50 minute massage with her. I believe it was a deep tissue massage. She is a delight!!**MUST TRY** BODY MELT MASSAGE: Christina is absolutely amazing!! Book a body melt with her. Christina got in deep to where I needed tons of knots to be worked on and I felt like a new person afterwards. Book this with Christina!!FACIAL: Harmony. Book your facial with Harmony! She left my skin glowing and as soft as ever!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Stay
text: We checked in and were greeted right from the door. At the front deal Nicole helped us get our keys and fully checked in she was amazing! Super kind and helpful.  She made sure our whole stay and rooms were perfect. She also checked in and was very helpful our entire stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best trip to Chicago yet
text: My go to hotel was always the Hard Rock Hotel which unfortunately closed. When booking this trip my friend suggested LondonHouse because of their rooftop bar. It was in a similar location to the Hard Rock. In fact, I like this location better. I loved everything from the moment we checked in until we checked out. The rooms, the dining, the rooftop bar, the elevators, and the service were all amazing.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome place, Awesome views of Chicago River and city views, Extremely quality items in the room, this place is a must.
text: Awesome place, Awesome views of Chicago River and city views, Extremely quality items in the room, this place is a must. Great food , close to everything, millenium park , famous stores iconic place, the rooftop‚Ä¶ breathtaking.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing hotel
text: My boyfriend and I stayed at London House over the weekend and Wow is an understatement.  We were helped by Paloma P, who made our experience one that we will always remember. Our bellhop Emilio G was beyond helpful since the moment we checked in, he was very helpful and polite and brought us extra waters to our room. We hung out at the lobby bar on Friday night and our bartender was very nice and made delicious old fashioned's. The view from our room was perfect and quite romantic, although it was very busy on the street, the outside noise could not be heard.  Thank you for a wonderful stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Stunning Location for Vow Renewal
text: We had our vow renewal this September at the London House Cupola and this is hands down one of the most stunning locations in Chicago to do so. The team was extremely organized. Manny is one of the most organized individuals I know and was there to support and execute our event every step of the way. Highly recommend for future events. One of a kind location and superb team.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chaos
text: Great location. If you are lucky you will get the best views of the city. Other than the spectacular view the room was nice; small and clean. We were early for checkin and when we asked if we could wait in lobby bar, staff had ‚Äòno idea‚Äô if it was open. As a resident of this hotel, expect to pay 4-5 star prices for a 3 star service. The hotel is popular for weddings so expect chaos at the elevator daily and long queues to the reception desk. The 21st floor restaurant is booked out weeks (upon weeks) in advance. You can enjoy a drink on the 22nd floor terrace but expect to stand at the bar as all tables are reserved (despite being told there are no reservations for the bar).
