Lastly we had a very unfortunate experience on the rooftop bar. We found a table that was not reserved. There were no staff around so we asked the patrons around us and none of the other people there had reserved their table. So we assumed it was ok and sat down. At one point we found  a gentleman working there and asked if there was table service. He advised that he did not know as it looked like it may rain (?) and staff were sent downstairs.  We made use of the bar and brought the drinks back to our table. At one point a waitress appeared and literally took a seat from behind one of the ladies in our party. When I asked why she said ‚Äòyou have been using the bar and do not have a reservation‚Äô. Privately,  my partner asked her why our table in particular had been targeted, she advised it was because we did not ask for table service. Note earlier we had been advised it may not be available. I usually feel that as a resident in a hotel you are the highest priority, not the case in this hotel unfortunately. The porters in this hotel are the only positive service experience I had with hotel staff.  Chicago is a wonderful, vibrant city; if you expect a friendly haven after hectic days of sightseeing/shopping, choose your hotel carefully.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Hands down Best Hotel in Chicago!!!
text: Location, location, location:) cleanliness, friendly staff. Had a great breakfast in hotel restaurant.Best view of the city from the rooms and rooftop bar!! Would definitely stay here again while in Chicago

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fabulous birthday weekend at London House!
text: We are Hilton members and never have stayed at LondonHouse so tried it out for my birthday weekend. Staff was very friendly everywhere. Our room was clean, smelled nice, was spacious, had upgraded items like nice drinking glasses and a Nespresso machine and a luffa in the bathroom! Room had a river view, was lovely! The location literally cant be beat right off Michigan ave! We got breakfast at the restaurant in hotel and it was great! For sure will return!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel!
text: Everything from the room to the entire hotel staff was fantastic - would highly recommend! The manager, Matthew was very accommodating from check in to check out. Made our stay very comfortable and easy as we were there.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Not what it wants to be‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.
text: The LondonHouse wants to be a top end hotel. It‚Äôs just not there. It begins at the entrance, which is narrow, always jammed. Post-Covid the lobby has a neglected air to it.  Not a good foot forward.  The rooms are incredibly small and to make up for it the drawers are under the bed. Street noise is pretty loud despite good windows ‚Äî not their fault ‚Äî because cars and motorcycles without mufflers race up and down all night. Then there‚Äôs the ambulance sirens.  Not a restful spot. Never mind trying to get a reservation at the rooftop bar. Thanks to revelers the hotel has a rough edge on weekends.Hilton seems to have abandoned the business class hotel market in Chicago.  Homewood Suites and Hampton‚Äôs abound. On the upper end the Waldorf is great but expensive and the Hilton Chicago is old. The Conrad, which fit neatly between the two remains shut with opening scuttled at least twice.  I won‚Äôt be at a Hilton property when I return in two weeks.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The BEST hotel in the city!
text: I absolutely love this place. It‚Äôs always where I call home when I visit the city which is often. Matthew, the manager, is absolutely amazing and goes above and beyond for me each time. I am recognized by him when I visit. I always hate leaving. I‚Äôll be back though! Rooms are wonderful! Love the decor of the entire place! If I could, I‚Äôd live here!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location!
text: We really enjoyed our stay over the weekend ! Ask for a view of the river fantastic! The location is great and the restaurant at the hotel,for breakfast is fantastic! The bellman Mark was fabulous and so helpful he secured us a private car to the airport which actually saved us $$$ because ubers can be pricey!the lobby is very pretty. The rooftop bar has fantastic views!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LH Engagement
text: Our experience at the LondonHouse was exceptional from beginning to end. Manny helps me plan and pull off a dream proposal for my fiancee. The Hotel is gorgeous and they accommodated us earlier (thanks to manny and staff) for us to be able to get ready. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Londonhouse Cupola Proposal
text: Our experience at the Londonhouse was amazing from start to finish. From the very beginning, Manny was there to help plan and pull off the proposal. The Cupola was decorated and set up perfectly. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing view
text: The staff was kind and helpful from the valet to hotel check in. Rooms are amazing and bed is super comfortable slept like a baby. Will definitely be staying here again. The view of the city and river at night is gorgeous

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great value
text: This was definitely one of the nicest hotels I‚Äôve stayed at with a great view of the river. All staff was courteous. Would definitely recommend especially for it‚Äôs proximity to so many things in the city and the river!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location! Excellent Customer Service! Very friendly and professional!
text: Great Location! Excellent Customer Service! Very Clean Hotel and room! Room Dining Service was fast! Food was very delicious! Very comfortable bed and pillows! We enjoyed to stay there! Thank You for Great Service!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing experience
text: It was amazing !! I love the rooftop !! The room was beautiful and the customer service was exquisite . The lobby bar is very nice and the concierge service is top notch . It‚Äôs 3-4  restaurants on-site.  I will absolutely stay at this hotel again !

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Proposal & Rooftop Dinner
text: Manny (LondonHouse) helped me organize an amazing rooftop proposal in the famous cupola with a rooftop dinner right afterwards. If you're looking for a wow in downtown Chicago, this is it. Great to work with, excellent execution, and wonderful food. Will definitely be visiting LH21 & LH22 when we are back in town.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful place to stay
text: What a wonderful experience. Beautiful and historic environment. Cleaning service was definitely on point and the staff was extremely professional, helpful and friendly. Perfect location if you‚Äôre visiting the city. I would definitely stay here again. The rooftop view is beautiful and it has a really cool vibe.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: It was amazing
text: Everything about the stay was perfect. This is the best hotel in the city. I couldn‚Äôt imagine a better location in Chicago and all the staff members were very nice and helpful. All my future trips here will likely be spent at the LondonHouse.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Family trip
text: We enjoyed our stay . Hotel is beautiful , location is awesome and convenient . Our room is clean and comfortable with breathtaking view. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a fabulous vacation spot in Chicago

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Sophisticated and  beautiful
text: Had an awesome company meeting with beautiful conference rooms, balcony, and service. This modern amenities  hotel is tech savvy, beautiful, and centrally located in middle of downtown Michigan Avenue which provides easy access to the river, restaurants,  shopping, and fun. Phenomenal  restaurants of ocean prime onsite..

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent location, design, and service make for an amazing stay!
text: I had an amazing stay at London House. The excellent location is both exciting and convenient. The overall design esthetic successfully integrates classic and modern elements with current technology. I relaxed with well-curated food and beverage choices in the lobby lounge, and enjoyed the friendly service with which they were served. Above all, Nicole T's efficient welcome at the front desk and engaged followup gave a congenial face to the organization and let me know I was a valued guest.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Terrific stay at Londonhouse
text: We had a terrific two night stay in room 917. I usually find something to call out on the negative side, but this hotel was just about flawless.Ridiculously clean and comfortable roomMinimal noise disruptions in the roomFantastic viewStaff we encountered were top notch (Front desk, housekeeping, valet)Great location - convenient to dining, shopping, tourist attractions etc.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The Most Well-Appointed Room in the World
text: We have stayed at hundreds of hotels while vacationing over several decades but never stayed in such a beautiful room.  The bed linens were heavenly; the bathroom was beautiful (how often does one get excited by hotel bathrooms?); the room size was quite sufficient; the location at Wacker and Michigan was to die for.  The bellhop who checked out bags was funny.  Normally, I would deduct for the tv remove not working (batteries dead, I guess), the in-room phone not working, and the shower wand switch being missing but the beauty of the room decor made up for the errors.  We got this room for around $150+ on Priceline so I'm fairly certain it's at least double that normally.  I hope we can stay there again when we are next in ChiTown.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nice hotel
text: This was my first time staying at Londonhouse and it was a very comfy and nice hotel. During check in, the receptionist Nicole T, was very sweet and accommodating as she always is. I met her when checking into Swissotel maybe 2 years ago and her spirit remained the same at LondonHouse. She was pleasant and gave me a room with an amazing view so my son could look out the window. Because of her I‚Äôll be sure to go back to LondonHouse and stay. Thank you Nicole!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wedding Proposal
text: Manny A. from the Londonhouse in Chicago was outstanding. He laid out the exact times and steps leading up to the engagement and made sure the moment was more than special. I was extremely impressed with the entire setup and very thankful for Manny for making it all happen!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful spot in the city.
text: We loved our stay at the LondonHouse. It was comfortable, clean and we felt safe. Perfect place to stay in the heart of Chicago. Central to so many things. We did not try any of the restaurants, though next time we will. We did manage to get a drink at the rooftop bar but didn't stay long since it was so crowded and we couldn't get a table. But the view was amazing. Def make reservations far in advance for the rooftop. Only downside was no pool, but we were fine without one.Will stay here again and highly recommend!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Such a memorable trip!
text: This was my first time staying in this hotel, and it was beautiful!  I was on the 17th floor, and I had such a great view of Chicago.  The hotel is in such a central area, so it was very easy to walk to everywhere around the city.  The staff was so caring, and the overall experience was perfect.  There were many food locations with good meals and drinks, stores to shop at, and fun entertainment nearby.  We went during the week of Lollapalooza, and it was such an amazing experience.  I highly recommend kayaking the river and going on the glass ledge 1,300 ft. up in the Willis Tower!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic!
text: I had a great stay at Londonhouse. I was in a North facing room, which I highly recommend. I loved the location and beauty of the space. The gym was fantastic! I did order room service one evening and the burger was great. I loved the whole stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: My new go-to hotel when staying in Chicago!
text: Everything about this hotel was fantastic! When we arrived, we were struck by the beauty of the building itself, inside and out. Our check-in was great, our wonderful agent recommended a room upgrade that ended up being large and with a great view of the river. The amenities in the room were fantastic, perfect for a 5 day stay. We really made use of the concierge, who gave us great recommendations for dining and "touristy" attractions. The location really ended up being perfect, easily within walking distance of nearly everything we wanted to do. A great experience, we'll definitely be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing experience - Cupola engagement
text: From the hotel property, location, and staff the experience was wonderful all around. Manny and the hotel staff were not only extremely professional and polite but worked hard to manage all requests and the experience to perfection!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect Wedding - the Cupola
text: My now-husband and I eloped at the London House in the Cupola, which does 1 hour rentals. It was perfect - it felt grand and special, and had amazing views. Truly so memorable with amazing photo opps. Manny was fantastic setting everything up - and the hotel overall was great -- good food and drinks, good views, etc. Highly recommend!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Engagement
text: Everyone did such a great job making our evening so special. Manny and the rest of his crew were very professional and enthusiastic and made for a wonderful evening. The setting, the food, the interactions were all nothing short of magical.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The bachelorette weekend
text: The London house has beautiful views of the city and the skyline of Chicago and really great customer service I was helped by Bass and Jesse checking in they went above and beyond. I had one small issue with my billing which I was able to get corrected by calling the customer service. Also Mary the concierge I was very helpful in making my weekend very special. The views are amazing also the bellboys Alonzo was outstanding and very kind.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful experience at the London House Hilton!
text: This is a wonderful hotel! We had booked the room for 2 nights but decided to stay another night. We were able to do this without changing rooms. It is located in close proximity to restaurants and everything you want to see in Chicago!! We‚Äôll stay here again on our next visit to the Windy City!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Location and views are top notch.
text: I am staying here right now.  The view of the city from the room is pretty impeccable.  There are robes and slippers in the closet and more elevators than ever needed to make travel inside comfortable.  Location is convenient to most places downtown and if you drive in there is valet available.  It is $75 a night, but it‚Äôs available.  I will check out the rooftop bar before I leave.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great staff and service! Amazing stay!!
text: We stayed here past weekend after our wedding and the stay was incredible! The staff was super attentive and responsive. Every team member we came across was friendly and inquired about our stay. We requested few items in duration of our stay and all of our requests were delivered in timely manner. I want to mention few employees that went above and beyond which made our stay memorable. Paloma, Mark, Corey and Alonzo were phenomenal. Thank you for a great stay, we will be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay
text: We stayed here for four nights as part of a Chicago vacation. Hotel is perfectly positioned to walk to the main tourist attractions. I will say for anyone with a Trump sensibility that it is located right opposite Trump tower with his name written in HUGE letters on the front. So any river facing rooms actually face the tower head-on and that is your view with the river off to the left. Not worth the upgrade money if you‚Äôd prefer not to see that. We switched to a city room which is a view of other buildings and still some river view. Staff are great. Beds are very, very  comfortable. Rooms are quiet and spotlessly clean. Bathroom could be more private due to a sliding door. I‚Äôd like to see the hotel instigate some eco-friendly steps as right now there is seemingly nothing happening with that. Overall very happy with our stay and would recommend this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Stay here, you won‚Äôt regret it!
text: Wow, this place is top notch! We had booked last minute as it was my friends 30th birthday and she wanted to stay here before checking into our Airbnb for the weekend. I almost wish we hadn‚Äôt booked an Airbnb! Walking in feels like you are in the Great Gatsby with the architecture and decor. Then you are greeted by the most amazing, friendly, and accommodating front desk staff. Nicole gave us a beautiful room on the River (pictures below of view) and kindly let us know to check out the rooftop. She was super personable and gave us so many suggestions of what we could do around the city. We throughly enjoyed the cleanliness and overall experience of this hotel. I will be coming back and recommending it to anyone I can. Do not stay anywhere else!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal at the Cupola
text: I proposed to my girlfriend at the Cupola and the service was excellent! The staff ensured my family, photographers and the musician were in place prior to arrival and helped make this such a special day! The only thing I had to worry about was getting there on time. 10/10 recommend this as a proposal spot!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Proposal
text: All I can say is WOW! When I looked into this place for a proposal I didn‚Äôt expect what I was getting! Manny made the process so easy! The beautiful views are unbeatable and gave me and my fianc√© memories that will last us a lifetime!A huge thank you again to the London house staff who created this special moment and made everything so smooth!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing as you are in your home
text: Nice hotel with nice location and clean rooms and lobby Highly professional and kind staff specially Mr ken and Mr mathiow and Ms saif and Ms yasicka in front desk and special thanks for all of them specially Mr ken and Mr mathiow also thanks for allenso in luggage assistance for his kindness and support

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Exceptional Hotel!
text: WOW! What a wonderful experience it was staying at the London House hotel. From the moment we arrived until check out it exceeded our expectations. Beautiful building, the best location, friendly staff, great attention to detail, designer decor, lots of dining options. Everyone went out of their way to pamper us. A special shout out to Jeovanny, house keeping manager. I forgot a pair of shoes in my guest room and he rose to the occasion, went out of his way to locate them and quickly expedited them to my home. He has an amazing attitude and a true desire to provide superior customer service.There is no way we would ever consider staying anywhere else when visiting Chicago and I have already recommended it to friends and family.This positive experience has motivated us to switch our hotel loyality from another major chain to Hilton hotels. Thank you London House!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House‚Äîa wonderful treat!
text: We truly enjoyed our stay at the London House in Chicago. What a great place to land and be centrally located to all the things we wanted to see and do in Chicago. Paloma at the front desk went above and beyond to give us excellent customer service when we needed to change our room. Ashley at the lobby bar gave us great service while we relaxed in the afternoon drinking great wine, eating delicious food, and enjoying a wonderful cappuccino.  Lastly, Mark, the bellman, greeted us every day with an extra friendly smile and hospitable conversation as well as great customer service. We will definitely be back and would recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to treat themselves.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great view, great location, rooftop bar
text: My daughter and I stayed here while visiting colleges in the Chicago area. We arrived early evening after driving for 3 hours and felt incredibly under-dressed for the crowd visiting the restaurant. We tried to reserve a table at the rooftop restaurant, but it was supposedly booked. However, when we visited the rooftop bar, there was no one dining below at the restaurant. That was odd. Our two double room was spacious enough and had everything we needed. The view of the river was nice, although marred by the large "Trump" sign opposite us. The elevators are multiple and fast! The hotel is just a block away from Michigan Avenue if you're into shopping. We had dinner at an Irish pub a block away - there weren't a lot of close restaurant choices nearby, but the pub was good. It was a little price, but it is on the river. You can save $100 bucks or so a night by staying a few blocks away. But my daughter had never stayed on the river and really enjoyed the vibe. If you can't get a reservation, just go hang out at the bar a bit.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Good location Good staff Great Rooms
text: My first time to Chicago and the London House. Stayed for a week and would stay again. Loved the whole lay out of the hoteland the vibe. All the staff were customer service focused. I had a couple issues that i brought to the guest services managers attention (Alex) and he was very apologetic and took charges off my bill. The rooftop bar wasnt open the couple times i went up but both times i got drinks from the bar on the 21st floor and walked up one flight to enjoy the view. Love the openess of lobby with tables and couches where you can work ..relax..order drinks or food. Easy to catch cabs or rideshares in front. Next door is Corner Bakery if you want a bite for less $. My first night i had a martini in the bar for $20!!AND no olives. (epic fail for my first night but Alex addressed this) the room was very modern and well laid out. Beautiful view of the river, decent size bathroom, 60 inch tv, nespresso machine and a fridge. Slept well ,mattress was not too firm or soft and pillows to die for. With a smart elevator you never waited long. In the hall push which floor your going to and the screen tells you go to elevator A..B..C etc. Loved that. Met up with friends at 2 fabulous restaurants that were both less than a 10 min walk: untitled supper club (yes that's the name) and Joes Seafood . The famous Art Institute Museum is about a mile away. Thx London House ill be back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful Stay
text: We stayed here for two nights and wish it could have been longer.  They had renovated at one point and it is very nice with many conveniences.  We had a king vista room and the view of the Chicago River is breathtaking.  The room was very clean and the bathroom was large with a nice shower.  They had a safe in the room, which is a big plus for us.  Check in was quick and convenient.  The lobby is on the second floor and there is a lobby bar there as well,  There is an entrance to Ocean Prime off the lobby as well.  The Corner Baker and Smashburger are both on the first floor level.  Land and Lakes Kitchen is there as well.  We had a drink in the bar on the 21st floor and it was nice.  The rooftop bar one floor above fills up with reservations.  We were able to walk out onto it during the afternoon and it has a great view as well,  Despite the 90 degree heat outside, the AC more than kept up with comfort in the room.  There is a nice TV as well with many channels.  I had not been here since 1968 and love the updating.  It is a definite come back to  hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent All Around
text: Our two night stay was fantastic. I booked through Expedia and got a deal. LOVED our room with a river view. Clean and well appointed. We requested more coffee pods and they were delivered promptly. The staff were all VERY friendly, courteous and professional. We enjoyed cocktails at both the lobby bar and fantastic roof top bar. Walkable to everything! Great views and service all around! Highly recommend!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal was perfect!
text: I worked with Manny to set a private proposal on the rooftop of London House. The entire experience exceeded my expectations and Manny was a pleasure to work with. The proposal was beautiful and I cannot recommend this enough!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal
text: IT WAS AMAZING. Everything was set up and ready to go. Manny was such a delight to work with. Worth every penny.... also she said "yes" so that is a huge bonus :) I would highly recommend anyone who is going to propose to do it here.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel in the heart of everything!
text: Everything at LondonHouse Chicago was top notch, and you really can't beat the location for visiting this city. The rooftop bar offers amazing views with really good drinks. And the rooms are extremely detailed and comfortable, as well as very clean. We would absolutely return to LondonHouse!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: We loved the London House and we‚Äôll be back!
text: From the time we arrived to the time we left, we were amazed at the location and amenities at the London House. A picturesque and architecturally significant building, located at historic Michigan Ave. and Wacker Drives, across the street from the Chicago Riverwalk, within walking distance from restaurants, riverboat tours, shopping, the John Hancock Building, the Navy Pier, with a comfortable lobby, efficient elevators, incredible view down the River, wonderful rooftop bar/cafe, excellent clean rooms and great service. Best of all, for me, was the well equipped fitness center. It was more than an afterthought housed in a broom closet. We will be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal
text: I had my proposal (P&N) in May 14th at LondonHouse. I proposed to love of my life and It was such a unique stunning event at LH. Manny, the plan coordinator went above and beyond to make this day more special. He‚Äôs such an awesome guy. Everything was perfect and on point. The decor set up was great, exactly the way I wanted. LH is very signature of chicago where you have magnificent view of lake, river as well as amazing architecture of Chicago. I reserved the rooftop with Cupola to propose my girl, and should I enjoyed every second of it at LondonHouse. We never forget this special day at London House. Highly recommend. Manny is the best!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel, great location
text: Great location to walk to many sites including Millennium Park, Art Institute, the Loop and the Magnificent Mile. Table service breakfast was included with our stay due to status. Rooftop bar was fine.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Honeymoon perfection
text: The moment we walked in we felt welcomed.  Arturo checked us in and was so kind.  We stayed for a few nights and every time we came back in we were welcomed with a genuine smile.  The breakfasts at Land and Lake were great and dinner at Ocean Prime was one of the most memorable.  We were unable to get to the rooftop due to our schedule. We did get a couples massage which was so relaxing and much needed after all the walking around the city:)  We plan on coming back every year for our anniversaries.  The location is awesome; cross the street to the river walk, walk to Navy Pier, Michigan Ave, House of Blues, etc.  We were checked out by NIcole who was again so professional and kind.  Thank you Londonhouse!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Impeccable
text: The view from the room/bathroom was mind-blowing . The room is spacious and the bed very comfy. Great service . Within a stone's throw from almost everything . The rooftop deserves a stop though the menu of food and drinks is nothing special

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location
text: Checked in on a Saturday and was overwhelmed by the amount of people in the lobby.  It‚Äôs a popular place for the rooftop bar.  After Saturday, the hotel was pleasant.  The staff at the hotel was extremely helpful.  The area in front of the hotel is very busy and always seems to have cars parked in front of the hotel which makes it difficult to catch a cab.  Cell reception in front of the hotel is not very good so use your phone in the hotel before stepping out to get directions.  We found the L metro system to be the best way to get around and it‚Äôs not very far from the hotel.  We had the standard room with two beds and switched to the upgraded room with two beds.  If more than 2 people in your room, I highly recommend the larger upgraded room.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House Proposal
text: My fianc√© and I recently got engaged at the London House Cupola and it was a dream come true. The cupola architecture combined with breathtaking views of Chicago made for an unbelievable experience. London House Cupola coordinator Manny Aganon worked with me to tailor the experience by securing musicians to perform during the proposal as well as an A+ photographer. The proposal also included a rose petal entry to the Cupola and a bottle of champagne to celebrate afterwards. Manny coordinated between all parties involved and built out the itinerary down to the minute to ensure a seamless proposal. After the proposal we were able to celebrate with our friends in the beautiful London House rooftop bar. I could not have asked for a better proposal and highly recommend this experience for someone looking for an unforgettable Chicago proposal.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Historic building, modern hotel with great service.
text: Very sleek hotel with two nice bars and a restaurant. The room was well appointed with a really nice river view, spacious bathroom, and comfortable beds. The customer service was excellent, and Bess especially took care of us! Highly recommend.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal
text: Five stars all around! Surprise proposal was great with the team knocking it out of the park with the planning and execution! Huge thank you to Manny and the team! Can‚Äôt wait to come back to visit both the hotel and the city!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Restaurant and rooftop bar
text: We had a reservation for the rooftop bar but unfortunately, it was raining so they asked if we wanted to switch the reservation to the indoor restaurant. We did.Restaurant was very chic and cozy. We first were seated at a intimate seating area for drinks then when we asked to be moved to a table for dining, a manager came quickly over to offer and set up a table for us. The cocktails and the food were both delicious. The waitstaff was prompt and courteous. Afterwards, we went up to the rooftop bar (rain subsided a little) and loved it. The view of the city was phenomenal!! We will definitely go back!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful view. Ok room
text: Loved the view and the lobby. There was some trash that was left on the floor and one of the lights in the bathroom did not work. There seemed to also be some stains on the carpet. Very nice staff. Awesome view.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Londonhouse Proposal
text: Manny was extremely helpful throughout this whole process. He was very informative and responsive. I would definitely recommend his event planning services to anyone who is looking to have a romantic and special proposal.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Dream Come True Wedding
text: Our dream wedding became a reality because of the LondonHouse Chicago. This truly gorgeous venue is the absolute perfect place to hold your wedding and reception of any size. I cannot emphasize enough how beautiful and unique the hotel is. Some hotel ballrooms can be sterile or stuffy, but at the LondonHouse, the Juliette Ballroom is romantic and makes you feel like you are in the heart of the city. The view of the Chicago River and the city's skyline is stunningly framed in the ballroom's floor to ceiling windows, giving our wedding the true Chicago glitz and one of a kind view. The staff at the LondonHouse went above and beyond the call of duty on so many occasions throughout the planning process. Steve took so much stress out of planning a wedding during pandemic, and was patient and accommodating with all of our questions and concerns, putting us at ease every step of the way. He was incredible full stop. Emails and phone calls were always answered in under 24 hours, and his attention to detail eliminated any stress that one could experience when planning a wedding. The professionalism of the hotel staff as a whole was impressive as well. All of our guests commented on how beautiful the hotel was as well as how friendly and helpful the staff was. Our guests were also impressed by the quality and delightfulness of the food served at our reception, it was delicious and the chefs deserve the highest of compliments for their delectable creations during the cocktail hour and dinner courses. Our dream wedding was made possible by Steve and his staff at the LondonHouse, and we will always be appreciative and thankful for the once in a  lifetime experience they gave us. If you're looking for the perfect Chicago venue, look no further than Steve and the LondonHouse.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Feedback
text: We really love coming to this place every year, never disappoints.All my family and close friends we meet here few times a year for very special occasions and days.All was completely fav nothing bad to say, we will be coming back hopefully next year with less travel restrictions.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Chicago IL, July 2021
text: Writing this review, July 4th, 2021.I had multiple mishaps (for those who do not travel often, there is usually a MAJOR difference between ‚Äòreservations‚Äô and what is actually happening within that location.)  Reservations promised me a king suite with a pull-out sofa. When I showed up at the location, that was not the case (it was just a solo king)) obviously that didn‚Äôt work!! Heading to the counter, Bess you was there to greet me! Bess hooked me up with a double unit‚ÄîI was accepting of this flexibility! Sadly, that was only good for 1 night. On the next day, I was transferred to the work of Grace‚Äîmanger on duty at the time‚Äîwho was there; there was some hiccups between ‚Äòreservations promises‚Äô, and what they had to offer. Grace worker diligently to rectify this miscommunication!! She was able to cross-tie my original reservation to one that accommodated multiple parties!!! I was thrilled!! [I later learned that Grace was moving from this location to a different establishment!!!]Grace took amazing care of us. We went downstairs to the Land @ Lake Kitchen for breakfast. There we meet Sergio. To this moment; I do not know if Sergio is still working there‚Äîbut if he is, it is still worth the wait to make sure he takes care of you!! Between the culinary genius which is in the kitchen, and the attentive customer centric wait/staff that is taking care of you‚Äî‚ÄòSergio‚Äô is the perfect mesh! The blend between cuisine and service is married beautifully between Sergio and Chef! It‚Äôs a shame the London House is loosing out on Grace at the counter, but I hope to all those who are reading this that Sergio is still there!I am excepting of my experience‚Äîand hope all receive the same, or better!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay
text: Visited for a family wedding. Everything  was as hoped for. The staff was fantastic even to the point of helping fix my wife's  broken glasses.  Our view from the 14th floor was beautiful despite looking at a large Trump sign. The wedding venue was one of the best for the food to the service. Check in and out was easy and professional. Mybonly negative was waiting on the phone for over an hour when I called Hilton with a question. I have never had that happen before.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: WOW!!! Beautiful Hotel - Great Location & Staff! - Sparkling Clean!
text: My bf and I stayed for five days and all I can say is .... WOW!!!! We lucked out and got a corner room with a river view, and it was gorgeous. The room was so clean and beautiful, we looked forward to coming back after sight-seeing each day. The staff at this hotel could not have been nicer or more welcoming - from the doormen out front to the front desk to the hard-working housekeeping team. The location is exceptional, especially for first time visitors like ourselves. Everything was sparkling clean. The rooftop deck is beautiful for a nice cocktail but make a reservation well in advance for this. Five stars all the way!!!!! Thank you, London House!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wedding
text: Awesome venue great staff and food would recommend the venue to anyone! Brunch on Sunday was amazing and the view breathtaking!!! Most comfortable beds ever!! Called for pillows and blankets fir pull out were there within minutes!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful accommodation!
text: My fianc√© and I had a wonderful time at the LondonHouse in Chicago. We‚Äôd never been to Chicago before and the spot was central to everything we wanted to experience. We were greeted at the  front desk by Ken who was very pleasant and gave us great advice/directions on things to do. Ken and the rest of the staff were incredibly accommodating!The hotel itself is gorgeous and the rooftop bar is a must. Would suggest to put in a reservation in advance because it‚Äôs very busy. Again, the location is right near all the big ticket items if you‚Äôre looking to tour Chicago. Great experience, would recommend!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location
text: Lovely hotel!  Great location!  Very helpful and friendly staff!  The only reason I didn't give a 5 rating is because of the difficulty being able to use the bar at the top of the building!  We asked about making a reservation but said that it was full for the next few weeks.  The gal said that we could wait for a few hours and they MAY be able to get us a spot at some point!  Who wants to just wait around?  I really think that they should have some type of special area of the bar reserved for hotel guests.  One employee told us that our room key would get us to the front of the line, but that was incorrect.  We never did make it up to the bar.  Very disappointed.  Other than that, it was a wonderful stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel and location
text: Hotel has a great location. Nice amenities including good restaurants and fantastic rooftop bar. Need better coffee choices though. Only a Nespresso machine in the room and nothing in the lobby in the morning.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful hotel in the perfect location
text: Recently stayed 4 days and from check-in to check-out it was a great experience! I loved being able to pull up right in front of the hotel and the valet helped with bags and took care of the car ... yes, the parking is expensive, but it is everywhere in downtown Chicago, so I am happy to pay for the convenience they provided. Arturo was super nice at check-in and provided all kinds of great info. The room was comfortable and spacious with central air that kept us the perfect temp. The bathroom was big and modern with plenty of towels and amenities. Both room and bathroom were incredibly clean. The location was perfect and we were able to walk to everywhere we wanted to go, even our 12 and 9 year old kids loved the central location (we never took the car out until it was time to drive home!). Will definitely stay again. Side note: the rooftop lounge is overrated.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent roof deck
text: Room and bathroom were spacious and conveniently organized. Elevators a bit on the slow side, but not crowded. The roof deck is outstanding. Rooms on the front feature a view of the river, but most also face a shiny tall building featuring large letters that spell out the name of a certain reality television star. We chose a room at the back of the building. Nice windows with lots of light.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel in superb location
text: My stay for a quick solo Chicago trip was enhanced by a stay at London House. After some deal searching I was able to score a corner suite for less than the cost of a standard double and it was worth the time and scouring for the upgrade. Hotel location is good though Main Street rooms can get a bit noisy at night. But it‚Äôs the city. You need to just go in knowing this. Corner suite was lovely filled with tall windows that all opened a bit for some fresh air. The tv was absolutely massive in front of the bed though. The bathroom was very large and shower was excellent in temperature and pressure. Amenities in bathroom smelled great and included a shower poof and ‚Äîladies, get this- a hair tie too! (I cannot stress how often we long-haired people are searching for a hair tie.)All windows had two sets of shades: one light filtering and one blackout. The windows are extraordinarily tall so having these motorized would have been nice. Also the bathroom needs something other than all shade or nothing. It‚Äôs the only one without a sheet curtain which is odd because that‚Äôs perfect for daytime. The entire hotel smells good. Excellent scent that isn‚Äôt overpowering but sets a nice tone. This is continued through the use of quality bathroom products. My only one real gripe is that the heating/ A/C is unforgivably loud. Ridiculously loud. Turned-it-off-and-lived-with-sweating-in-June loud. (And then promptly cranked it to 65 anytime I left the room.)For reference this hotel is about 1.3 miles from Union Station ($10-15 ride share) and is steps away from Michigan Ave, Tribune building and some other hot spots.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal
text: Manny was incredible through the entire process. Setup was beautiful and proposal went flawlessly. Would absolutely recommend to anyone as a perfect engagement spot in the city! Couldn‚Äôt be happier with how things went!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal Was Unbelievable!
text: Manny did a great job coordinating our proposal! Every detail was taken care of to perfection! Lindsay, our photographer, did an amazing job as well.Highly recommend the London House for proposals. The view is beautiful and the food is incredible!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Depending on who answers the phone‚Ä¶.
text: [UPDATED REVIEW] I have Included most of my original review below for reference but a few updates I wanted to make to  my review now that I have left the hotel. Paloma (manager): 5 out of 5Front desk: 2 out of 5 Housekeeping: 0 out of 5Location: 5 out of 5 Or who Is sent up to your roomÔøº, this is a 5 star or 1 star hotel. My final rating was a compromise between the twoIn terms of location and cleanliness, this is definitely 5 stars. You are right across from the Riverwalk, close to Millennium Park  and the views from the suite are impressive. Tons of restaurants and shopping within walking distanceNow back to the customer service issue. To say it‚Äôs ‚Äúhit or miss‚Äù is an understatement of the century. Some examples:1) I called the front desk the first night and ask them to pull out the sofa bed and have it prepared for children. (Ie put down sheets and pillows etc. I have requested this several times at other hotels and never had an issueÔøºThe person who answered the phone asked if the bed was ‚Äústuck‚Äù and I said no, I just needed someone to come and pull out the bed and put sheets and pillowcases down while we were out. He replied Ôøºthat was not possible given Covid but they could leave the sheets and pillows outside. Although I was frustrated I said fine and hung up. Then I recalled that I requested daily housekeeping services and inevitably someone will have to come to the room to turn down the bed, change out sheets etc. and obviously Covid was not preventing that. I called back and presented this information to a different representative and she said ‚Äú of course we can help with that ‚Äú and she took care of it.2) That same night I called the front desk and said we were having issues with their air-conditioning specifically there was no ventilation in the entry room and the AC was blowing hot air above 67¬∞Ôøº. The technician who came up basically said there was nothing he could do for us and the only thing to do was to leave the bedroom door open to let airflow through the suite. The next day the situation became even worse and anytime we tried to set the thermostat above 65 we got hot air blowing into the room. I called and another technician came up And I told him the previous technician said he could not do anything for us. He quickly adjusted some settings and vents and miraculously the problem was fixed.3) i called the Front desk And requested to borrow a pair of scissors and was told that I would have to come down to the front desk because ‚Äúno one was available to bring it up‚Äù. I‚Äôve traveled to over 50 countries and stayed at some of the nicest and most expensive hotels in the world and everything in between and never heard of such nonsense. At the very worst I‚Äôve been told that it may take a while or someone will be up as soon as possible but never been told that they simply can‚Äôt send someone upÔøº.Another issue that I ran into was depending on what time you call you could be waiting 10‚Äôor 20 or 30 minutes or longer until someone actually picks up at the front desk. Sometimes there‚Äôs just an automated voice prompt that says they‚Äôre too busy to take your call and the call disconnects. again having stayed at many many hotels all over the world I‚Äôve never encountered thisÔøº phenomenon.If not for the issues with customer service or lack there of this would definitely be a five star establishment all the way. Some of the personnel in this hotel needs to be terminated immediately because they definitely in the wrong profession if answering questions are providing assistance is an inconvenience or annoyance.Another issue which other reviewer‚Äôs have mentioned is there is a large amount of foot traffic through the hotel and entrance to the elevators due to the Numerous restaurants and bars surrounding the hotel. On numerous occasions we passed drunk or puking bar patrons or dogs taking a dump on the carpet right outside the hotel entrance. There is another entrance to the hotel which seems to bypass a lot of this ‚Äúoutside‚Äù foot traffic but inexplicably it is closedPaloma, Who I believe is a front desk supervisor or a manager reached out to me and was very generous with her time and I think attempted to address Several of the issues i raised in my review while I was still at the hotel. Unfortunately many of those things  did not get better but actually got worse. A few examples:1) After a day out we came back to the room and basically half of the room had Not even been touched or cleaned by housekeeping. My mother who was  in a different suite  had similar complaints about the consistency of serviceÔøº  or Complete lack thereof so I know it was not an isolated incident. I immediately called the front desk and ask someone to come by and fix up the room properly once we left and when we returned from dinner they basically had left the blankets and pillows on the bed for us to put down ourselvesÔøº. This was after I specifically requested someone to actually make up the bed and change out the comforter while we were out. This occurred many times during the stay where I would ask housekeeping to come up and actually service the room and they would say they could not since we were in the suite but even after we left nothing was actually serviced it was usually left for us to do ourselves. Never seen this before. 2) I called and asked the front desk if they had a screwdriver I could use and was told that they did not have one I could borrow. The next morning on the way down to breakfast I asked someone at the front desk and they said they had a screwdriver and within two minutes a friendly  engineer came by and helped me for the 10 seconds that I needed. Again just complete lack of consistency in terms of customer service. Paloma And several of the front desk team members were very friendly and helpful but I would say at least 50% of the time the person who answered the phone sounded annoyed or bothered that I was even calling them. I definitely think an overhaul is needed especially for the front desk team and I am just not someone who is anal or Uber picky about things as you can see from the many reviews and the variety of establishments I have stayed out all over the worldÔøºGiven the issues with customer service I would not recommend staying at this establishment and would return to The Gwen which I thoroughly enjoyed during my first visit to Chicago. Thank you Paloma for your efforts.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Cupola Proposal
text: I would highly recommend renting the LondonHouse cupola for a proposal. Manny was extremely helpful, and the whole process went so smoothly. It was great knowing I could leave all of the planning and logistics to him, and have it turn out so great.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Post Wedding Brunch
text: We had a wonderful post wedding brunch at LondonHouse Chicago! Beautiful views from their Etoile room and we really enjoyed sitting out on the balcony to enjoy the great Chicago summer weather.  The food was delicious and staff friendly to all our guests.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing stay
text: My friend is originally from Chicago but I had never visited and we were looking for a great hotel to explore the city which we definitely found in LondonHouse. We had a suite with an amazing view of the river and the view from their Rooftop was even more spectacular. The hotel was in a great location near the Magnificent Mile and close to everything we wanted to see. The room was super comfortable and was also equipped with a Nespresso machine. Mostly we were impressed by the service though. Everyone was very courteous and friendly and when we texted to get more Nespresso capsules, somebody from their team arrived within a couple of minutes and delivered them with a smile.We had a fabulous stay and highly recommend this hotel!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great view but....
text: First off our stay was supposed to be a gift , but the the hotel screwed that up even though the reservation was made by the person who was gifting the night to us, second there was no shower curtain in the bathroom and the toilet paper holder was broken.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very helpful
text: Excellent service. Polite and vey helpful. Recommend for anyone anytime. They just made me feel great. Helped us download the app and get a room then they surprised us with a discounted rate to compensate for the time on the phone that ended with little progress

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Quality Hotel
text: We stayed here on our honeymoon and it was amazing! From the professional and kind staff to the great restaurants and cleanliness throughout the place- everything was great! We would come back in a heartbeat!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel
text: The hotel is gorgeous and the employees are extremely kind and helpful. I wish I would‚Äôve caught the name of the guys that helped us navigate the parking garages because we never would‚Äôve made it without them. The entrance to the downstairs lobby gets quite congested with people just trying to get in the restaurants. Wish guests had a private entrance.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: There‚Äôs probably more welcoming, nice spots to try
text: Okay, felt racially biased, view of Trump Tower was a bummer. Bathroom and shower door don‚Äôt close all the way which made for a coooold shower. I appreciated the spa experience and on-site location very much.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Manny = rockstar -- end of story
text: Manny is a guy you want to work with for your special event, end of story! He's incredibly helpful, kind, hardworking, etc. His attention to detail is unmatched. I cannot say enough good things about him. He made our event 10X more special than we even expected. Huge thank you to Manny!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome service!
text: Beautiful building with nice clean room‚Äôs  and awesome view on the city. Staff was super friendly and helpful. Breakfast was great with a lot of different choices. Definitely going to stay there again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The best hotel in Chicago!
text: The absolute best hotel in Chicago. The best people in Chicago.The best location in Chicago. The best rooftop bar in Chicago. The best leadership team in Chicago. The best city in the United States. I will never forget my stay at LondonHouse! I can‚Äôt wait to visit again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect stay!
text: I loved my stay at London House Chicago.  Our room was beautiful, with a view of the river.  The employees were friendly and helpful and we never had to wait.  The beds and pillows were comfortable.  Everything was very clean.  Perfect location within walking distance to lots of cool places.  Would definitely stay again!  FYI - parking costs $73/day and the hotel puts a $100 additional deposit on your credit card when you check in.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful Hotel
text: Very nice hotel! Staff was very friendly! Beautiful view of the hotel and the strip! I would 100% recommend this place to family and friends! It was an amazing stay in Chicago for the night! It was a great hotel!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A + hotel
text: Our flight arrived early.  We were going to leave our luggage with the staff, however the clerk checked and sent us on up to our room.  This allowed us to clean up and get ready to explore Chicago.   Every one from the clerks, the valets, and wait staff were very courteous and efficient.  We had the floor to ceiling window room which gave a spectacular view of Chicago.   Can't wait to return.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Once in a lifetime experience, world class service.
text: I could not say enough good things about this experience  and the person who made it possible, Manny Aganon. My wife and I booked a photography session atop the cupola and it was absolutely unbelievable. Manny was such a pleasure to work with and took care of every single detail (He even had the bartender give my wife‚Äôs bouqet a cold bath to revitalize the flowers!) The whole session felt like a dream and we could not ever thank Manny, the videographer he helped put us in contact with, and the whole Londonhouse team enough. It truly was a once in a lifetime surreal experience and Manny‚Äôs service was the definition of world class. Would highly recommend!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful stay, beautiful view
text: We had a lovely 2-night stay at the LondonHouse. We loved the view of the river from our room and the convenient location. The room was lovely and clean. The staff was very helpful. Check-in was a breeze. Very happy with our stay and can't wait to return.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best place to stay in Chicago and Ken is the best concierge we‚Äôve ever experienced
text: Perfect place to serve as your base in the great City of Chicago!  Perfect location, great building and great rooms.  But, what really made our visit at this property 5 Star is their Concierge, Ken.  He booked river trips for us, provided great recommendations, always friendly and attentive with a ‚Äúcan do‚Äù attitude.  We had a 10pm plane on our last stay of our 4 night visit and he extended our checkout to 5pm at no charge!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful views and rooftop worth a stay!
text: Amazing rooms with beautiful views of the river and bridges! Perfect location for downtown Chicago. Wonderful staff and services as well as central location to many of the cities hot spots! I did valet and to me it was worth it. Food was great too! I look forward to staying again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London house stay
text: Due to the pandemic my wife and I decided to stay in the city for our anniversary.  I was referred to stay at the Londonhouse by colleagues because of their rooftop and the location to the mag mile. This held to be true but it was the staff being accommodating and professional and the cleanliness of the hotel which will have me visiting again soon.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel in a great Location.
text: Beautiful Hotel with a great location.  We checked in early and were offered an upgrade with a view that was ready.  We took it.  We had a good river view which we enjoyed.  The beds were very comfortable, perhaps a little soft, but pretty good, lots of pillows.  The bathroom was very pretty with a large shower and even a make up mirror.  The room had a Nespresso coffee maker which came with a few pods and also a tea bag to let you know you can just heat water in it also.  Waking up to a nice hot cup of coffee in your room is a real plus for us.  Our room was missing an ice bucket and come cups, but when texted the help number, we were brought the supplies we needed right away.  They had a large TV and it had Chromcast, so we were able to stream movies from services we already had, Netflix and Hulu.The location is wonderful and we were able to walk to the Art Institute, Millennium park, many restaurants and the River Walk was right in front of the hotel.There is a roof top bar that is very popular and they view is nice, but bar is fairly small so very hard to get into.  They do give hotel guest priority, so that was nice.We ate at the restaurant, Land and Lakes two times.  Once for drinks and dinner and then again for breakfast.  Both meals were good but not anything to get too excited about.  On the weekend they always had a wait list, but Sunday evening and Monday day and evening there was not any wait.We would stay here again if in Chicago to do the normal tourist type things.  Great location, ALL the staff was very polite, helpful and nice.  I can‚Äôt say enough nice about this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Incredible experience !
text: I traveled with family and friends, and it was a marvelous experience even before we arrived. Paloma Pina's help was beyond expectations. Let me elaborate: We had a bitter experience with my travel agency (Despegar/Expedia) that decided - unilaterally - to cancel our reservation of our 4 rooms, we were greatly disappointed because we got a really great deal and when we tried to rebook the rooms they wouldn't respect the rate we've got at the beginning, imagine our frustration. Nevertheless, when I reached directly to the hotel, Paloma did some magic and got us even a slightly better rate! This meant the world to us! We can't thank you enough, Paloma. Then when we arrived, even though we arrived around 2am, the check-in was so smooth and fast that we could just run to our beds and get a well deserved rest after a long journey. They even got us the last floor rooms so the view was breathtaking, the icing of the cake. The room and hotel are in mint condition, with everything we needed and the size of the room we thought is more than OK. All our stay was perfect, no problem at all through all our stay, a 10 out of 10 experience. Thank you LondonHouse and even more to you Paloma!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House Proposal
text: Manny was extremely helpful and great to work with through the entire proposal process. He really went above and beyond to accommodate all of my requests and make sure everything went smoothly. The venue is awesome and has unbeatable views of the skyline and river. I would highly recommend for anyone considering doing the proposal package.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Weekend get away
text: Great view of the river in the suite we selected. Enjoyed roof top bar/lounge (inside for cocktails as weather was chilly.  Wish rooftop outside had heaters.  Roof top limited time allowed, even though many open tables (not due to Covid).  Room was clean. Comfortable. Will definitely stay again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Favorite place in city
text: Stayed here again this past week. By far our favorite place to stay in the city. All the staff we came in contact with were helpful and polite. Location is great. Decor and cleanliness is top notch. Love the rooftop bar and the easy access to Ocean Prime. Give this place a try!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best proposal ever!!!
text: I want to say that it was an awesome experience booking the surprise proposal. Manny was very professional and helped me through the whole process from beginning to end. Manny and the staff went above and beyond to make sure our special moment was perfect. They took all the precautions to make our family feel comfortable. After the event Manny put together a private area for dining and the food was great. This was our first time at London House and we will definitely be back to visit in the near future. Thank you for making our proposal a day to remember.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful property
text: Great location great rooms and welcoming checkin staff. Room was beautiful well appointed and clean with a very comfortable bed. Very upscale soap and other toiletries. Location is extremely central and easy to walk to main attractions

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best luxury property with excellent service
text: Great location, close to everything, especially public transportation within walking distance. Staffs are super friendly and helpful. They always smile with good attitude and really to help. Perfect 10!!! Thank you.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Friends get together
text: Lobby used to reminisce - rooms were too small to gather for chats. Land and Lakes service was very good, food was excellent. Was disappointed only brunch was served at lunch as we had eggs for breakfast

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Chicago river views
text: The location of London House is excellent. We were able to walk to a variety of restaurants as well as the architectural boat tour lunch. The staff was very helpful and I would highly recommend this for your next stay in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location
text: It is conveniently located next to many restaurants. The hotel rooms are very nice, and the staff was great at check-in. The restaurant attached is also excellent.  Parking is a bit pricy, though. I'll stay here again for sure.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal
text: Manny and the team at Londonhouse were fantastic to work with and helped create an extremely special moment for my proposal. Everything was professional, and he went above and beyond to make it a great day.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: This Hotel and its Staff Blew Me Away
text: My best friend and I were here for a long weekend (5 days) to celebrate turning thirty. We have reached a point in our lives where paying for a nicer hotel is something we can accommodate, but we were not expecting THIS for what we paid. We had an extremely late arrival time and didn't arrive at the hotel until around 12:30am. Even though we were on West Coast time, we weren't expecting such a delightful check-in experience. We were greeted by a gentleman named Bass (who had the nicest nail beds I have ever seen) who kicked off our stay in the most delightful way. He actually energized me with his delightful energy. Which is a lot to say for an early morning check-in. Bass said we were upgraded to the 1 King Bed Corner Studio and boy do I recommend the upgrade. Even though the room wasn't advertised as a river view (Vista), our room could see the river as well as the lake. It was spacious, came with two robes, and even the bathroom had a view! My only complaint was how many times I took a wrong turn on the way to the room. But that's on me and my horrible sense of direction. We were able to go up to the rooftop on several occasions and were very grateful for the hotel guest priority line. With COVID restrictions, the bar was not packed and it was perfection. The staff was attentive and made great recommendations. The weather was a bit cold for my tastes, but that's cause no one taught me how to layer clothing properly. Thanks mom, dad, and the state of California... The Land & Lake Kitchen was also amazing. Early mornings aren't my friend's thing, so I would go down to order coffee after my workout each morning. They accommodated our unique coffee condiment requests with ease. Each time we ate there, we were delighted. Not a lot of hotels have a restaurant that makes eggs benedict three different ways... We didn't get the chance to eat there for any other meal, but breakfast quickly became my favorite anyway. The Valet team went above and beyond to make us feel welcomed! Each time we walked in or out of the hotel, they made sure to ask us whether there was anything they could do to make our stay better or a simple "Good Afternoon". It truly made us feel appreciated and seen as valued guests. Check-out was a breeze on our final day. Not to be outdone by Bass, the gentleman who bid us farewell was also wonderful. (I didn't get his name because I was a little intoxicated after returning from a baseball game...) But whoever he was, THANK YOU!! Five stars to the LondonHouse Chicago. Y'all made this California girl feel oh so special for her 30th birthday and I cannot wait to make my return to the Windy City just to stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nice experience
text: Stayed here for a long weekend during a friends birthday. The entry way is a little strange because you constantly run into people also trying to go to the rooftop bar. Only one entryway seems to be open to the hotel. The room was really nice, clean and modern. The sheets were immaculately clean and the shower was perfectly scrubbed before our arrival. Only complaint is there is no fan in the bathroom.We had an issue trying to connect our phones to the Chromecast in the TV, but room service sent a tech that solved our problem and that was appreciated. The location is good for being near many of the bars and restaurants in Chicago and not too far from the subway, although not quite there either. It would be nice if they would guarantee guests a trip to the rooftop, but they don't seem to. I saw a woman span on the host upstairs because she couldn't get in and she had paid for a stay at the hotel. It seems like a given to be honest. We paid for Sunday brunch and then were able to check out the rooftop deck for a peek, but it wasn't open...not really sure why.Overall this hotel is pretty nice. It's clean and the staff is professional, but it wasn't the best hotel stay of my life or anything. Good for a quick trip to town.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Proposal Package
text: Manny and the entire team involved in the proposal I planned at the LondonHouse were absolutely incredible. The setup was stunning, the day was planned out to the minute, and the service I got throughout the entire process was top-notch. It was such a special day, and I could not imagine any possible scenario where it would have been more special than at the LondonHouse under the plan Manny helped me execute. The team was also so personable and was truly excited for us - you can tell they love doing this for couples! I'd recommend this proposal package to anyone considering it - it's truly incredible!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel, best location
text: Beautiful hotel, best location to everything! Staff and management went above and beyond to meet any and all needs. Large rooms, beautful water view. Rooftop is amazing, make sure to make a reservation!  Cannot wait to visit again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic Visit!
text: My wife and I had an amazing stay at the LondHouse for a quick weekend away!They stay started with a super helpful Front Desk staff- Grace, Michael, Ken, Paloma, very accommodating to our requests. Then the room when we arrived was stunning. Very clean and comfortable, the view of the city was amazing!  We didn‚Äôt opt in for our room to be cleaned, but whenever we needed anything, Housekeeping delivered it quickly.We had breakfast at Lake & Land, the service and the food were good. It is busy on Saturday and Sunday, so prepare accordingly. We enjoyed a cocktail on the rooftop bar one afternoon. The server was able to recommend amazing cocktails tailored to what we were craving. Great views abs great service!Absolutely amazing stay... top notch service from all of the team. Thank you for making our much needed weekend away amazing.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic stay!
text: Loved every bit of this stay. Felt very clean and safe with Covid. Everyone super helpful and wearing masks. For those with children the actual crib (not pack and play) was greatly appreciated. Convenient bar/restaurant on main floor as well as breakfast spot which was great, too. Awesome location and Lovely stay! Will return!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best hotel experience!
text: Fantastic location! Beautiful view of the river (with the exception of the awful Trump sign). Service was great, Rooftop restaurant and Land & Lake restaurants were exceptional. No complaints, I will definitely stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Home away from home
text: I love this hotel so much. I visit Chicago frequently and this hotel is my typical go to when I spend more than a day in the city. Last few times staff treated me like family. I am a regular, but I‚Äôm impressed that everyone recognized me with a mask on and everything. Grace and Matthew were both very helpful and always a pleasure to see. Check in staff were so nice! Room is amazing. Bed comfortable. Shower is my favorite. Only thing is I like a firm pillow and these are a bit too soft for me but everything else makes up for it. Chromecast on TVs is great. Thanks for being my home when I visit Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: excellent views and amazing staff!
text: London House lived up to its reputation! The staff was very welcoming and helpful.  I was truly impressed by how clean the room was and slept amazing in the bed - it was such a relaxing get away - just what I needed!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: We'll be back!
text: From the moment we walked in, and were greeted by the AGM at the front desk we felt at home. They were so accommodating and helpful. We only stayed 2 nights, but look forward to coming back and staying again when we have more time to explore the city. The rooms were clean, spacious, and we were lucky enough to get a corner room which was very nice. The AGM, I apologize if I spell it wrong Machaiah was so incredibly patient and kind, even giving us some suggestions for dinner spots in the area. And the morning we left, we had breakfast the restaurant downstairs for breakfast and our server, Tara R was so friendly and personable. We enjoyed chatting with her! Great property, with amazing staff. Keep up the good work! And also, location was prime to downtown!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: We will be back!
text: Our room was very nice and clean. The view was gorgeous of the Chicago river and buildings. The rooftop bar was the best I have seen in Chicago. Short walk to shopping and restaurants. We will be back again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Clean and close to many restaurants and downtown.
text: The hotel was clean, close to restaurants and stores for shopping. The gym was nice too. I had a great view and when walking into the city I would cross the river. I would definitely stay there again and recommend it.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Stay
text: I had a great stay overall. However, it was impossible to get to see or even have dinner on the rooftop because it is open to the public and they don‚Äôt prioritize reservations for their own paying guests. Just be sure to book way in advance if you even want to see the rooftop.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hospitality
text: I am usually traveling for work , just started traveling after pandemic. Had a big issue with the room I was provided but the manager Paloma Pina, took good care of the situation to my satisfaction.Overall a pleasant stay and wonderful hospitality!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Much Love for the LondonHouse Chicago!
text: The LondonHouse Chicago is a beautiful property located along the Chicago River. The staff is absolutely FABULOUS! Much love to Paloma, Antoine, and Bess! I typed out a review that TA said was too long. That's how amazing the LondonHouse is! The staff was eager to go above and beyond which is something you don't see much of anymore. Paloma went out of her way to ensure one of our rooms was decorated in celebration of an anniversary one of our group members was celebrating, Bess was willing to assist with an overnight inconvenience, and Antoine anticipated our needs upon arrival after a night out on the town. I would recommend LondonHouse to anyone wanting to experience true Chicago hospitality!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent hotel for business (and personal) travel.
text: The location is excellent. The staff is professional. The experience is consistent stay after stay. I am not a long winded writer but I would bring my wife and family here with no hesitation. The restaurant and bar (Ocean Prime) add to the experience.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Ouch
text: An overrated hotel for no reason, which tells me this hotel hospitality employees didn‚Äôt graduate from top hospitality schools in the US.  Simple things can‚Äôt be done such as reservations for guests inside hotel entertainments cannot be done while outsiders might have the priority, pen inside rooms not available, water bottles are not provided, I also requested no feather in room and my request was completed after I got to the room (not the appropriate hospitality protocol) , valet parking never pick up phone to bring car on time while the charge is 72 dollars a day. I gave generous tips to these valet employees because I realized this issue is management related issues and the little guys have nothing to do with it. This hotel actual star rating should be 3 max. Any 3 stars hotel in LA or Dubai would have better management.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: 10 out of 5 Stars
text: I simply love this hotel.  I have stayed here (and recommended many family and friends stay here) since my first time in 2018.  This place is gorgeous. A few highlights:1) The best location that Chicago has to offer, you can walk to see every major site you want... shopping the Magnificent Mile? CHECK! Want to take a selfie with The Bean? Across the street! Walk down to Navy Pier? Easy Peasy! 2) The rooms are well appointed, and feel richly decorated and styled. 3) The lobby is dramatic and has a top-shelf beautiful bar. 4) My father has limited movement and ability due to his age and health - I have brought him here twice, the hotel made sure that he has an accessible room, that safety measures are in place, and checked in with me (and him) multiple times to ensure that he was comfortable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Favorite Hotel Stay Ever!
text: We absolutely loved this hotels and every employee we encountered before and during our stay! We definitely will be planning a trip back to Chicago and will only stay here! Great location, close to lots of attractions, great views (highly recommend the vista view and upgrading to a higher floor)!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very nice hotel for business trip
