text: Ken the front desk agent was very friendly and accommodating. Helped us with all our requests patiently and warmly. The rooms are very well cleaned and nicely designed. Loved the view from my window. Service was also very fast when we called for amenities to be delivered to our room. Only thing I wish they had are slippers, other than that, no complaints.Valet parking is a little expensive but you get what you pay for: quick response and fast service.Definitely recommend this hotel for business travels.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Save your money
text: My wife and I saved up to spend a night downtown with a river view for our anniversary, and immediately upon arrival it became evident we should have gone anywhere else. We have traveled all over the world and this was by far one of the worst hotel stays we have ever had. After checking in online and paying extra for a king sized bed on an upper floor we were assigned a room with two double beds. This was fixed after returning to the front desk and we were given the room we paid for. The view is the only redeeming factor of this hotel. We made reservations for the rooftop bar for dinner and our server rarely checked back on us, our order was wrong and after waiting for 15 minutes to try and get her attention to fix it we gave up and ate what was given to us. And the prices... $15 for a shot of cassamigos blanco!? When it came time to go to bed our bed sheets were not tucked in, the main tv did not work, and our air conditioner never cooled the room so we had to try and sleep with no blankets and in our own sweat. For the price we paid I cannot recommend this hotel any less. At this price I would never stay here again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful suites and the BEST FOOD in Chicago!
text: The hotel is great but we come mainly for Chef Liz‚Äôs food!! Definitely recommend getting reservations for the rooftop so you can experience her creations! We are never disappointed! The staff is always friendly!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: "Cupola of Love" - an apt description
text: What an amazing experience. I reserved the rooftop cupola to propose to my (now) fianc√© and visited the rooftop restaurant a handful of times during my trip to Chicago. The reservationist, Manny Aganon, was incredibly professional and a joy to work with throughout the planning process and during the proposal at the cupola. The staff at the LondonHouse were incredible as well. The entire engagement was like a dream and I cannot be thankful enough for my time here. If you are in Chicago, check out the rooftop restaurant! Just be sure to make reservations and bring a positive attitude. It is amazing what being a decent human and treating staff with respect can get you. If you're reading this, thanks again Manny from both myself and Rasema!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Work trip
text: The hotel was very nice and the staff wa excellent. The restaurant below  had great dishes and customer service. I stayed one night and it was amazing. I will be returning very soon. My entire team joine me

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Highly recommended
text: This was our first trip to the London House and I can‚Äôt say enough about it. From the cleanliness to the friendliness of staff - this made our vacation smooth and we felt comfortable during our stay. This was a much needed vacation for me being a healthcare worker and family. Thank You again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: What a find...
text: Unique, classy and well-done.   Have stayed here several times and it is always a pleasure.   Love the mix of 1920's historic skyscraper and new modern glass edition.  Within walking distance of just about everything downtown has to offer.   Very nice  complimentary bath products are another plus.  There is almost nothing to dislike about this property.   One tip... if driving download a parking app on your cellphone and use it to find the best priced place to park (but still in close proximity), there will be many good options available.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engagement
text: From the very beginning Manny was kind and helpful. He helped me coordinate a beautiful moment for my now fianc√© and I. It was exactly what I wanted with great organization and attention to detail.  Thank you for helping create an amazing memories and the little details along the way.  Extremely recommended!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Love it here!
text: I always enjoy my stay. Great rooms and beds. The spa is great, and there are plenty of restaurants and things to do near by. Staff always accommodating. Elevators can be busy because they are usually booked up, because it‚Äôs great!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing views, amazing service!
text: We stayed for only one night. Arriving in Chicago early in the morning on a Monday and leaving in the early afternoon on a Tuesday makes it tough to store a vehicle and luggage. However, at London House we were able to store our vehicle and luggage before we even checked in! Free to walk around the city and go to a museum unburdened. The day we checked out we had plans during the day and early afternoon. We were able to leave our car and luggage after checking out; again able to walk the city unburdened.The views are great, the beds are comfortable, and the Nespresso machine is an awesome amenity.Great service and a great stay. We will be back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Better elevator system
text: Property is located in a very perfect location.  everything is nearby you can walk to everything!!  the elevators though that‚Äôs a different story ..they don‚Äôt work .. very slow took about 20 minutes to get down from the seventh floor.. the front desk staff is not knowledgeable of a lot of things. not that friendly either.  other than that everything else was great.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome Stay
text: We had an excellent experience at the London House. My husband and I spent a weekend here for a staycation in one of the Villa rooms and we had so much fun! The views were amazing and the room so comfortable. We loved it!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Daniel Salas
text: The hotel was amazing and 10/10 would recommend to any future people hesitant if the decision to book here. The view is amazing and so is the staff, the area is so close to so many businesses and restaurants it almost made it impossible to save money

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Needed extra room and LondonHouse was ideal
text: Out of town family came to visit and I could not accommodate in my home, so I reserved a room for 2 nights at LondonHouse.  The check-in process was smooth and easy (thanks Ken!) and the room and overall hospitality was stellar.   my guests stayed in the historic part of the building overlooking the Chicago River and the surprise dying of the water for St. Patrick's Day.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London house Proposal
text: Amazing proposal experience! Manny was the best! So accommodating and an amazing experience with an amazing view and great food! This will be a moment in my life time that I will never forget and will stay with us!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: St Patrick‚Äôs Day
text: I decided to pay a little extra for St Patrick‚Äôs Day in Chicago and I wanted an amazing hotel experience to go with it. This hotel did not disappoint. I had the best service and the best views!!!  Amazing!!!  Thank you!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal
text: I proposed to my girlfriend on the rooftop of the London House, Saturday March 13th, 2021 and it was nothing short of perfect! I have Manny to thank for everything. He was professional and prepared for every situation. I called him 1 hour before the planned proposal time with a hiccup in the plan and he calmly fixed it. After I proposed the ring was slightly too big and he even had a ring spacer ready for us. The location was beautiful, but Manny was the star of the show. Couldn‚Äôt recommend the London House and Manny more. We‚Äôll be returning to the London House for our wedding!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: St. Patrick‚Äôs Trip
text: Excellent location for everything In downtown Chicago. Three blocks from Lake station train. Many restaurants nearby and a CVS. Beautiful views from the rooms and roof top bar. Very clean during COVID, service was wonderful, all staff were friendly and prompt. Enjoyed experiencing seeing the river green! Definitely will return for all my upcoming trips to Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great way to celebrate engagement
text: The weekend before our stay at Londonhouse, my fianc√© and I had just gotten engaged. He planned a trip to Chicago for us because it was my hometown and we were going to do some engagement celebrations with our friends. Because our flight was going to come in a little later, I called Londonhouse to inform them of our later check in time and to ask if there was anyway we could have a "river" view. Being that this was my fiance's first time in Chicago, I really wanted to give him great views. Paloma not only upgraded us to a room with a view, but she welcomed us into the vista king suite and left us a handwritten card congratulating our engagement. Next to the card was a bottle of champagne to kick off our weekend celebration. Londonhouse truly made us feel special and we loved our 4 night stay with them. This was one of the few hotels we've stayed at since the pandemic and Londonhouse truly socially distanced their customers/staff and we felt very safe and comfortable the entire stay. 10/10 will come back and recommend to our friends and family that visit the city.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: My best 5 nights in Chicago
text: London house is situated along the riverwalk in a historical Chicago building which under the management of Hilton's curio brand has proven itself to be a beautiful place to stay. In the Vista Suite, I find myself sleeping like a baby in the softest bed, enjoying the black marble aesthetic and two 55 inch TVs for both the bedroom and the suite lounge. Everything is clean, well managed and timely. I have read many reviewers complain like children about the majestic view, but I for one enjoy the view of beautiful Trump tower along with the scene of the serene Chicago river. I found myself admiring the views for longer than I would care to admit. However, the crown goes to the staff, with Ken, Grace, Bess and Saif helping me out. Major shout out to the security team as well who came in promptly to help me in to my room when I forgot my keys.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engagement Proposal
text: I contacted the Londonhouse to enquire about their Cupola availability for an engagement proposal. From the moment I spoke to Manny, I felt assured that the whole process would be easy and without error.Manny connected me with a photographer who did an excellent job setting the tone for the proposal and pictures. I highly recommend this place for anyone who is interested in finding an amazing place to propose to their partner.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A true sanctuary!
text: The Londonhouse, oh my! Within a realm of endless possibilities in a world class city such as Chicago, choices abound. But where can you find the feeling of uniqueness, ultra modern conveniences with unique architectural touches and the feeling of elegance of a great era that has passed...Oh The Londonhouse! Not to big, not too small, elegant yet not overwhelming, and the staff...5star!. From Paloma greeting us prior to check-in, the simple text a day later to ensure all was as it should be, to Ken ensuring our expectations where all met and our stay extraordinary prior to departure. One word...excellent! We stayed in a river view suite and the view truly amazing. The roof top bar though limited in seating still made you feel welcome and the staff more so as they engaged truly interested in you. You share stories and have a human connection that surpasses warmth and caring. The building... majestic, the room...perfect in scope and appointments, the people...extraordinary. All this leading to an experience which for lack of better terms was magnificent and understated. This is what a grand property is! So glad we chose The Londonhouse. My new home in Chicago. Can't wait to return.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect Spot For Marriage Proposal
text: My girlfriend and I recently got engaged at Londonhouse. Manny and the team there were incredibly helpful throughout the entire process from planning to the day of the event. The rooftop has gorgeous views of the city and we couldn't have picked a more perfect spot.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: I would give this hotel experience a 10 star rating if I could!
text: London house Chicago is not only beautiful but the experience was everything I wanted and more. My check in date was Valentine‚Äôs Day and despite the rush and the hotel being very busy, Paloma at the front desk took care of me with such professionalism. She was not flustered under pressure and maintaining the optimum customer service with seamless and thorough checkin process in minutes. She was friendly and made sure my request of ‚Äúa room with a spectacular view‚Äù was met. Once in the room I was so happy with the quality of sanitation and cleanliness I encountered. Not only that but the room was gorgeous. I would definitely recommend this hotel to visitors, tourists and even locals. Thanks again Paloma for making my evening feel like the ultimate staycation!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great staycation!
text: The room was excellent, the location was wonderful and the bed may have been the comfiest I've slept in in a long while! The hotel was beautiful and the staff was extremely helpful and friendly, while still adhering to all proper COVID safety measures. I'd love to come back, especially once everything is able to be fully opened in the hotel and Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A Dream Proposal
text: While visiting chicago I was shocked with a proposal of a lifetime. my fianc√© worked with Manny to coordinate the entire thing. he was INCREDIBLE. so professional and made the whole entire process smooth and flawless. he was so charismatic and helpful, that he was such a huge part of our memorable day and we will never forget him. thank Manny for you outstanding work and beautiful attention to detail -Steven and monica

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Valentines day weekend 2021
text: This is an absolutely beautiful Hotel. I had an issue and it was resolved quickly. I also love the fact that the hotel was very clean. The Lobby area is gorgeous. The hotel process was quick to check in.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Proposal
text: London House and the cupola was the absolute perfect setting for my proposal! Between the incredible views and the excellent service by Manny it created a moment that my fianc√© and I will never forget. I strongly encourage reaching out if you intend to pop the question as it is an experience that cannot be matched.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Celebrating My Birthday
text: Great hotel in walking distance all the shopping,restaurants and the beautiful magnificent mile which I loved looking out my hotel window at.  Front desk and staff were very cordiaI and accommodating loved my stay will be back if pandemic allow me to go back

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Rooftop proposal
text: Manny at London House was incredible with helping to plan a surprise proposal on the LH rooftop. He walked me through the whole process to make sure it went off flawlessly. He suggested a great photographer to capture the moment. The organization was great, the Cuppola was beautiful, and the view was stunning. I cannot recommend working with them enough! Thank you!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Surprise Proposal on the LondonHouse Cupola
text: Everything was absolutely perfect for my surprise proposal on the LondonHouse Cupola!  First and foremost, Manny was absolutely fantastic - he has this process down and there was not one hiccup!  The setting is absolutely beautiful.  Also, I cannot recommend Kristina Ryon enough for photos - she was also amazing and the pictures came out stunning.  My now fianc√© talks about how special and perfect this moment was on a daily basis, and this was all thanks to Manny, Kristina, and the rest of the LondonHouse crew!  Thank you again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Dawnne is the Best
text: Dawnne had impeccable service. By far the best employee! Was super attentive, helpful, and sweet! Make her the employee of the month for January!! Overall the London House in Chicago was a great experience. Great service, food, and people makes me want to come back next week.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Engagement Package
text: Great experience with the engagement package! Manny was always very responsive and accommodating. He made the entire process very easy. Beautiful set up and made the entire experience great and memorable!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: short trip .
text: London house has the best location at Strip . Hotel is clean and following Co-vid safety guidelines . room was clean .parking is little hassle though . we chose the neighborhood parking lot as it was cheaper than the Valet .over all good experience . will visit again .

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location and Wonderful Follow-Up Service
text: This hotel is in a wonderful location (walking distance to Chick-Fil-A, 7-Eleven, Labriola, etc). We did not need to rent a car at all. The view from our room was wonderful.I had a few issues during my stay (i.e., rooftop bar not being open, unable to get a reservation, and a few other things). I expressed my concerns and Pina reached out to me. She expressed this is not typical of their establishment and the hotel made things right with my stay. I am very satisfied with the service I have received and will stay here again on my next visit and recommend that other reviewers do the same.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great service, best location
text: Had a night over with family in town. We know the hotel location is the best so locked on it. The front office director, Ms. Paloma Pi√±a, treated us very well with connecting, upgraded room that had stunning views over the river. Despite covid Restrictions we had a great time and recognition of HH loyalty. Thank you !

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic location for a proposal
text: I proposed to my fiancee here on New Year's Eve and everything about LondonHouse made it a perfect experience. The view in the cupola is breathtaking and a great place to take photos, and our event coordinator, Manny, made sure every detail was just right. We have a lifelong memory to take away from our afternoon here and we will definitely be back for a drink on the rooftop in the future to relive it.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lovely mix of Old and New
text: The LondonHouse is just lovely.  The exterior, entrance and lobby speak of amazing architecture from times past. But the rooms are modern and classy with great amenities and amazing views.  We are Hilton Diamond members so we got a room upgrade with a view of the river for us and for our daughters room,  who was visiting from California.   The front desk staff, bell staff, could not be more friendly or accommodating.  The LondonHouse took all precautions to make us feel safe.   We also made reservations for a drink on the rooftop bar.....  the Christmas decorations were just the best.    Pictures just don‚Äôt do it justice.  We had previously stayed at this hotel the summer of 2019 and had the same amazing time.   We will make this our annual Christmas destination with family.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Staycation
text: Upon entering the establishment you get a warm welcoming from the valet staff. As you proceed to the elevator or stairs to take you to the lobby you pass thru many sanitizing stations which made me feel comfortable, you make that left to the elevators and see an array of BEAUTIFULLY decorated trees. The front desk is amazing, not even letting me get to the front desk before acknowledging one. Very present and content as well as confident. I may be a very bit needy so I did request a couple more pillows and towels for my room, not even 10 minutes for the staff to bring the items up. I am a traveler and frequent different hotels on every staycation and travel. I must say this staff has urgency, hospitality, customer service served with a smile, & pride in what they do. This day in age it‚Äôs hard to find staff with one or any of these qualities. For everyone to be on the same page with one another shows how their training and management cares foe them.  A huge thank you to Kevin, Grace, Bess I believe it is I apologize if I screwed that up she is the overnight manager. The team of managers and staff speaks volume to what a Hilton only represents, I was a lucky one to have encountered such wonderful oras. Thank you to everyone at the LondonHouse. It‚Äôs been a pleasure to stay and trust me when I say I will be coming back. You guys have the spot to where I will be spending every staycation at now. Sending much love to you & your families. - Happy Holidays  Sincerely,                  Luis M.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Christmas Rooftop Drinks
text: Visited over the weekend and loved the service from Stephanie! Made us feel like we were regulars and super friendly! Definitely request Stephanie as your server if you are looking for a great experience!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Holiday Lights
text: Central location for touring Magnificent Mile, Riverwalk, Millenium Park and State St.  See the Christmas lights, Art on the Mart, Christmas tree, and Marshall Fields (Macy's).Amazing views of river and Wrigley building / Tribune Tower from rooftop restaurant/bar.Breakfast at Corner Cafe on 1st floor.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Engagement
text: A HUGE thank you to the LondonHouse team and especially Manny for helping me execute the most perfect surprise proposal in the Cupola area of the rooftop. Manny was extremely efficient and helpful with recommendations for photographers and options for the setup that made this day even more special for my fiance and I. We had some last minute updates and changes that Manny handled and made sure things went smoothly. The views from the Cupola and rooftop are unmatched and we truly created memories that will last a lifetime. I highly recommend choosing the LondonHouse and their Cupola area for any special events, we can't wait to go back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing proposal at the Cupola
text: I want to start off by saying thank you to Manny for making my proposal at the London House Cupola such a special moment. From the minute I sent my interest email, Manny was very quick to response and very helpful. The day of the proposal when I finally met Manny, I was greeted by him and his friendly staff. Manny even took the time to record my proposal so I can send it our families. The proposal was awesome and the views from Cupola were breathtaking. Once again thank you for everything!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Proposal
text: I had my proposal here and it was an awesome experience. Manny helped with ironing out the details and the preparation. His attention to details was impressive. Thank you for helping pull the surprise off.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Magical engagement!
text: The word Magical best represents the entire event of the Londonhouse venue & team setting the stage to help me get engaged!  Manny is the quarterback of events & planning and he exceeded all expectations!  Every detail was accounted for and the entire night was an elevated retreat from the everyday, wow!  Thank you Manny, Adam & team!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Proposal Package at the LondonHouse
text: Manny was excellent in pulling off my proposal to my now fianc√© on their beautiful Cupola. He was very organized, did a great job coordinating and keeping everything a surprise when we arrived. Would highly recommend Manny!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Proposal
text: The arrangements made by Manny was amazing and very smooth. I was so unfamiliar with Chicago as i was visiting for the first time and wanted to propose my Girlfriend, i got in touch with Manny and he made it possible with such an ease. He called me and drafted the whole plan with minute to minute detail. Thank you so much for making this possible for me.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Rudolph Rooftop
text: I‚Äôm obsessed! Our experience was so much fun and our bar tender / waitress Stephanie was so accommodating. She took the best care of us and we can‚Äôt say enough about her. Rooftop decor was so cute. Come here for your holiday celebration and ask for Stephanie and you won‚Äôt regret it!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: All around amazing destination
text: Have never stayed at this property before, but was intrigued by its central location in downtown Chicago.  And easy access from the airports.  Given the recent reports of shutting businesses down, however, the expectations for the visit were somewhat lesser.  What we found of course was quite the opposite.  From the moment we arrived, interaction after interaction, experience after experience, our visit was the tops.  The rooms, the views, the rooftop, room service, the front desk.  All 10's.  As for COVID, while it was obvious they were taking appropriate precautions, we never felt impeded.  Just common sense. The elevator calling system, while it took a trip or two to figure out, is what every hotel needs.  No jumping in the first door that opens and crowding in with 20 other riders.  It's an ingenious feat in managing the flow of people up and down the elevators.I'll be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Sensational Service!
text: Stephanie (‚ÄúDoctor Stephanie‚Äù as we call her), was attentive, kind, loving, and bright. She brought light, love, and happiness to my team and me. Stephanie and the staff were professional and happy to help, and we‚Äôre most grateful. We had a world-class dining-experience (even amidst a pandemic), and the food was divine! I can unequivocally recommend the London House, Stephanie, and the entire Staff - They epitomize true excellence!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect micro wedding ceremony experience
text: This review is for the reserving the cupola for an event on the rooftop. We worked with Manny to set up a very small micro wedding ceremony for less than 10 people, and reserved the cupola for an hour. Manny was amazing. Super fast responses during planning and he was always available to answer any questions. The day of the team was incredibly organized, professional, and everything was in place. As per our request, they had set up chairs for us, and brought out glasses of champagne at the end of the ceremony. Manny surprised us with a beautiful winter altar which was absolutely stunning. He also made sure that our zoom could be streamed using his personal hotspot. We were running about 20 minutes late but did not feel at all rushed, and they let us take pictures after our reservation ended since there wasn‚Äôt anybody immediately following. Obviously the view is stunning, and it was surprisingly quiet considering the rooftop is one level below. I would absolutely 10/10 recommend using the cupola and the team for an event.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lovely hotel, lovely people
text: Hey guys thank you very much for a wonderful hospitality. Specially Kevin! What an amazing person! Thank you so much we had an amazing stay! Food is amazing. Definitely brunch for sure on the hotel rooftop.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal Event
text: This space was great for my surprise proposal for my girlfriend. Manny was extremely helpful providing resources as well as informing me of all the steps/timeline necessary throughout the entire process.Really recommend!!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay in our own City
text: We had the best stay at LondonHouse. We had gotten married the weekend before, although our honeymoon was cancelled because of Covid19, we still wanted to "get away." So a small staycation fit the bill. LondonHouse was very clean and we were treated wonderfully. And very affordable! Ken at the front desk gave us an awesome upgraded room to help us celebrate with a view of the river! We also made a point to eat apps on the rooftop. Beautiful views and great food. Location is perfect and we walked to everything we had planned. We would highly recommend!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Elopement Ceremony
text: I cannot say enough good things about London House! Every member of staff was incredibly kind and helpful. Manny went above and beyond to help us execute our elopement ceremony from booking to day of. He made sure we were super well prepared and had everything we needed. We got engaged and married at London House because they do everything to give the best experience. Wouldn‚Äôt want to spend some of the most important days of my life anywhere else. Thank you!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Londonhouse proposal package
text: Had an unbelievable weekend staying at the Londonhouse Chicago Hotel. To start off the weekend I had their famed proposal package set up and it was nothing short of incredible. Manny (my proposal planner) was amazing throughout the entire process and set everything up beautifully; he was always available to help throughout the process and went above and beyond to make the experience special. The hotel itself was exceptional as well, every part of the weekend was worth the money spent 10 times over. I now have amazing memories that will last a lifetime, and I am forever grateful to Londonhouse and Manny for making my engagement spectacular. I look forward to staying with them in the future.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Love this place!
text: Outstanding service and safe protocols during Covid 19.  Stunning view of the river and great service from valet and bell captain who navigated street closures to check-us in a block away! Would heartily endorse this place!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Get away
text: As Hilton Honors member we try to get into the city a few times a year.  This was our first time at the London House and we will definitely stay there again.  Great location and views. The roof top bar was an added bonus

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Incredible!
text: Incredible views of the city and fantastic service. The staff was very detail-oriented and helped us get exactly what we wanted to get out of our visit. Communication was friendly and thorough. Would highly recommend üôÇ

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing service and amazing location!!!
text: I come to Chicago a lot and always stay at Hilton hotels but this was the first time I stayed at the Londonhouse and I was not disappointed at all!Before I even arrived I was greeted through their private message app to expect my arrival and made sure there wasn‚Äôt anything they could do to make my stay extra special and comfortable especially during COVID. Grace was super generous and as a loyal Diamond member she upgraded me to a junior corner suite before my arrival! Check in was a breeze and I got to meet Grace in person at the front desk and thanked her for taking care of me!The room was huge and I had amazing views of the river!!! Bed was super comfortable and love the bathroom very luxurious and shower pressure as great!I greatly enjoyed my stay there and will be returning very soon! I already have another trip booked back to Chicago and also staying at the Londonhouse!Thank you for the whole staff and also especially Grace one of the supervisors for making me feel so welcomed and taken care of! Carson

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Property & Service
text: In a recent stay the LH exceeded all expectations from the ease of valet to seamless checkout and everything in between. Amazing cocktails upstairs, a delicious Dinner and the most amazing river views available. Not to mention the ultra comfy bedding!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Birthday Weekend!
text: I booked this room for my Aunt's 70th birthday surprise! Her and my uncle were so happy with the entire stay, Grace from the front desk was amazing by helping her get a view of the River! We enjoyed going to the rooftop to take some great pictures and loved the cocktails. Land and Lake had excellent dinner and breakfast service. This hotel is in a wonderful location of the city and is walkable to almost anything. Overall, she had an amazing birthday weekend and we will be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Proposal
text: If you‚Äôre planning to have an epic proposal with the love your life and want beautiful pictures then this is the place! Go to Manny! He made this whole experience amazing and easy for my fianc√© and I!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Surprise Proposal
text: We recently got engaged at the Cupola at the LH rooftop. Booking the cupola was pretty easy once I managed to get a hold of Manny via the email support line. It is corona time so it's understandably tough to do the booking in person. Manny was great and he made sure I knew everything I needed to, for the day of. He followed up before and after the event to make sure the plans were still on and that everything was satisfactory. The proposal experience was simply beautiful. Worth every penny. Would definitely recommend it.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: 1st. ANNIVERSARY
text: My husband and I stayed at the London house last weekend for our first anniversary and we were very pleased with the hotel. Despite the COVID we had a blast, all the staff were wearing mask and they're sanitizing frequently all the surfaces,the rooftop is amazing and the employees very attentive.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Elopement in the LH Rooftop Cupola
text: We had a covid elopement on the rooftop of LondonHouse in the cupola on 10/10 and it was absolutely stunning. We reserved the space from 3pm to 4pm and our ceremony started at 3:15. We walked in, the host stand sent us straight to the top where Manny Aganon (Reservationist) greeted us. He is so much fun and such a great help! He knew exactly what we needed when we needed it and was always present. Our photographer loved him too. It is clear that he loves his job and has a wonderful time with each and every guest. Our entire experience was gorgeous and memorable because he made it seamless and enjoyable. Thank you, Manny!! If you're looking for an intimate wedding venue, this is it. The photos, views, and service are worth every penny.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: MUST STAY
text: We stumbled across the LondonHouse because of the location. We booked the room but we were still shopping around. We decided to stay after we had a multitude of friends, from Chicago and everywhere else, telling us we had to checkout the rooftop bar at LondonHouse. Let me tell you how little we regretted that decision   The room: gorgeous lighting, amazing view of the river, perfect size. TVs were easy to work, tons of mirrors that made getting ready easy, EXTREMELY CLEAN. Convenient switches by the bed that turn all the lights off and the blackout curtains block all the light out (no little sliver of curtains that let all the city lights in) very quiet, no sounds of the city nor sounds of slamming doors keeping us up The bed: this gets its own category. WOW. I am a bed snob. I will die on this hill. This was hands down the best bed I‚Äôve stayed in for a hotel. I‚Äôm actually disappointed I have to sleep in my own bed tonight. From the linens to the pillows it was a dream. The personnel: friendly, helpful, and out of the way. They were there when you needed them at the drop of a hat. Excellently run hotel. The scene: there was a reason everyone told us to check out the rooftop it goes without saying the experience was spectacular. Our favorite spot, however, was the restaurant downstairs on the first floor. The best breakfast, coffee and morning cocktails. It was fast and delicious. We didn‚Äôt go anywhere else for breakfast during our trip because it was so fast, convenient, and did I mention delicious????If you can get a room here it‚Äôs worth it. The location is great, getting picked up by an Uber was as simple as it gets in the city, and if you‚Äôre struggling the doormen will help you flag them down. If I could give this hotel and experience 10 stars I would.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic Visit!
text: The moment i checked in i felt welcomed, and that feeling Continued throughout my stay! Mathew at reception was super friendly and really made a great 1st impression!The room was great, incredible bed with super soft linens! Also a great location! Close to the loop and miracle mile. Definitely will return!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: An amazing stay with an unforgettable proposal!
text: We had an amazing stay at the LondonHouse!  It was my first time in Chicago, and the hotel's location was perfect, right in the middle of everything!  The hotel itself is beautiful with modern interiors and some of the best views of the river. Little did I know, my fianc√© had chosen the LondonHouse cupola to propose before I chose the hotel, and the proposal was better than I could've ever imagined!  It seems like there's always something going on at the LondonHouse rooftop, but the cupola has a very private feel with a breathtaking view of Chicago.  The staff at the LondonHouse were all so welcoming and Manny, the event coordinator for the proposal, was first-rate.  Manny was in communication all week with my fianc√© and really goes above and beyond.  I didn't think a personalized proposal would be possible in a city we don't live in, but with Manny working behind the scenes, everything was set up perfectly!Chicago is a pretty special place to us now, and I know we'll be back to the LondonHouse!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Stay in Chicago
text: Hotel was great! Staff were super friendly and helpful. Everyone had masks and COVID precautions, although some guests didn‚Äôt want to comply. Valet was fast and friendly. Front desk staff and bell staff were courteous, warm and welcoming. Great view from our room. Most definitely will be returning to this property.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very nice hotel and location
text: Loved the hotel and the view we had, very clean and had everything we need but the room we had did not have a microwave that‚Äôs my only complaint, the rooftop bar had an amazing view but did not try the drinks or food

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel but sadly plagued with rude and incompetent F&B staff
text: Simply put, the LondonHouse Chicago has the most incompetent F&B staff I have ever encountered at any Curio/Hilton-portfolio property in nearly a decade as a Diamond member. Last year, I almost had to starve at this hotel since the F&B staff kept contradicting themselves (allegedly due to a wedding) and in the end, even when I held a confirmed reservation at the hotel, I was not allowed to eat at the rooftop restaurant. I made the mistake of giving the hotel a second chance and today, a similar incident occurred: I phoned the hotel's operator and was explicitly told that I could go eat at the rooftop bar but when I went up to the 21st floor, the rude hostess told me that whislt she had space, I would have to go back to the 1st floor to make a reservation. Upon arriving at the reservations booth on the first level, the super rude hostess told me that I would have to wait and she refused, despite me asking several times, to actually give me an estimate of what the wait would be. Do yourself a favor and avoid this hotel. Customer service is non-existent here and there are much better hotels around the Riverwalk for the same pricing points. Note that this hotel is fully aware of its severe customer service issues and they will basically beg you to remove a negative comment, but I'm not falling for their trick again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Front desk very helpful.
text: Ricky gave me great recommendations. I will definitely be coming back to visit The London House. Check-in also went very smoothly. The desk was able to help me when I was having trouble set up the wifi to my laptop without any problem

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal
text: Our engagement coordinator was amazing! Everything turned out more than perfect. It was a one stop shop but they were also very lenient with some of the outside request I wanted. I would recommend 10/10. Thank you LondonHouse. A huge shout out to Manny. One of the most memorable experiance of my life.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Close to everything üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
text: Awesome stay with super comfy beds.  LH is within walking distance to almost everything you‚Äôll want to see in Chicago (except Wrigley Field).  Stayed during COVID World, so no daily housekeeping.  Not an issue though.  If you need anything, they‚Äôll bring it to you.  The clock radio wasn‚Äôt working in my room and they brought a new one within ten minutes.  Staff is attentive and friendly.Stay here. You won‚Äôt be disappointed.  Especially if you have a view of the river and bridges.  Liked that you can crack the windows open about a foot for some fresh air too.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Hotel with a view!
text: It was our first time in Chicago and it took me awhile to narrow down a hotel with a great location, refundable and fair rates (due to COVID changing rules) and of course with modern amenities and taking safety precautions as well.I considered myself lucky for picking this hotel based on location, excellent service, modern amenities and spectacular rooftop bar and restaurant.Our flight was early so we knew our room will not be ready yet.  Thankfully, there is a room upgrade with awesome view and bigger room already available-(could be free if you have a HILTON gold status.)  I was surprised that my hubby didn't mind paying an upgrade fee since he is very frugal.  Luckily, he made the best decision since we were able to relax right away and start our adventure to the Riverwalk and Magnificent mile.  Did I mention the amazing view from our window?Room was super clean, bed was so comfy, bathroom was large and bright, and decor was modern.  We had difficulty using the remote control but I uploaded the stayconnect app as an alternate.  They have a smart elevator button too.  You just type in the floor you want --and boom-it tells you which one is coming--super fast too.   There are some restaurants connected to the hotel which were good for breakfast, lunch or fine dining.  We especially loved  the LH rooftop-with a romantic atmosphere, amazing views and unique choices of drinks and dishes.  All the staff we met were just outstanding and friendly.  We also felt safe inside and outside the hotel although I still advise anyone to be aware of your surroundings since there will always be homeless people or others asking you random questions.  I used to work in New York city so I was prepared.Overall, I am a BIG fan of this Londonhouse hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Penna Paloma
text: I want to shout out  ‚Äú beyond the call of duty‚Äù to the director of the front office!!!      Spent a wonderful night with terrific views of Chicago !! Beautiful room! But I left my backpack in the lobby!.. Penna hunted me down and rescued me!     Thankyou Penna... the London House was terrific in oh so many ways!! Wonderful wonderful!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Staying during pandemic
text: In times of a pandemic, if you really needs to travel so better staying in hotel like the Londonhouse in Chicago. the check in was welcoming and fast, my room was super cute with a beautiful view. the staff is professional and very kind! the hotel is very well decorated with a unique style.Would be great to visit again soon!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent stay
text: Our stay at the LondonHouse was quite seamless, which is impressive under the current circumstances. Our interaction with staff was minimal, but everyone my partner and I encountered was courteous and helpful. Questions were quickly answered through the front desk or the Hilton app. We were able to get takeaway breakfast every morning from the Land and Lake Kitchen, and over our five-day stay, were pleased with everything we ordered. Housekeeping was by request only, and when requested, did a great job. Our room was on the 20th floor, and provided such a fantastic view of the Riverwalk (esp. the Wrigley Building) that we didn't feel a trip to the rooftop was necessary. The shower was immaculate, and the rest of the room was cozy, with handsome wood finishes. People planning to stay in the room more during the day might want to upgrade for more space, but we found the standard room suited us well. The building is a landmark pointed out by every tour we passed on Wacker Drive, and it is impressive from all angles. We even took advantage of early check-in and late check-out through our Gold status, so that we could take in a few more hours enjoying the lake and the view.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Getaway with spectacular view
text: This was my first time staying at the LondonHouse and my stay was spectacular. Felt safe and welcomed! The staff was very friendly and my room was perfect! I felt safe and that the room was sanitized well and labeled which gave me peace of mind! I will definitely stay here again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect Hotel with Outstanding Staff
text: I had the best stay at LondonHouse. My experience went so well that my initial 3 day stay turned into a 16 day stay. Anthony & Ken at the front desk were always so helpful and professional. I can honestly say the staff was one of the reasons I continued to extend my stay. Everyone was so nice and welcoming. The room and view was exceptional. As I worked everyday at the perfectly located desk, I would look out at the Chicago River and I just felt so inspired. I loved how each room was sealed with a sticker so you knew your room was cleaned when I checked in. The extra measures the hotel took to ensure safety during Covid was greatly appreciated including the signs that indicating how many people are allowed in a elevator, the food delivery safety measures, and masks requirements when leaving your room. The location was perfect and I could walk everywhere and I did. The rooftop restaurant was absolutely beautiful and I had no problem getting a table even when it was super busy. For those times when I had nonstop meetings, the ability to quickly run up there and place an order to bring back to my room made life so easy for me. The Truffle Fries were delicious and I will surely miss those.  I can‚Äôt say enough about the beautiful accommodations, the perfect location, and most of all the wonderful staff at LondonHouse. Thank you for everything. I‚Äôll definitely be back! ~Ericka (Rm 1125)

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent hotel with perfect location in the heart of Chicago downtown
text: Londonhouse Chicago is perfectly located in the midst of downtown Chicago. You can easily walk to the Magnificent Mile, River walk, and the subway/train station is a couple block away. It has nice modern rooms in a classic heritage building exterior. Definitely worth checking out for solo, friends, and couples travelers.The rooms vary in size depending on the room type. But all the furnishing and decor are stylish and modern. They certainly have nice rooms with delightfully nice bathrooms. The vista rooms on the newer part of the hotel is clearly nicer than the rest. They are slightly larger with a much larger floor to ceiling windows looking over the River.The hotel has an extremely popular rooftop bar with a long line of people waiting for a table day and night. I didn‚Äôt get to check it out as I had a full agenda in my 5 days visit, but a hotel staff kindly took me up for a brief tour on closing hour. It is definitely worth checking out on nice weather.The hotel is definitely ideal for couples without kids or simply friends exploring Chicago city life. They have no swimming pool and their lobby is not very large. But they surely look nice, stylish, clean, and very well maintained. Throughout my stay, this hotel had an incredible police presence guarding the city and the hotel. The police were nice and polite. Never once I felt unsafe around the hotel vicinity.Most importantly, the staff in Londonhouse hotel were extraordinary. They were very nice and accommodating which made our stay even better. A big shoutout to Bess on the front desk who took great care of us by giving the best experience we could hope for. Despite a very busy long weekend, Bess and other staffs provided a world class customer service without any issue. The rooms were clean and exceeded our expectations. We stayed at multiple Curio Collections hotels in the past and Londonhouse Chicago is by far the best of them all so far.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Chicago
text: Lovely hotel and best rooftop bar in Chicago. The location is spot on to where you want to be. The staff was quite helpful as well and I always felt safe. I will stay here next time. Shout out to Kevin Stabile for the follow up email as well.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel location !!!. amazing Chicago architecture just on front of you
text: beautiful hotel, exceptional  staff. Ken at the desk was so kind,friendly and  super helpful.the location is perfect!! again amazing Chicago architecture just on front of you. They just made my day, it was over my expectation

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Mr. Brian Parker
text: Just wanted to mention how amazing and attentive Bess, the overnight supervisor was in front office.  Especially, due tot he current circumstances, Bess went above and beyound and out his his way.  It‚Äôs hard to get good service in lieu of the current circumstances.  Thank you to the staff Paloma Pina, and also, Matthew as well in front office.Thank you again LH Staff! - Brian Parker

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Flawless Experience!
text: A++! From the initial E-mail exchange to the time we walked out, Manny made our experience great! The execution was spot on and the overall price was reasonable. Highly recommended as one of the best rooftops in the city!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Gazebo Proposal
text: I reserved the Cupola Gazebo to propose to my now fiance, and it was beyond my expectations. The rose petals, the champagne, the view, everything was done masterfully. I was in touch with Manny Aganon for the last few days leading up to it, and he was able to take care of everything and make sure everything went as perfect as it could. I appreciate Manny's dedication and thoroughness. Additionally, Lindsey De Guzman was our photographer and did such a tremendous job. Jenny and I now have photos and a video montage of the moment to last us a lifetime. We'll be talking about that moment and the hospitality that LondonHouse provided forever, and we will certainly be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Gorgeous views
text: Spent a quick overnight with my family. The view from our room was the quintessential Chicago shot, overlooking the bridges and river. Special thanks to Matthew at the front desk for his help! Breakfast of Eggs Benedict at land and lakes was delicious, as was the view and the peach salad at the rooftop lounge.  Highly recommend.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engagement
text: I had proposed in the Capula at the rooftop of Londonhouse and the overall experience was fantastic. Manny helped plan and coordinate everything. He was very professional and flexible with any requests that I had. Manny had a minute by minute itinerary prepared for the engagement, and it was a wonderful success. I highly recommend anyone to have an engagement there.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Hotel
text: Very Hospitality personal, Very clean everything, organized, professional and safe. The view is amazing , the decorations in the room was like a boutique. We really love this hotel and definitely we will return. Ken in front desk, the gentleman at the front door ( I forgot the name) , he also help us with the car. The server at the restaurant, I think he‚Äôs name was Jhony, the supervisor  Matthew,   well.. All the personal overall was very kind, nice and helpful. Very grateful!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Service by Ken at the Front Desk
text: This is my first time at the property. Ken at the front desk was approachable, professional, and respectful. I was a little nervous due to the Pandemic but Ken was really helpful proving me with all the information and steps the London house is taking to my the stay of the guest safe and comfortable. I am glad to know that people like Ken are part of the London Chicago which is a great property. I will recommend to friends and family.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Customer Service and Beautiful Location
text: We had a wonderful experience staying at the LondonHouse.  We were there for a family birthday celebration and got a reasonable rate for the three rooms we rented.   The staff could not have been more welcoming and accommodating to us.   We enjoyed a wonderful meal on the rooftop with an incredible view and enjoyed going to the spa.  In addition, the rooms were very clean and very comfortable.  Thank you to everyone who made our stay memorable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wedding Proposal
text: From the beginning to the end all of our expectations were exceeded. Manny and the team went above and beyond to create this special day for us. My Fianc√© and I will never forget this wonderful moment!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Manny saved my engagement!!!
text: I'd like to express my deepest gratitude not only to Londonhouse, but especially to Manny for organizing and hosting us on our special day!! He is very thorough and meticulous with the planning and he cared just as much as I did to make sure everything went perfectly as planned. He listened to what I wanted and made sure it was delivered. He even showed great emotion during our proposal!!! He is a world class worker and we hope to see him again soon!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Incredible customer service
text: The hotel itself is beautiful. Well kept, nothing out of place, and the elevators are fast and always available (despite the amount of guests/patrons). But the reason I continue to come back to this hotel as opposed to the 50 other high end hotels in this area....is hands down the customer service. Especially the front desk. Grace (!) and her coworkers are always hospitable and helpful, no matter how mundane the request. Somehow the experience still feels personal and pleasant even during these uncertain times. Thank you LondonHouse, Grace, et al for the consistent high end experience.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location and nice design
text: Great location and nice design. Should be good enough for 5 stars as an independent hotel, but this is a Curio Collection by Hilton property and their Hilton affiliation part is struggling to deliver for loyal Hilton members.Hilton Gold and Diamond members should get a room upgrade and free breakfast benefits. There was no upgrade offered to us unfortunately, but more importantly there is no free breakfast. You are being given $12 vouchers instead to use at the hotel restaurant where most dishes cost around $15. You can probably get pancakes with this voucher, but still have to pay for your coffee (because they removed coffee machine from the rooms) - and speaking of the drinks, there is no espresso/latte or fresh squeezed juice available either, only black coffee or juice from concentrate, that is concerning for a luxury hotel. The good thing about the restaurant however is that they have very reasonably priced happy hour downstairs (rooftop bar had a never ending line to elevators well before opening time and hotel guests have to go through the same reservation process downstairs, can't just go up from your floor directly).

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great front desk customer service
text: I had multiple rooms booked at  LondonHouse for a wedding weekend, and I somehow managed to screw up all of the reservations when I was tinkering around online.  The front desk staffmember, Grace, came to the rescue and was kind enough to fix every reservation.  She was nice, professional, and able to solve the problem right away.    A great example of excellent customer service.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Proposal went great!!!
text: Man, there are so many positives and I will try to list them all. Firstly, this location is the best and for the rate at which it comes, it was a bargain! Then Manny, the planner, was amazing at a time when COVID threw a lot of curve balls and I was getting stressed about who to invite or not. Just knowing that I could talk to him and reach a workable compromise was so relieving. Also, everything was planned to the minute so I and the guest knew exactly what was supposed to happen and at what time. The complimentary Champagne is one of the best I have tasted and I just had to take the rest with me. I do wish the parking was validated entirely but I am not really complaining about that. I would recommend this place if you want some privacy for your event.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful hotel
text: My wife and I stayed at London House on a recent visit to Chicago.  It's a beauful facility.  Our room was a nice size, with a comfortable bed and large, spacious bathroom.  It had a nice view onto Wacker Drive and the Chicago River.  The limited (covid time) interactions we had with staff were pleasant.  Because of the virus, we got a great price for our room.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Unique Property in Great Location
text: The riverfront location downtown can't be beat.  Lovely Art Deco building and historic lobby.  Rooms are very nice, with super comfy bed and linens, and fluffy towels and rooms.  Falls a bit short on service.  Had to cajole a bit to get Diamond upgrade, in spite of lower occupancy.  Front desk didn't answer phone most of time.  Repeated problems w key cards.  Crowds of partiers in lobby, sime without masks, not being well controlled by hotel.  Housekeeping missed us one day and had to call to get them back in late afternoon.  Breakfast was good but the $12 allowance pee person for Diamond breakfast is insufficient for most items on menu and should be raised.  These items prevented a five star rating but this is a very nice property.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Staycation 2020
text: This hotel has lovely accommodations and a courteous, helpful staff who were on top of ensuring my stay was pleasant. The location is awesome with lovely views of the Chicago river and direct access to the Riverwalk. Great dining options nearby and the Rooftop bar was the perfect spot to unwind.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Getaway weekend
text: Everyone at London house we‚Äôre amazing. Everyone was really nice and helpful. We really enjoyed our stay. Thank you! Whenever We‚Äôre in town we will come back here. The roof top was beautiful even though we didn‚Äôt have reservations they seated us within 15-20 min which is not bad at all to wait. Prime house was a great place to eat and the staff was amazing. Thank you Paloma for checking on us and making sure our experience here was outstanding.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: This place is stunning!
text: The LondonHouse is an awesome hotel! I enjoyed every minute. We stayed only one night and would have loved to stay for much longer. A very comfortable experience, and I love how close it is to the river and Michigan avenue.  The room in wonderful, and the bed is so comfortable that is hard to get out of bed at all. We stayed at the 15th floor which offered some impressive views of the river and the bridges. I loved the late checkout, which was at noon. Most hotels don‚Äôt allow checkout that late, so that was a big plus.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect stay for my anniversary
text: My husband and I stayed at the LondonHouse Chicago for our wedding anniversary. Even though things are different now because of Covid, LondonHouse did a great job of making us feel safe (everyone was wearing masks, they had stickers on the ground of where to stand), the room was clean (even the remotes were wrapped in plastic to let you know they were just sanitized), and Juan advised and helped me with my reservations to make it an unforgettable night. We had cocktails and an appetizer on the roof top and then went to Ocean Prime for dinner. The view from the rooftop was amazing and so was the shrimp cocktail and drinks. The service was also amazing! The hotel is filled with genuinely kind, thoughtful, and cheerful staff throughout. We will definitely be coming back.  Thanks again LondonHouse for a wonderful quick getaway to celebrate my anniversary. It was perfect:)

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Prime location, clean, and friendly staff
text: Have stayed here twice now for a total of 5 nights. The hotels location is amazing, right in the heart of downtown with beautiful views. Rooms were clean and staff was extremely friendly. Would recommend trying the rooftop bar... amazing!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engagement at the LondonHouse Coppola
text: Manny from the LondonHouse went above and beyond to help me plan and coordinate an amazing surprise proposal for my fiance. It was truly an amazing experience and Manny and the LondonHouse planned everything by the minute. I highly recommend the LondonHouse's rooftop and Copola area to celebrate any special occasion.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Londonhouse Proposal
text: Manny Aganon and everyone at the Londonhouse were amazing to work with.   My proposal at the rooftop cupola was perfect.  Especially considering all the uncertainty regarding the pandemic.   Manny guided me through the process and truly cared about making sure this proposal went off without a hitch.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Loved it!  ‚ù§Ô∏è
text: The location is perfect and the room was awesome! We are ready to book another trip for next summer! Breakfast was great and dinner upstairs is a MUST! The staff took great care of us throughout our stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Boutique Riverfront Hotel
text: I stayed here for 2 nights in July 2020. This was my second time staying and I can say it will not be my last. The hotel is in a prime area of downtown right on the river. The real winners at this hotel are the vista rooms with floor to ceiling glass and the rooftop bar. If you're making a trip and want to be guaranteed a vista room I would book it directly because the view is one of the best in Chicago. Overall rooms are large for a big city hotel with nice linens and large smart TV's. Robes in the room give it a luxury property feel. Mini fridge worked well and is hidden. The bathroom was fantastic with marble shower walls and great water pressure. Staff was great even during COVID, very accommodating and courteous. The ground floor restaurant has a nice a la carte breakfast menu and does to-go so you can enjoy it in your room with a view. Another great stay, thank you LondonHouse!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect Engagement
text: I worked with Manny Aganon to plan the perfect engagement for myself and my fianc√©. Manny did an incredible job, and helped with last minute changes. The cupola, and London House are stunning, and were the perfect place for our engagement. I could not have asked for a better experience, and Manny made sure it was the best possible proposal.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engagement at the Cuploa
text: I proposed at the London House Cupola over the weekend. The events coordinator, Manny, was a great help in making the event everything we could have ever dreamed of, down to every last detail! If you are looking for a place to celebrate a lifetime of happiness at an iconic Chicago location, London House is the place and Manny is your guy!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Never got in
text: I reserved the LondonHouse property with points for an overnight Saturday stay in July. We finally got close to the hotel and the street was one huge conglomeration of cars, ubers and busses trying to get to the valet parking attendant. After going around the "block" a few times, the situation got worse. I tried to find an open parking lot in the area--all were closed (I am assuming because of COVID). We called guest services who said you just have to jockey for a position ion the street. It was a total disorganized mess. I decided to cancel the reservation with the guest services agent and we drove on. My second problem with the hotel was their lack of response to an email I send about 2 weeks before our visit. The issue was to ask for reservations at the restaurant or bar on the roof, since all the time spots were already full. I simply asked if they had any provisions for guests of the hotel. I never received a response. We normally stay at Hilton properties and this experience was not good.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wedding at the Cupola
text: Manny, our contact person/coordinator, at the LondonHouse did absolutely everything to ensure that our ceremony was flawless from researching and making flower arrangement recommendations to picking me up from my hotel room and walking me up to the Cupola prior to the ceremony. Afterwards, our dinner and view at the rooftop were sensational. Could not have picked a better venue and dinner spot for our wedding!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Above and beyond...
text: I booked a room at London House for my daughter‚Äôs 21st birthday.  Upon learning about this celebration, Anthony Gates moved us to a wonderful room that help make this night on the city very memorable.  This is the type of customer service that other hotels can follow.  Thank you, Anthony.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Stay at the LondonHouse
text: I‚Äôve been wanting to stay here and was finally able to thanks to a mistake by American Airlines causing me to miss my connecting flight at O‚ÄôHare.  Rather than stay at an Inn the airline was paying for, I decided to take the Blue line into the city and stay here.  Upon check-in, the helpful woman noticed myHilton Honors status and upgraded my room to one one that wasn‚Äôt available an hour earlier when making the reservation online- thank you so much! I had a great view onto Michigan Avenue at Wacker, the Wrigley Building, Tribune Tower and a partial view of the architecturally magnificent building across the river at 401 North Wabash. The location of London House is perfect, just steps to shops and restaurants on the Mag Mile, River North and Loop; Blue line to O‚ÄôHare, Orange line to Midway and Red line to Wrigley Field. The room was pretty spacious, clean and comfortable too. I loved the huge windows that allowed the lightening outside to light up my room with each stroke during a passing storm.  The barn door separating the room from the restroom was cool too.  I especially loved that the bathroom featured a shower stall versus shower tub combo.  The king bed was as comfy as I expected a Hilton bed to be and I happy that the TV wasn‚Äôt small.  Included with my stay was a $12 breakfast voucher to Land and Lake Kitchen on the first floor.  I applied it to their version of avocado toast; it was pretty good!  If staying in Chicago, I‚Äôd definitely recommend considering the London House; I cant wait to stay here next time I‚Äôm in town!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: July 4 weekend
text: HiI‚Äôm writing this for 2 reasons-1.  Mark, at street level is super.  He was very helpful, and definitely our go to.2.  The first night (From room 2019) I woke up 3 times hearing a skill saw from above us.  (11pm, 2am, and 3:30am ish). I swear I heard blocks of wood drop as it would go off.  I even think I heard a few nails clatter from above.  There was definitely walking.  Each time I called the front desk.   Then the sounds would soon completely go away.   The staff assured me that they checked - even visited the 21st floor.  They told me there was nothing found.  I was not alone, My boyfriend heard it too.  The next day we checked at the front desk.  We were told no current construction in the hotel.  No one else had complained of construction noises.  We asked another guest on the 20th floor, and he had heard nothing.   I‚Äôm still curious, we had to be hearing something.  That was July 2, July 3-4 the sounds were gone.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beyond Amazed!
text: We had a private proposal at the London House Cupola which was  handled and managed to perfection by Manny!  He took care of our every need, recommending various additions like flowers, wine, etc., along with a list of photographers to capture the moment.  We both were beyond amazed.  The views are stunning and on a fair summer evening, this is definitely one of the best views in the city!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome...
text: I loved staying here. Great service from the get go.Amazing location. One of the nicest places I have stayed.Bed was great. Sound proofing was very good. Didn't hear a peep.Loved the scent of the hand soap.Great view from my hotel room.Fast and free internet.Highly recommended.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: GREATEST SERVICE EVER and I mean EVER
text: I‚Äôve been to a a lot of hotels downtown especially over the years! First time here at LH wow blown away by the hospitality! BESS and GRACE are amazing compassionate, helpful ! Amazing service .. the text for anything or help ! Futuristic, wow for a first timer ... I will highly recommend highly highly. 70 million stars ...off the charts. Thank y‚Äôall for giving me a great 30th bday weekend!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Front Desk Rockstar
text: This review is for Anthony at the front desk.  He worked with me for a LONG time to find the right room for my wife and I during our trip to the city.  He was professional and polite and answered a lot of questions.  He went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and was so patient.  As first impressions go, this guy represents what front desk service is all about!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Another wonderful stay at London House - June 2020
text: London House service is top notch.  Always a kind hello and welcome from the gentlemen greeting you as you step out your car and the customer service continues throughout your stay.  Special thanks to the supervisor, Matthew, for letting me check in to my room early - with an nice upgrade as well!   I've stayed at London House multiple times and each time I have had breathtaking views of the city and the Chicago River.  Location is perfect - a safe and vibrant area of downtown with quick access to the Riverwalk and all Chicago's attactions.  They have taken many safe precautions to prevent the spread of Covid-19, such as limiting the number of people in the elevators and closing off parts of the lobby.  Hand sanitizing stations are situated throughout the common areas.I'm looking forward to returning in a couple weeks to London House and enjoying the holiday weekend in the USA's best city!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chicago visit
text: Great value. Ideally located between Miracle Mile and the Loop. Room was compact but well designed and nicely decorated. We had a wonderful time. Had happy hour out on the front patio. I hear the rooftop restaurant and bar is very nice. Our room overlooked the river. Definitely recommend and will be back if they are not all booked up.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Roodtop Cupola Proposal
text: I had researched placed to propose in Chicago and the LondonHouse Rooftop Cupola location came up multiple times when I read reviews. Planning the process was very easy as I worked with Reservationist Manny. He made sure the timeline was to my liking and assured me that my fiance would be surprised. The proposal was supposed to happen in April 2020 but due to Covid 19, LondonHouse had to close and postpone all events and reservations. Manny and the LondonHouse team worked very hard to keep constant communication open with me during the quarantine period. When they opened again in June, I was able to schedule for the first weekend available. The proposal went even better than I had planned! I am very grateful and appreciative of Manny and the whole LondonHouse team for helping me plan the perfect proposal. My fiance and I can not wait to go back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wife‚Äôs memorable birthday dinner/drinks
text: The Rooftop at the LondonHouse exceeded all my expectations. Celebrating my wife‚Äôs birthday with friends was outstanding and unforgettable. Thank you to all the wonderful staff at the LondonHouse for making it memorable for all of us.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Bess we love you!!!
text: Seems like every time I come here I get the same awesome guy at the front desk. His name is Bess. I absolutely adore him. Great customer service. Beautiful hotel. Great food downstairs. Beautiful view. If I could change just one thing I‚Äôd have a little convenience store or vending machine for personals. Other than that 5 stars üíû

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing engagement destination!!
text: Absolutely amazing engagement package!!! Manny is the absolute best at LH and and coordinated a memorable engagement with breathtaking views of the city! The hotel itself is absolutely amazing and will truly forever be a part of our history! Looking forward to coming back to LH again and again in the future!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupola Proposal - London House
text: We cannot say enough things about Manny! He was so great to work with and so professional. Thank you so much for helping with our proposal, everything was beyond perfect. Thank you for responding to emails in a timely manner and for coordinating everything beautifully! We look forward to working with you in the future! For anyone planning on a proposal at the Cupola LH, I would absolutley recommend it. You will not regret it. Manny is the best! ‚ù§

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great value
text: I really like the design of this hotel. It‚Äôs modern and clean. I got the corner room which was really spacious. The bed was comfortable, it was perfect for me after a long haul flight. It was really value for money (during the period of my stay) considering the fact that few other hotels in downtown area are charging much more with far worse hotel facilities.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A GEM!!!
text: Wow, the location is incredible & and the views are iconic. The rooms are very elegantly furnished. The best part has to be the staff‚Äì incredibly kind, helpful, and accommodating. Five stars. You won‚Äôt regret a stay here!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A must-stay hotel in Chicago
text: This is my absolute favorite hotel in the USA. The best I have stayed in! Wonderful location, luxurious facilities, amazing rooftop bar with fascinating views of the Chicago river front. It is an experience!!! The hotel is a historical structure which has been revamped. So, the rooms are not that large. But they have a touch of luxury and class that make them welcoming. No bathtub either. But I didn‚Äôt mind at all. Ceilings were high and the TV was pretty large. The old fashion artifacts on the room offer a nice vintage vibe. The rooftop bar is the key selling point of the hotel. There is a restaurant as well but the bar offers the best views of the Chicago River and all the sky scrapers and buildings all over Chicago.
