The location of the hotel is absolutely perfect with lots of restaurants and shops nearby. It is also walking distance from the Cloud Gate (mirrored bean in other words)The staff is very cooperative. In fact, they were able to proceed with my checkin an hour ahead of schedule. Surprisingly, the prices of the room were not too high. Overall, I really enjoyed my stay here and would definitely recommend this hotel! One point to note is that the base category of rooms do not face the river. So keep that in mind while booking.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing view
text: Stayed here two weeks, the staff is so nice and helpful. The breakfast, lunch and dinner were very delicious. The hotel room was very clean, and the cleaning staff were always attentive of me. Would love to stay here again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Stay was great
text: This is one of the coolest hotels in Chicago.  Great location, great staff, awesome decore and ambiance throughout.  It has a great feel between old and new and the front desk team were great.  Thank you for the hospitality.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best hotel in Chicago overall
text: I had thought about staying here for the past month or two, but had always found other hotels with lower rates that suited me well. The rates lowered with the pandemic due to low demand, so I changed my booking for this week to this hotel and I was not disappointed at all.I booked a standard king room and figured I would be able to get some sort of upgrade since I'm a Gold member. I started staying at Hilton properties at the beginning of the year and did a status match from a competitor. When I arrived, I asked the front desk staff, Saif, about a complimentary upgrade. He suggested a Vista Room with a good view, but I actually prefer extra space to work with, so I asked if there was a 1 bedroom suite, and there was. I was informed that there would not be much of a view, but I was fine with that. I got my keys and was informed that the restaurant and room service were closed down due to the pandemic, which is completely understandable. Also, I was informed that housekeeping will not be servicing any room until after checkout (probably due to lower staffing needs from low occupancy as well as health reasons), which is not a problem to me since I can easily get any extra amenities by asking the front desk.When I entered my room on the 19th floor, I was pleasantly surprised by how luxurious the furniture looked and how spacious the bathroom was for not having a tub in it (which is fine because I prefer a walk-in shower anyway). I think this hotel is just as luxurious feeling as Waldorf Astoria in Gold Coast, but is much more affordable. The bathroom hygiene products were absolutely fabulous-smelling. I think the bed was the most comfortable bed I've slept on while staying at a hotel in quite some time, since I felt rested and recharged each morning. The elevator was right next to the bathroom wall, but it wasn't overly loud or annoying to me and seemed more like background sound than anything. I could not hear the elevator in the bedroom the entire time I was sleeping, so being next to the elevator was not even a big deal.My fiance was coming later in the evening after I arrived to stay over with me and I told them that they were going to love the room, which they did. We both like this hotel so much that we will be staying here more often. Matthew checked on us the morning we were going to check-out and I told him that everything was wonderful with our stay and that we really appreciate how we got a wonderful upgrade.I did experience an issue with my room keys not working about 3 hours after checking in, which I've noticed seems to happen at other Hilton properties anytime I get a complimentary upgraded room (perhaps others have this happen to them and this can be looked into). I had my digital key, so I just went down to the front desk to get them reprogrammed not much longer after. I also could not get the Chromecast to work on either TV, so I requested assistance with it when I got my keys reprogrammed. The engineer showed up a few minutes after I returned to my room and was able to get one of them working again after a reboot, but not the one in the bedroom. I was grateful that the engineer tried to fix both and left it at that, since I normally stream on my tablet and am used to doing that anyway.I definitely put this hotel at the top of my list for Chicago for service and comfort. I will be returning to stay again for sure.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engaged on the cupola
text: Manny assisted in arranging our engagement atop the Cupola. I found the Cupola online, reached out to him via e-mail and he did a masterful job at keeping me in the loop in the process leading up to the engagement day. We showed up, Manny walked us out while keeping my fiance distracted with conversation, exited the elevator and within 5-6 steps, BAM! The cupola was decorated with a table, champagne and rose petals on the ground. Manny even gave us plenty of options to contact a photographer, so we were able to have photos taken for an hour after the proposal. I would absolutely book again at the Cupola. LondonHouse showed us excellent customer service and made the whole process seamless for us.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Customer Service
text: We had booked a trip to Chicago months ago, before all the restrictions due to COVID-19. When we arrived in Chicago, the hotel rates were significantly lower than when we originally booked. Matthew Sheehan at the front desk was amazing, cancelled our previous reservation for no charge and re-booked our rooms under the current (much lower) rates. It was such a relief considering all the other stress going on, and saved us a lot of money! We really enjoyed our stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best weekend ever
text: This was perfect for walking and the energy and service was great! Bess was my favorite employee, he is so sweet and always goes the extra mile!The rooms were always cleaned so perfect and the bar is perfect! Views are amazing!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic hotel in every way!
text: My husband I brought two guests to the LondonHouse for the weekend.  The hotel could not have a better location in downtown Chicago and we had beautiful rooms overlooking the river!  We cannot say enough about the helpfulness of the hotel staff, from the front desk person who helped us connect to the internet, to the wonderful concierge who helped our guest find a doctor because he had forgotten his eye medicine.  We would not hesitate to stay at the LondonHouse again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very nice, great location
text: I'm a frequent business traveler and have been Chicago many times, and stayed in the most Hilton properties. This is my first time at the London house a Hilton Curio collection. Very cool, Chic place, great location and a amazing Rooftop Bar. Yessica at the front desk was especially helpful. Great Hotel experiences start the great staff

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A fantastic stay
text: Great location. Classic and clean rooms. Professional and friendly staff. After knowing that I had a bad experience with my flight due to cancellations, April and Bess upgraded my room with a river view and made sure I got everything for the stay, which made me feel like home. Highly recommend.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay
text: Really enjoyed the location and the person who checked us in was great. The rooftop was a dream and the type of liquor that was available was incredible. I would highly recommend staying here if you‚Äôre into the finest things in life.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: What a super hotel!
text: The location is perfect. The decor is very European and tasteful and the breakfast downstairs in the attached restaurant is good. I was there for five nights and really enjoyed my stay. I can always count on the quality of Hilton/Curio collection hotels. The view from the room is amazing, overlooking the river and the ‚Äòbean‚Äô just steps away. There linens are super high quality and thread count and it was nice to have a nespresso in the room. I don‚Äôt even drink coffee but I was enticed to have one each morning. :)

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Well worth the price!
text: Great location, stylish rooms, comfortable beds, and friendly staff who always greet you. This was my second time staying here and I would definitely come back when visiting the same area. My only advice is to avoid staying near the elevators as you can hear them through the walls. You can also hear your neighbors opening and closing their doors quite easily.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wedding - Steve Sleczka
text: We had our wedding ceremony and reception here on 2.29.2020 and it was perfect.  Steve and his team went above and beyond our expectations from the moment we met them.  The communication was high all throughout the planning process, and the execution was impeccable.  As neither of us are from Chicago, the majority of our guests traveled in and stayed at the LondonHouse.  Everyone was so complimentary of the rooms, the service, and especially the food.  The cocktail hour and dinner were spectacular.   I wish I could do it all over again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Elegant all round; outsourced cafe is not so much.
text: Hilton has got this Curio collection down just right. Enjoyed the modern conveniences AND the old charm of the guest rooms with real walls, stately windows... Valet parking only and boy is it pricey!The service was impeccable. They bent over backwards to solve the bad smell of pot on one of the floors. Hope they figure out the source before it gives them a bad name. A disappointment that a Hilton has no restaurant. Less said about outsourced cafe downstairs the better.I must compliment them for follow up calls to discuss my issues and update on fixing the odors. The credit to my bills as a compensation for the  inconveniences was a nice touch.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing!!!
text: The hotel experience was amazing. We received a warm greeting from April. She was a true definition of customer service. Hilton should have more individuals like April, people like her are the reason why we do business here at Hilton and why we are Diamond members. Thanks April we appreciate you!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Definitely recommend it!
text: The hotel and staff were absolutely top notch! We ve had a wonderful time. The room was beautiful,  clean and had an amazing view. A special shout-out to Chasity as she was wonderful! After checking out we had to wait in the hotel lobby for a few hours and she was always checking on us, making sure we don't need drinks or snacks.  Congrats to the management for hiring such caring people! We will definitely come back to this hotel!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engagement Proposal!
text: It was time for me to pop the question and I wanted an excellent venue to make the moment magical. London House had some special meaning to our relationship so there was no doubt that would be the perfect spot to ask. There I worked with Manny, who went above and beyond to create the perfect scene of romance and emotion. Manny also helped coordinate with the photographer and plan every moment during our reservation. Thank you London House & especially Manny for making that moment perfect! We will be back for a lifetime of business.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Long w‚Äôend in Chicago
text: Great room, view, staff, location - made our little getaway easy and relaxing.  Concierge was very helpful and provided great recommendations and even a few discounts. Room had good tech amenities- smart tv, Bluetooth radio, good wireless internet.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Practically perfect in every way!
text: Ladies and Gentlemen, It is practically perfect in every way. I was welcomed with a huge smiling face, while being surrounded by live Jazz music in the lobby, beautiful Friday night. Recognized as a Hilton Honors Member.  Since I‚Äôm also a Hospitality student, every hotel I stay, I check every single detail, couldn‚Äôt find anything wrong with Londonhouse. So, KUDOS! Every staff member from Guest Services, Housekeeping to Food and Beverage has a huge smile on their face. They were very attentive. Room was clean and nicely equipped for the guest. I couldn‚Äôt get the name of the gentleman working at the Bridges Bar this morning, he had a beard, very professional and he has been amazing, Thank you so much. Unfortunately I couldn‚Äôt see the rooftop bar, it was closed, maybe because of high winds, I don‚Äôt  know. but next time for sure. :)

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Love, love, love historic building LondonHouse!
text: The location of this hotel cannot be beat: Michigan Ave, Riverfront, the Loop. A historic building, beautiful from the outside AND the rooms inside are amazing. Plenty of space (enough for me to do yoga), lots of light options (natural and good lamps), nice to have a fridge, great coffeemaker. Bathrooms are large and well-appointed. I even love the lotions/soaps/shampoo/conditioner.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay
text: We stayed at the London house for a weekend getaway. Conveniently located, friendly staff, beautiful hotel and a great vibe. Loved the rooftop bar and gorgeous view.  Also loved the entertainment in the lobby bar on Saturday night, the guitarist was great! Will certainly stay here again next time we‚Äôre in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Desk Service by Chasity
text: Excellent Desk Service by Chasity. She was able to look up my reservation fairly quickly and did not waste any of my time. She followed up with by handing me my key cards and informed me about the different floors, and the hotel amenities.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome!!
text: Stayed for a long weekend for Hubby‚Äôs birthday.  When Bess and Chasity at the front desk found out the reason for the visit, they graciously upgraded us to a larger room and gave us two free drinks at the lobby bar.  From housekeeping to every single person at the on-site amenities and restaurants, everyone was wonderful, warm and friendly.  I‚Äôd definitely stay here again as well as recommend it to anyone wanting to visit Chicago and stay at a first class hotel with an awesome location!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Birthday gift
text: My husband and I stayed at the wonderful hotel for a night on the town and we were not disappointed.   We loved this hotel, its location, view of river and all the beautiful bridges.  Ken checked us in and was wonderful.  Made us feel so welcome and was so accommodating.  Even texted us to say have a great time seeing the Donna Summers musical.    I Would recommend this hotel  to everyone!  Thank you

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great spot in Chicago
text: Stayed for 3 nights. Fantastic location for access to all the Chicago highlights. Easy to get to from the airport by taking the Blue line and walking a couple of blocks. Room was great. There was a noise issue overnight which the hotel took care if immediately when it was brought to their attention. Overall a great place to stay and I would certainly choose it again

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chicago in February
text: The location is fantastic. Right in the river in the heart of great food and things to do. The staff was first class and the room was great with lots of windows and super comfortable bed. Fitness center had good options including a concept 2 rower and Pelton bikes.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent service at a lovely hotel!
text: This hotel has some of the best customer service I‚Äôve ever received. I had some issues at the hotel ‚Äî which were not the fault of the hotel ‚Äî and Matthew S. provided perfect customer service with both. Then, after the fact, when I alerted the hotel to the great service provided by Matthew, I was contacted by Kevin S. to make sure I was fully satisfied. Just all around excellent service. Also, the hotel clearly deserves its stellar reputation. The common areas are stylish and comfortable, the location is fantastic, and the rooms are stylish, comfortable, and nicely-appointed as well. If you like views and a lot of natural light, be sure to book a vista room as you will not regret it.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent location and service
text: King Vista room with a view of the river - just what we needed for a quick getaway.  Walking distance from the train and perfectly situated between theater district and Miracle Mile.  Special thanks to Mark Z at the door - your friendly service oriented style provides an excellent first and last impression of this property.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Simply Exquisite
text: LondonHouse is a beautifully decorated hotel situated on Wacker Dr. From the moment I arrived I enjoyed the energy and vibe. Luxurious but not pretentious. The hotel is near everything you could possibly need or want. The staff is very friendly and welcoming. I was given a nice upgrade and received a lovely note from the staff. The rooms are beautiful with great views of the river. Ocean Prime steakhouse was wonderful with excellent service. Valet parking is a tad pricey but the retrieval is quick. I had a wonderful experience here and would recommend it to anyone.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Another Fantastic Stay
text: From checking with Ken (truly cares and ensures your accommodations are met) to the quality, amenities, location, rooftop, and on and on.  Hosting a team meeting in a hotel with the most spectacular views!  Thanks to the entire staff.  Call outs to; Audrey, Liliana, Ken, Michael (AV).

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Won my ‚ù§Ô∏è
text: My team and I visited Chicago for NBA Allstar Weekend. We checked into the London after a horrendous weekend experience at another hotel in Chicago. Ken from the front desk was more than phenomenal. He got us checked in and taken care of efficiently & expeditiously. The entire staff at the LondonHouse in Chicago is amazing. Ceicil in the restaurant  provides excellent service as well. Honestly, I can go on and on about the service at this hotel. I am officially stamping LondonHouse Chicago as the official hotel in Chicago for ADAMSüçéFAMILYüå≥GROUP.Thank You Ken, Ceicil, and the entire LondonHouse Team. We look forward to seeing you all again in the future! -Nichole Lee

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Directly facing massive TRUMP logo
text: I booked a ‚Äúriver view‚Äù room and paid a small premium for it. Little did I know until I got to my room that I was directly facing a huge ‚ÄúTRUMP‚Äù logo on the hotel across the river. I kept my curtains shut. Great hotel other than that.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Outstanding
text: In Chicago for business. Stated at the London. Left valuables (wedding ring) on the bed. Housekeeping took the time to write note and secure the ring. Impeccable service and honesty. Best service I have received in a long time. Highly recommend.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Place for a Get Away
text: I needed a get away stat; the London House was an excellent choice to get away without leaving the state. Everything I needed was in this hotel, restaurants, bar, spa. Definitely a gem; thumbs up, yes.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nike NBA All-Star Weekend
text: April was a really great help to the staff that was doing security here at the hotel. We really appreciated her help.I hope that she would always Continue to always be a great service to customers that come through.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Electrician
text: April was very friendly and professional. She provided excellent customer service the entire time...absolutely wonderful experience at the scenic view of the lounge. She made sure to engage with me the entire time.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Front Counter Service
text: I had a couple issues with my room before arriving that was not the fault of LondonHouse, but through my company booking the room block. After having so many things to change up from payment, to room number, and style of room, I found myself satisfied with the help from April. April gave superb customer service and I was totally pleased with how persistent and courteous she was to fix those issues. April represented LondonHouse with top notch premium service. My experience staying here will be remembered, because of her.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel with a river view
text: Great hotel with a river view in the center of the city. Transport facilities are very comfortable. Breakfast is nice and affordable.The reception area is very comfortable, especially the rooftop bar and the facilities offer eating and drinking pleasure on an outdoor terrace, which is not available in many hotels.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engagement Proposal in Cupola Experience
text: From initial contact, to discovering what I wanted in my Engagement, to delivery of the services, Manny gave me and my fiance a dream proposal setting on the rooftop Cupola. Flawless execution in every aspect and he even gave me recommendations on photographers. I ended up selecting a photog from the ones he recommended due to their experience with the Cupola. Just an easy feeling that he took over all planning and made sure everything was perfect. Couldn't be more happy. The hotel itself is always an iconic place to stay and the attention to detail throughout the establishment is top notch. Being a Diamond Hilton member, I always try to stay here when in Chicago for any trip.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Staff is wonderful!
text: We arrived late on Friday night and were greeted by Mike and Donnie. They couldn't have been any nicer and Mike upgraded our room at no charge. I am so impressed with our whole experience and stay at Londonhouse, we will not stay anywhere else going forward! Thanks for the hospitality and incredible experience Mike and Donnie!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very good experience
text: Stayed for 2 nights over the weekend. Very good location in middle of downtown, ‚Äúeverything‚Äù in walking distance. Clean modern rooms. Nice breakfast restaurant inside the building. Very nice rooftop bar with amazing view, good bar at the lobby with live music on weekend. - complicated TV operation and light switching in rooms (like in many other hotels) - nice Nespresso machine in room but limited to one small zip per guest

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Kevin is amazing
text: Kevin is the absolute best showed up at the London house this weekend for a friends birthday we were greeted by him with a smile on his face He made everything so easy and simple cannot wait to stay here again

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great experience!
text: We were pleasantly greeted by a man named Kevin! He was incredibly helpful and friendly. I will recommend this place to everybody I know that is staying in Chicago. The hotel room was very clean and nice

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great time!
text: Kevin Stabile honestly made this trip so wonderful! He was so willing to help us out and make sure that we had a great time. This hotel is absolutely luxurious and I would recommend it to any of my closest friends!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Astonishing
text: Exceptional service,  plush, and hospitable.  The river view is astounding. It is close to many different shops, restaurants,  and site seeing places.  A phenomenal view from the rooftop.  It far exceeded my expectations.  A must visit if ever in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location - Terrible Staff
text: great location. terrible staff. rude and arrogant. dont expect to get any help on arrival. there was none.  during the stay staff were dismissive and curt in their responses coming across rude and disinterested. Funky lift system that no one explains to you so you could get stuck in a lift for a few minutes not know what to do.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: stay-cation
text: We stayed at Londonhouse last night for a mid-week stay-cation. This is one of our go-to hotels in downtown Chicago. The location is ideal for shopping, dining and seeing so many of the tourist attractions that Chicago has to offer. Our room was great, bed so comfortable and loved our view of the river and city. Special shout out to Shannon Boland & the rest of the concierge team for making our stay extra special. We just love visiting this hotel and will be back in the near future.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Kick-Off Meeting
text: We had an amazing company meeting at the hotel last week.   From Ariella and Lydia from the Sales & Catering Department to Maria in the accounting department, everyone was on point for our meeting.  The attendees enjoyed the accommodations and we received rave reviews on the food and beverage at the meeting.  The hotel has some of the best views in the city.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Anniversary trip
text: My husband and I celebrated our first anniversary at London House.  We had a King Vista suite and the view was amazing, looking up and down the Chicago River.  The room had two TVs, a sitting room, and the best bed we‚Äôve ever slept in.  Upon arrival we walked in our room and were delightfully surprised with 6 enormous chocolate covered strawberries and a lovely card signed by the concierge Shannon.  This is thoughtful customer service and a kind touch.  In addition to the beautiful view, exceptional customer service, the hotel is in a beautiful historic building.  I look forward to returning to LondonHouse and will tell people it‚Äôs the only place to stay in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Quick visit
text: Our visit was only two days, but this staff is excellent. Very nice rooms. We had a maintenance issue and a housekeeping issue but it was taken care of quickly. Very friendly. Wish they had a gift shop but everything was fine including drinks and room service.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location, nice rooms
text: Great location on the river and Michigan Ave.  New building, modern vibe, clean lobby decor.  Easy check-in.  (Way slow valet). Strange modern elevators take some time getting used to be they tend to be fairly quick.  Get an upper floor room with the views and to avoid street noise.Large room, very good linen, large tv and decent WiFi.   Rooftop bar is a scene‚Äî the place to be...I found it crowded but early in the weekday afternoons it was really nice

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: My Favorite Chicago Hotel
text: I've stayed here many times and really love this hotel.  Great location and views. It is such a unique hotel I love the vibe.  I've had several great personal stays and it's always a great for business.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The only place to stay in Chicago.
text: We‚Äôve just come to the end of a really enjoyable three nights stay at LondonHouse Chicago. Booking from home in the UK, I knew I wanted something luxurious to finish our trip of the Midwest and it‚Äôs important also for me to be right in the thick of it for easy walking to the local attractions. I guess when I first came across this place I didn‚Äôt expect a lot for the price of the rooms but then the reviews were very favourable and location checked out so I figured I‚Äôd go for it. It completely exceeded my expectations. The hotel is bang in the centre of Downtown, just off the famous ‚ÄòMagnificent Mile‚Äô. It‚Äôs also directly opposite the towering behemoth that is Trump International and its much classier neighbour, The Langham. Both are five star hotels and rank highly as options for a luxury stay, but both also have prices double the price of the LondonHouse just the other side of the river and which is actually a little closer to top attractions like The Art Institute (a must-see) and also CloudGate / Millennium Park. Speaking frankly, I can‚Äôt see that you‚Äôd be getting a better deal there versus here. Our room was an absolute steal. On checking in we were assigned one of the vista rooms on the 17th floor (1721 to be precise). Luxuriously appointed, with a fantastic bed and commanding stunning nighttime views down the river, it‚Äôs everything you could ever want. The Malin+Goetz toiletries are the icing on the cake. Whilst staying I also checked out the gym for a short workout and found it more than adequate. Whilst it is, indeed, windowless and not large, it‚Äôs tastefully decorated with a good range of aerobic, resistance machine and free weights. It‚Äôs more a fitness suite than gym but it‚Äôs more than sufficient for the size of hotel and room rate in my eyes. I didn‚Äôt check out the rooftop bar, which I know is one of the hotel‚Äôs pulls, mostly as we were out late the nights we stayed and both agreed the view wouldn‚Äôt be hugely different than that from our room just a couple of floors below. All in all, we were delighted with our stay and I‚Äôd not only recommend to friends and family but return myself without a second‚Äôs hesitation.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House
text: Nice hotel with good location near restaurants and activities and great views.  Rooms were clean and staff was very friendly.  Drinks specials were good and the roof top bar was lively and had great views as well.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The stay at the London house
text: The stay was nice staff was great the overall experience was nice the room was very nice the view was perfect the beds were comfy no complaints checking in and out was a breeze staff what very helpful

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful historic hotel, great rooftop bar.
text: This is a really lovely historic boutique hotel! Staff at reception were friendly and helpful. There are two bar areas - a main lobby bar with live music and a restaurant, and a bar upstairs that serves bar snacks. The upstairs bar has access to a really cool outdoor rooftop area with beautiful views of the city. Drinks were expensive, but that‚Äôs not unusual in nice city hotels.The rooms were nice, and the bathrooms were modern and spacious.Great location on the river - we didn‚Äôt get a chance to go out and walk around, but I think you could easily walk around to restaurants, bars, millennium park, etc.We only had one night here while we were in transit - but loved it, and will definitely be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Birthday Trip
text: I made a great choice by picking this hotel to celebrate my birthday. Customer service is amazing . I will stay here everything I  visit Chicago .  Anthony ( concierge ) amazing ! April ( front desk) amazing !  Thank you ! I will be back !

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Bed so comfortable you'll miss your flight!!
text: Everything about this stay was amazing! This hotel is probably one of the best i've ever stayed at. Every employee i encountered was amazing, Chasity, Matt, and Grace at the front desk were awesome. Cecil was amazing at the lobby bar. Dina was awesome at the rooftop bar along with another bartender that eludes my memory but basically everyone and everything was amazing!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful Stay
text: The spectacular  view from our room was to the north up Michigan Avenue.  It was beautiful both during the day and at night, and made our our stay even more enjoyable.  Every staff member we encountered was friendly, helpful and courteous.  The staff at the entry door were all wonderful - especially Mark.   We had drinks in the Bridges Bar two evenings, and enjoyed the atmosphere, the views, the well-crafted drinks and the company of the bartender.  This was our third stay at London House - the location is the best, the hotel is beautiful, our room luxurious and the staff were wonderful.  We will certainly return for another stay.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic view and friendly service
text: Nice location, beautiful interior and friendly staffs. Room was big, the view was really fantastic. However, it took a while to join the queue for check-in though Mike was really friendly and gave us a warm impression. As a Hilton gold member you got a $12 credit per person at Land and Lake kitchen on first floor.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Hotel. Best Location. Best Service
text: As a Diamond member, we stay at Hilton properties in many cities and this property is definitely at the very top of my list. I was about to book the Conrad, but decided to change it here at the very last minute and that was a great decision. Location, views, and service are amazing. The food at Land and Sea is also There is nothing else that I could have asked. Will definitely make it back next time that we are in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Management went above and beyond
text: Ken at check in was very helpful and got us into our room early. We had one minor issue and management went above and beyond to remediate this and make sure we are satisfied with their hotel. Special thanks to Paloma for her attention to detail and leadership of her staff. We look forward to staying at London House again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great view, great service
text: The building is beautiful, it has a great location and, with a little luck, you‚Äôll get a view to the Riverwalk. People who work at the front desk and in the administration area are very nice, always caring about their clients even if they already parted.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: CUSTOMER SERVICE
text: April was great! Very attentive, she accommodated us very well for my spouse's birthday. Her suggestions were spot on, I definitely appreciated her during my check in process. The manager was great also, overall the staff rocks

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing hotel
text: Absolutely stunning hotel right in the heart of everything.  Beautifully decorated, spacious rooms (we had a river view room), clean.  Walls and windows also appeared to be soundproofed, despite being in the middle of a very busy area we didn't hear a sound for our whole stay.  Staff were also very pleasant and helpful.  Only (small) downside is that the elevators were a little slow.  Highly recommended!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Probably the best rooftop bar in Chicago
text: I would say that from the all rooftops I‚Äôve been to in Chicago , probably LondonHouse has the best view. Really enjoyed sipping a cocktail with this view upfront . The is an open terrace and also the inside one.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A Chicago gem
text: A gem in Chicago. Great location. Iconic architecture. Modern amenities. Absolutely terrific! Staff was great. Rooms were comfortable and spacious. Lobby bar is cool and the rooftop bar offers spectacular views.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location and staff
text: I had a trip to Chicago last weekend and we decided to stay at this hotel, best decision ever. Location is great, staff was super friendly and helpful (Specially Ken at the lobby), and even the food I ordered to my room was delicious. Id definitely stay again there.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful stay!
text: I had such an amazing stay here last time I had to come back. I was checked in by Paloma who was extremely polite and made me feel very welcome. She also pointed out somethings near by if I was intrested in food and shopping. The room was clean and just looked wonderful! Guess I'll be coming back for a 3rd stay soon!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great base for exploring the city with a few improvements possible....some great aftercare service!
text: Recently visited Chicago for the first time the week before xmas. Decided on LondonHouse after much research as seemed to offer good value for money plus an excellent location.On arrival in the evening, we proceeded to check-in which is on level 2 as others have mentioned, easily accessed in the lift. Check-in was quick, simple and efficient, but lacked any personality really or warmth. We paid the extra in advance for a river view which would highly recommended, great being able to look out over the city and watch the world go by. Room was spacious right in the corner, very clean and a SUPER comfy bed. Shower and bathroom very nice as well. Just a few things could have been improved here,- No tea facilities. They provided a fancy coffee machine, but if you want a tea its room service only, which is a shocker given even the cheapest 1star hotels probably provide a kettle.- You cant adjust the pressure of the shower as this is hand in hand with the temperatureFor exploring, the hotel couldn't be better. Location was excellent and seemed to be able to reach all the attractions of the city very easily. It was also a good reference point being right in the middle of the city.A great base to stay really, it's just that I feel personality and service was lacking. This might be because of the lobby being on level 2, and so you only interact with any staff during check-in and check-out as most other times its room level to ground. This just created a gap in terms of service I felt, as the only people you saw daily were the bell boys on your way out the door.Would highly recommend and stay again, just not quite the 5star service I've experienced elsewhere.Note- My original review was for 4 stars, however since posting I was contacted by the Director of the Front Office which was quite surprising. She seemed genuinely interested into my points raised on my review above and said how these will be looked to be improved. It made a refreshing change for a hotel to reach out directly and even offered a partial refund due to the points made which was quite unbelievable as we did have a great overall stay. I therefore felt the need to highlight this great service recovery and amend my post to a 5 star as I really was impress with the after service here, and as already stated, would highly recommend the hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Gorgeous Hotel Overlooking the River
text: Stunning hotel. As a Chicago native we stayed here for a date night. Ken at the front desk was amazing & changed our room when he realized we had hoped for a view & wow was it a view! Already planning another night here. Great customer service. Gorgeous hotel. Thanks Ken! We will be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nice Hotel
text: Very clean, excellent room service, friendly staff.  The location is right on the river.  Tons of places to eat. I would stay here again if in the area.  This is a Hilton property so you can also add to your points and the price was reasonable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful view
text: Came here for a quick 2 night stay and had an absolutely lovely experience. The view of the city was sensational and the staff was very welcoming. Their interactions were genuine and every department truly worked well together. I was excited to be so close to the downtown area and I will gladly return. For now, goodbye Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Charming hotel on the river
text: This hotel definitely exceeded my expectations. The people at check in were very helpful and thoughtful and went above and beyond to be sure I had a good experience. I loved that you could get complimentary water at the front desk whenever you wanted it.The room was mid-sized and overlooking the river with an average bathroom and average amenities. One small issue was the noise. I specifically requested a room with a bathtub to take a bath, and that room happened to be on a lower floor (the 6th floor), which meant you did get a bit of traffic noise. They were very kind in accommodating me with a room that had a bathtub. On the other hand, the beds and the pillows were extremely comfortable, which made for a good night's sleep.There was also a Nespresso machine in the room, which is always a nice plus.The location is very walkable. You are 5 blocks to the Bean and the park, as well as a short walk to the main shopping areas and the pier. There is also a Corner Bakery downstairs, which is convenient for coffee and breakfast.I did not get up to the roof as it was very cold when I stayed at the hotel, though it is supposed to be worth checking out. I can imagine it would be a fun hotel during the summer. Overall, it is definitely an above average hotel. I would consider staying here again. For the hotel class and the price, it is a good find.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Staff. Great Location. Great Hotel!
text: Stayed at London House in December 2019. From check-in, staff was very helpful and friendly. Have stayed at other hotels in Chicago and LH so far has been the most enjoyable. Ended up with a great room viewing over the river and Michigan Avenue. Throughout the stay LH communicated via text, checking in making sure everything was ok. Ken, Shannon, Keith, Viktor and Jalesa were all great and super nice.I normally do not write reviews, but was very happy to see that LH has great customer service. This is what made the stay the best. As to the hotel, the room was city sized, but very clean and very nice. Has a refrigirator, great TV, which yes, allowed to use streaming apps via chromecast. This was a nice plus that I don't see everywhere yet. The rooftop bar is probably the best in Chicago, it is such a beatiful view. We had great weather, so had a chance to enjoy a drink on the rooftop in December. Even though there is no service on the rooftop in winter, the Bar on 21 is great. You can grab a drink there (LH Old Fashioned's are the best!) and then pop up on the rooftop to get some pictures and great views. I had been to the rooftop in summertime as well, which of course is even better! The Bridges lobby bar is also really nice and comfortable. Lastly we ate at the restaurant Ocean Prime, which is in the hotel. This place is a whole other review in itself. Dinner was fantastic! I really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again. Next time we stay downtown, without a doubt, it will be at London House!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Londonhouse Curio Collection
text: Staff were friendly and helpful. The room was clean with a nice view of downtown. Staff went out of their way to provide helpful information for Hilton honors members. The valet service was very helpful.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Customer Service-
text: I wanted to make my daughter 21 birthday special.  Decided to book a room at Londonhouse based on awesome reviews to celebrate her day.  Thank you to Ken and Jalisa for the room upgrade...the View was amazing!  and the complimentary drinks was a special touch! We had a great night and your interests to make sure she had a great time did not go un-noticed.  Kudos for the excellent customer service by all team members. I will return!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fabulous location, rooms, service, price - everything!
text: The location right on the river at Michigan Avenue provides great views and easy access to everything downtown and many tourist spots.  The hotel is beautiful as are the rooms, and the beds are among the most comfortable we have ever slept in anywhere.  The service at check-in and -out was friendly and helpful.  It is great having indoor access to 3 great restaurants, in addition to the hotel's own restaurant.  The room rate we got was incredible given the quality of the room, the view, the location, etc.  We won't ever stay anywhere else in Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Another Excellent Business Stay
text: We have stayed at LondonHouse, part of the Hilton Curio Collection, several times. Each stay has been good, and all have been on business. It was a few days of business meetings, which brought us back to LondonHouse in February. We had done a business dinner at the airport Hilton, and then moved to LondonHouse, the next morning. As my wife had meetings starting early, I checked us in, but due to the early hour, our room was not ready, and I had not expected it to be. I had our luggage stored, and retired to the lobby bar, until we had a room.Being HHonors Diamond members, we got an upgrade, and I was assigned Room 1909. This was our second stay in that room, and we find it to be very nice. It is in the newer section of the LondonHouse, which spans over two buildings: one, the historic building, closer to the Lake, and then the newer building, up the River. Personally, I really liked our corner suite in the historic section, with views of both the River, and the Lake (or a small portion of the Lake), but the rooms in the newer section are nice, as well.The room features a comfortable King bed, a small sitting area, an ample bathroom, and a closet large enough for all of our business clothing. This room features plenty of drawers for clothing storage, as well. The closet has an iron, ironing board, and safe, and it is of a horizontal design, so that one does not have to worry about their tablets, etc falling out, when opened. I really prefer these to the vertical wall-mount safes, and am always glad to see them.Room 1909's bathroom, while small, and with a single sink, with an adequately large vanity area, and a nice walk-in shower was satisfactory for us. This is a benefit to my wife, who has two artificial hips. The tub/shower combos are just not as comfortable, or convenient for her. I feel that the LondonHouse has the shower specifications in our dossier, and that is why we have now been in this particular room twice - if so, very, very nice touch.This room has a double thermostat setup, and both worked well, allowing us to keep the temperature of the bedroom a bit cooler. When I entered, the room heat was on, but was easily adjusted down, where it stayed - nice and cool, though it was cold outside. I liked that we also had remote controls for the shades in the bedroom, and with the blackout shade employed, the room was adequately dark. As there is a giant, bright sign on the Trump Tower, just across the River, and immediately in front of Room 1909, the ability to shut out all light is a very positive aspect.We had a desk, a large flat-screen TV, and a small sitting area in the bedroom, and then, there was another TV and small sofa, between the bedroom and the bathroom. That small sitting area, while not all that useful, is nice, just for the room that it affords. There is a frosted glass panel, between it, and the bedroom, so it‚Äôs not quite like having a separate room to watch TV, if one is sleeping in the bedroom. However, it does offer a sound buffer, if one is in the shower, while the other is still sleeping.Room 1909 has ample AC and USB ports, plus good horizontal surfaces for charging devices. With all of our various devices, this is a big positive, and it seems that the interior designers had the business traveler in mind, when they did LondonHouse.Our room, though facing the River, and East Upper Wacker Drive, was very quiet, and we also heard no noise from within the hotel. Actually, with the exception of the bar area, off of the lobby, the entire hotel is quiet, and even then, the bar, Bridges, is not that noisy, even in the evening, when it seems to fill up.While we had few interactions with the staff (beyond the bar), all were very pleasant and every request we had was quickly accommodated, with a friendly smile. Room 1909 felt like ‚Äúhome away from home,‚Äù and it was nice to be in a room, where we knew where things were. Stumbling around in the dark, in an unfamiliar hotel, is just never fun.We enjoy the location too, being just inside the Loop, but close to so very much. We find the LondonHouse to be very convenient.This was another excellent stay at the LondonHouse, and as my wife‚Äôs corporate office has moved to Chicago, we will be returning.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing views, great customer service
text: Weekend getaway to Chicago. Heard great things about the LondonHouse and we were certainly not disappointed in our stay. As Hilton Rewards members we were able to see the rooms available. We chose 1810, a vista king, and the views looking up the river to the west were amazing. Grace at the front desk was very friendly, welcomed us as Diamond members and answered a few questions patiently. The room itself is decent sized, bed was very comfortable, 55‚Äù TV with a lot of channels, and a great walk in shower. For breakfast we received two $12 vouchers. We both had benedicts and they were very taste as was the breakfast potatoes. Definitely go up the rooftop bar on the 21st floor. Great view of the city, especially at night. Location is great. Right off Michigan Ave, across from the Wrigley Building. We will definitely be back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: So relaxing
text: We were recently there just for an overnight stay. We had a delicious meal on the rooftop restaurant and relaxed in Bridges lounge. The drinks are impressive. On Friday nights, they have talented live entertainment. We were so relaxed on one of the comfy couches. We love going to LondonHouse, because you can have a fun, relaxing time without ever leaving the building. The staff is so friendly, accommodating and knowledgeable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Tremendous Property, Superior Staff
text: Beautiful building, at a tremendous central, historic and scenic location of Chicago. The staff are very friendly, proactive and supporting. I had a great check in experience, thanks to Ken - efficient, professional, and friendly and welcoming.I would like to return. Thanks

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Love the London House
text: Love this hotel!  The London House is a beautiful hotel and is very clean.  You will find the rooms to be very clean and modern.  The location is awesome to restaurants, Michigan Avenue and many other attractions.  The rooftop bar and restaurant has unbelievable!  Especially the hamburger in the restaurant at the top of the hotel.  Lastly the staff was extremely nice and prompt.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Exceptional stay at LondonHouse Chicago!
text: This was our first stay with LondonHouse Chicago. How delighted we were with the service, the gorgeous spaces, and many choices in the hotel and around the hotel for dining, walking and taking in Chicago sites. LondonHouse has a European flair which also gives us great pleasure when staying in a hotel. We have been fortunate to travel the world, and LondonHouse rivaled some of the best. A comfortable, friendly, and elegant hotel. Our room looked down the river which lit up with a spectacular sunset. It was well appointed and very comfortable. It was a wonderful place to retreat to in the bustle of the city. One could walk to the Christmas Market, museums, and so much more. A perfect location. Valet/Concierge services were excellent and our greeting when checking in from the front desk was exceptional. We dined in each of their restaurants and enjoyed each of them. Food was delicious and service was exceptional. We travel to Chicago often and will now make this our first choice when staying in a hotel. Truly, a magnificent experience in Chicago! Thank you LondonHouse!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: New Year's Eve 2019
text: Stayed in the Vista Suite for New Year's Eve and attended the rooftop bar for the NYE party and had a blast. Ken from the front desk was amazing and made checking out a breeze. He is a true professional and an asset to the property. The hotel is state of the art of luxury looking forward to my next stay!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Stay
text: Nice location! We had the best view of Chicago! The hotel is clean and quiet. The service is excellent. The staff upgraded us a better room for an additional fee. It was worth it. Nice view in the rooftop during the night. We will definitely be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing hotel, great service!!!
text: I stayed in Londonhouse for 3 days  with my family for New Year‚Äôs Eve getaway. The hotel‚Äôs rooftop is so amazing with fascinating river views. Customer service in the lobby was so great. Front desk Paloma was so professional and accommodating  during the arrival.  She was very accommodating especially with my rooms request.  Kevin was so helpful and very informative giving us good info about the hotel and local services. I was able to spend dinner twice in the lobby and  I remember Jalesa too was there greeting and accommodating us. Everything was so wonderful and I will choose and come back for sure for my future vacation.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel in a great location
text: Located in a beautiful historic building at the corner of Wacker and Michigan Ave...right across from the river.  Easy walking distance to Millenium Park and shopping areas.  Contemporary furnishings.  Amazing top floor terrace with view of the city

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect place to stay in Chicago.
text: The hotel is located at the corner of Michigan and Wacker.  Perfect location to enjoy all of the downtown attractions.  Incredible place to stay, friendly staff, fantastic amenities and rooms were comfortable and very well appointed.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Enjoyable family visit to Chicago
text: Great Place when visiting Chicago. Excellent view, close to everything. Over the top customer service and hotel personnel surpass any expected service level. I will return to the hotel on my next visit to Chicago

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: An amazing place to stay
text: We booked a room a few days before our stay.  The room was great with an amazing view.  But the service was even better.  The concierge and hotel staff handled all our reservations for dinner, wine, and flowers and everything else we needed.  We simply texted them our questions or needs and they responded quickly and exceeded our expectations!  This is the best place we have stayed at in Chicago!  We will be back soon!  Chad and Heather.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent !
text: Everything was perfect.. we could chat with the hotel thru the app 24/7..the location was perfect and close to downtown, excellent service, amazing river view, felt safe, awesome and friendly front desk staff, comfy beds, modern room, chromecast to cast from our devices.. we celebrated our anniversary with the perfect stay! We can‚Äôt forget the amazing view of the river on the rooftop.. thank you for an amazing time!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful Hotell
text: Everything about this hotel was amazing - great service, nice rooms, great views, rooftop bar and conveniently located to the great sites of Chicago. We really enjoyed being so near the river walk and near the theatre district to catch our show.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Hotel in the City
text: Great LondonHouse experience as always! Best hotel, best location, and best views in the city! The rooftop is a must. The staff is very attentive and knows the city well. You can walk to tourist attractions, historical areas, great food, and shopping! Only a block off Michigan, and right on the river. It was our 4th time and we will be back in March!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Property
text: We spent Christmas Eve at this property and as always it never fails to be one of my favorite in the Chicago area.  The property is so beautiful and the staff is always helpful.  The views from the rooms are great.  The rooms are always clean.  This is one of my favorite properties in the Chicago area.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
text: So many positive things I could rant about.  My stay alone has made me reconsider my home property as a Hilton employee. Biggest thing I noticed was happy and knowledgeable workers. April was very helpful the night I arrived. My significant other and I got situated and had the most comfortable sleep we've had since we relocated back to Chicago. We woke up and decided it was time to get a new mattress at home.The guest service Matthew was spot on with connecting my split reservation with no issues what so ever. And the rooftop host Jalen was extremely helpful in helping my party maneuver the roof top area. Overall, I was highly impressed with the attention to detail.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Christmas vacation
text: We spent this past week at the LondonHouse with our family for Christmas and everyone here has been  so welcoming. The level of service is top notch, and we cannot wait to return. Our family stayed in two  rooms that faced the river, and our room was a Vista Suite. It was great that we had a living area so we could hang our stockings and could meet to open presents. It definitely felt like our home away from home. The views and the proximity to Michigan Avenue are hard to match. We liked the technology of the smart elevators and were impressed by how quickly we were able to go from floor to floor. When we were sightseeing around the city, our five year old son proudly told everyone that he was going back to his hotel, the LondonHouse.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Anniversary Stay
text: My wife & I celebrated our 25th Anniversary and we were extremely satisfied with our experience and the views of the city.  Friendly and accommodating staff helped to enhance our experience.Thank you for your accommodations.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Girls Weekend
text: My girlfriends and I stayed at the LondonHouse for a Christmas-themed girls weekend. The location could not be more perfect and everyone we encountered was friendly and knowledgeable, especially Ken at the Front Desk and Connor in Housekeeping. I will definitely be returning!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse is the Whole Package
text: LondonHouse provides modern stylish rooms and warm, efficient hospitality at a great location in the center of Chicago.  It is a superb base for a stay in the city - walking distance to just about anywhere.  The room decor is sleek and modern, without being cold.  The public areas are strikingly well designed and decorated.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Weekender with the fam in Chi-Town
text: Awesome hotel.  Great location.  Hope prices stay the same.  Very clean.  Nespresso is why we keep coming back.  Super clean and affordable with great views of the Chicago River.  Super friendly staff who stay in touch via text to assure your stay is on point.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A gem
text: We recently stayed for a quick weekend trip to shop on Michigan Avenue and see the city lights. I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better hotel. Great location, wonderful rooms. Loved the drink specials in the lobby bar (sparkling Sunday). I was most appreciative that we were able to get into a room super early after an early flight. We will be back next year!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Drinks with a view!
text: Came to the Londonhouse for some drinks with friends. Great atmosphere and views from the 2nd floor lobby bar. Paloma at the front desk was extremely cordial and helpful! Cecil and Vinny and the bar provided excellent service and drink recommendations! Definitely coming back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Second Floor amazing!
text: I love the View and the environment is amazing! Kevin, Ana, Paloma we‚Äôre amazing people and provided excellent service. Everytime I come back I hope to be taken care by them and every staff member just like them!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House
text: I love the atmosphere so much and the service was great! Ana was super sweet and Kevin made sure we were taken care of. The view was stunning and we really had a wonderful stay! Will definitely be coming back very soon.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful stay !
text: This is a Phenomenal hotel , the room was impeccable! If u stay there u must ask for a room with a view! April at the front desk was so nice ! I‚Äôll definitely be returning on my next business trip.. .

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Shannon the Amazing Concierge
text: Shannon was amazing after chatting on the Hilton app with her, she was able to solve all issues and made for an amazing surprise. I will be booking again when in Chicago.The room was amazing and every detail was beyond my expectation.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent stay
text: Great hotel in the perfect location.Housed in an historic building in its own right, the extensive refurbishments have delivered a classy environment.Add quietly professional staff and what you have is a perfect spot for a business or vacation stay.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful
text: I traveled to Chicago for the First time and I could have not chosen a better hotel. Hands Down. Everything was just wonderful. Staff really make sure you have the best experience ever. I‚Äôm definitely Staying with them again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Better than magnificent!
text: We went for 3 days to see 3 shows and I couldn't have chosen a better hotel if I'd tried.  Besides the fact that it's location was prime and right in the center of all the action, it was just on the north end of the theatre district so we could walk to all of our shows.  Chicago was all dressed up for Christmas (as was the London House) and it was stupendous!!  BONUS:  it was two blocks from Stan's Donuts!!!   And the best part ... in my opinion, it was pretty reasonably priced for its location (considering it was only about $50 more per night than a Hampton Inn we stayed at in Danville, ILL.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great visit
text: In the last week I have stayed at the London House on Saturday and Monday night. The staff is so friendly and always willing to help with any special requests I have. The Concierges are the BEST in town and they always follow up with me to make sure everything was awesome!! Which it always is. You can tell the staff takes a lot of pride in their work and it shows on well the rooms are kept.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Outstanding Customer Service!
text: Kevin and the team at the front desk went above and beyond to make our stay an amazing experience. The views of the skyline were incredible. We've stayed at a number of hotels in the City, LondonHouse is now at the top of our list!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Customer Service! Overall amazing experience
text: Truly an amazing experience. When I first entered I was greeted with a warm and cheerful smile from Bess despite the fact that it was nearly 2 am. It was my first business trip and first time in Chicago, April made checking in a breeze and also suggested a couple of cool things to do while in Chicago which I really appreciated. The room was beautiful and CLEAN, the view was amazing, the restaurant in the hotel is amazing as well. Overall, I truly loved my experience and I will definitely be back again!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Night out on the town
text: Everything was great. King bed suit was roomy and the bathroom was spacious & trendy ! Bed was also comfortable! Black out shades were also appreciated! Loved the view of the street and river. Lobby was well decorated.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Hotel in Chicago!
text: Where do i start of.....First time in Chicago and every one was AMAZING! The Hotels Christmas decoration adds a touch. Paloma and her team were extraordinary! Kenny was great throughout our stay. Enjoyed very delicious food and drinks at Ocean Prime. The location is very close to everything. LondonHouse is a must stay hotel!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Girls' Overnight Getaway
text: This was our 3rd girls‚Äô overnight stay at the London House.  We will continue to book our overnights with the London House due to the amazing staff.   Once again, Trevor made our stay welcoming and memorable.  Thanks, Trevor, for another unforgettable stay.  Your professionalism along with your sincere friendliness, always makes our visits remarkably enjoyable.I‚Äôd also like to give a shout out to Cecil.  He offered great conversation, radiated warmth in his customer service, and had a genuine concern for our taste appreciation in the drinks he mixed.  He made the last hour before my friends and I had to catch our respective trains very Zen.The beds were comfortable.  We truly appreciated the shower cap, ponytail holder and other toiletries in the room.  Each of us needed something and it was all provided.The view from our room was beautiful!  The location is great.  The Riverwalk is across the street.  All of the shopping is nearby, as well as the much talked about, new Starbucks Roastery.  Their rooftop offers excellent views.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location, Trendy Clientele
text: The LondonHouse is close to everything in Chicago:  the Loop, theaters, Michigan Avenue are just steps away.  It is beautiful and the staff is good, though they could use more parking valets and bellmen.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: SPECTACULAR
text: The LondonHouse Chicago by far takes the cake compared to any hotel nearby. The stunning decor makes you feel like a king and queen walking into a palace. All, and I mean ALL, the staff members had a smile on their face and were attentive. Trevor from the front desk (the best looking guy in the whole building) was beyond kind and hooked us up with a view of the river on a higher floor. Jaylynn (spelling?) from the Rooftop Bar was also on his game and made sure we didn't wait long for a table. I will for sure be recommending the LondonHouse Chicago to everyone I know. This experience was one of a kind and we appreciate you all! Thank you for making our stay the best! : )

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very comfy beds
text: We really enjoyed our stay this past weekend.  Great location near The mag mile and all the shopping. We enjoyed a great night of sleep too. Really would like to buy that mattress, and reached out to hotel to see if we could get the mfg and style - very comfy. Rooms are small but nicely equipped with everything a guest could need . We would consider a return stay , even with all the choices in Chicago.  - a nice Hilton Property in a historic building.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Engagement
text: Our engagement was straight out of a fairytale. Manny helped create a memory that will last a lifetime. We could not be happier. With all the amazing options Chicago has for engagement locations, this one tops them all in both scenery and views, architecture, location, uniqueness, and thrills. Be sure to reserve a table on the patio afterwards for celebration drinks overlooking the city. Thanks again to Manny and team at LondonHouse!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Roof top - Bianca
text: First time visiting the hotel this pass week and had such a great time! At first it was a little complicated but a young lady I believe her name is Bianca, guided us through the hotel to go to the roof top. The view was phenomenal and the bar was amazing! Had it not been for her we would of been so lost. She was very patient, bubbly and kind! Thank you so much Bianca! Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Bianca in housekeeping
text: Bianca Aarons in housekeeping was amazing. She was very nice and responded to are needs very quickly. She helped us get around the hotel as well as provided us with fresh clean room everyday. Londonhouse you need to promote her, she is great. Alex C.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Location on the Chicago River
text: We had a wonderful stay at the London House ! Perfect Chicago location, perfect room and friendly staff. The hotel was decorated for the holidays and there were carolers dressed in period costumes. We will definitely stay here again when we return to Chicago !

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse has the BEST employees!
text: From the moment I arrived until the moment I departed, every single person connected with this hotel smiled, was very helpful and patient with my questions and requests. The rooms was so very clean and large. I had a corner room in an L shape. Nice size closet, large bathroom and counter space. Great water pressure in the shower. In the room was an Nespresso machine, excellent coffee and a small empty refrigerator. There were so many large windows and the room had lots of light. There were also room darkening drapes that worked well when you didn't want the light.I have stayed in other Curio hotels and this was a delight. I have to return for work in January and I look forward to staying here again.  Great value for the money. One of the high points, Room Service personnel and the tomato basil soup!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wow!
text: Today we stopped in LondonHouse to check it out after not having a great experience at the Intercontinental. We go to Chicago every year for 4-6 nights in December. The Intercontinental has been our annual go to, but not anymore. Not only is the LondonHouse absolutely beautiful, we had the pleasure of meeting Ken, a front desk employee. What a fantastic demonstration of how any company in the hospitality industry, would like to see their employee represent them. He was pleasant, welcoming, knowledgeable, and thorough. He even went above and beyond to take the opportunity to show us what the accommodations looked like. The LondonHouse will now get our annual business, as well as our free advertisement of their amazing product. Ken was a breath of fresh air after an incredibly disappointing stay at ‚Äúthat other place.‚Äù

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel and staff!
text: From the time we walked into the hotel until we departed, the staff here was awesome, specifically the bellman, Mark! He welcomed us right away and assisted immediately with our 6 bags of luggage. We arrived early, so he stored the bags, then gave us great suggestions of where to eat and hang out until we could check in. When we returned, he was very attentive and super helpful, even though he was very busy. What a great first impression of this hotel! Hoping his boss sees this review and gives him a monetary recognition as it's well deserved! The property was beautifully decorated for the holidays, extremely clean and the rooftop had spectacular views of the city.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Not up to Luxury standards
text: Tough to judge this hotel. It wants to be a high end Hilton property, but it doesn‚Äôt have the high end customer service to make it such. The elevator system is modern, but a poor design, which leaves you waiting for minutes for an elevator to show up when there are 6 elevators for 21 floors. The suites aren‚Äôt much up an upgrade over a regular room. All the rooms and suites are shotgun style with a sitting area and TV added to the suites with floor to ceiling windows. The location is excellent and walking distance to most major shopping and attractions downtown. The parking is $73 a night, which seems high even for downtown Chicago, most are around $50. The front desk staff is average at best, switched rooms halfway through our stay and was told our room would be ready soon and they would text us as it was being inspected, two hours later we stopped back at the front desk and were given the same story. After saying we have heard this story, they finally came through with the room 15 minutes later. They room was move was not our choice and we were forced to pay to store our luggage for the day and then move back into the new room, along with the time spent moving between rooms. Overall it is meh, location helps but service falls short.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wedding proposal with Manny at LondonHouse
text: Manny was amazing.   I gave him a tight deadline and he was able fulfill everything I requested.  He was punctual with all corespondents and did an amazing job.  He represented LondonHouse very well.  Anyone considering any special even at LondonHouse, I highly recommend doing so through Manny.  100% satisfaction!!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Grace at Front Desk Made My Trip!!
text: Lost my phone while visiting beautiful London House for a late night drink.  Good Samaritan turned it in overnight.  Grace at front desk the next day used Siri to call the last caller to find me!  Amazing!  Huge relief!  Thank you good people at London House, especially Grace, for your fine service in a gorgeous setting!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: City Elegance
text: Beautiful boutique experience on the miracle mile. And just in time for Christmas! Lovely staff and accommodations.Decorations were tasteful and everything needed tucked right into the hotel. Love this venue.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent hotel
text: We recently stayed 2 nights at the LondonHouse. It‚Äôs a really nice historic hotel with great views of the Chicago river.  The staff was very friendly, especially Mark Z the doorman. He was very personable, calling us by name, and very helpful with all our questions as we were not familiar with Chicago. He went the extra mile for us, and we appreciated that a lot.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful View
text: I received an email from the Director Paloma who wanted to speak with me directly about my experience. I was greeted with respect and she apologized sincerely for the way that I was treated by the staff. She politely asked what can she do to make things better which caught me off guard. The reason is that I haven't had this type of experience from any Hilton hotel and I never expected anyone to care about what happened to me but she did and that goes a long way. I would like to thank her for being so kind and caring enough to attempt to correct the issue. I will give this hotel another chance to show what the Hilton brand is truly about. Outside of the experience that I had with the staff I can honestly say that this hotel is absolutely beautiful. The moment I walked in the room I saw that it is extremely spacious with ample storage space, a nespresso machine, great views of the river, a huge television with Chromecast capabilities, beautiful bathroom with motion lighting and large stand in shower. The floor (13th) that I was on was very quiet and there is a keypad outside of the elevators that you will have to choose your floor before getting on. I am hoping with the next visit I will be able to experience the beautiful Rooftop. I did not park at the hotel because it is Valet only and $71 per night. I did use a parking app and was able to park for $85 total for the 3 nights.I can say that if you do stay you will have an amazing room and comfort will never be a problem.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Holiday Weekend
text: The location and overall appeal of the hotel is outstanding.  Staff is top notch and very attentive.  The view from our room was everything we could have hoped for.  We had a very pleasant lunch in Land & Lake Kitchen. Cannot wait for a return visit!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect location, great value during low season!
text: Perfect location by the riverwalk, at the corner of Wacker and Michigan.  Hotel rooms seems to modern, must have been recently renovated.  HH members get free complimentary internet and water bottles each day.  Bathroom is of good size, with a very nice view!  (We were in room 1134), equipped with a fan but we could not find the switch.  Wish the bedroom is better lit, but it's not a deal breaker for us.  The deal before Thanksgiving makes this property a solid 5-star; it was less than $100 a night before tax.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: medical trip
text: We came to town for a medical trip.  I am glad we chose the London House.  The front desk staff was very friendly, courteous, and helpful.  Thank you Ricardo.  The room was very clean and quiet.  We chose a room with a view of the river.  This was the right choice.  The restaurant was good but nothing exceptional.  I will return to the London House whenever in town.
