hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic Getaway
text: All around, my fiance and I had an absolutely amazing time in the city and the Londonhouse accentuated every aspect for us. We went to the city for one night as a miniature getaway after all the wedding planning we've been doing. Upon arrival, I was checked in by Ricky at the front desk, and he blew me away with the great customer service. We were given a little "room upgrade" at no charge, so we had a gorgeous view of the river and city around it. We also had some drinks and food at the bar on Level 21, and our service there was phenomenal as well. In the morning, Corner Bakery has an indoor entry point through the hotel, so I grabbed us a great breakfast without having to step foot outside into the cold Chicago weather. Easy to check out on the online app, amenities and bathroom products were top notch as well. Another plus, you can cast your phone apps (Netflix, Disney+, etc) to the smart Samsung TV and watch anything you want! Overall, just an amazing time and we can't wait to go back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Holiday Staycation Made Great by LH!
text: My family and I had an absolutely wonderful stay at the LondonHouse Chicago to start our Thanksgiving weekend! The concierge and front desk staff were courteous and really went above and beyond! They made us feel like tourists in our own city, which is hard to do, with tips and suggestions that made our night's stroll memorable and magical. When we got to our rooms, there was a phenomenal little spread of treats and toys for my two daughters; to the staff, they love their lip smackers!! The room was perfectly comfortable, and had an incredible floor to ceiling window with a view of the river. Couldn't have asked for better linens and had a great night's sleep. The bathroom was clean, luxurious, and cozy. Before turning in for the night, I had a cocktail at their 21st floor bar, and let me tell you, their drinks were unique and delicious! The manager was incredibly knowledgeable and recommended the perfect drink based on my preferences. Try the LH Old Fashioned! Breakfast at the first floor restaurant Land and Lake was convenient and delicious, and I highly recommend the steak and eggs. The whole experience was the epitome of what a relaxing/recharging hotel stay should be and I can't wait to make this a holiday tradition with my family. Thanks again, LondonHouse Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The Best!
text: Stayed for 4 nights in November and very impressed with the hotel. This hotel is in the best location- it couldnt get any better, right on the river and everything in walkable distance. The room was great very luxurious with a great view over the river (room 1219) and the best was extremely comfortable.All staff are friendly and attentive and always ready to assist with a smile on their face.We made use of the lobby bar and the rooftop which were both exceptional and the drinks offers of a day are great! Be sure to go the rooftop the views are amazing. We also ate at Land and Lake which is connected to the hotel- the baked chicken was fab! I would certainly recommendWould i return- YES!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fun in Chicago
text: Wonderful stay. Pierre booked us a reservation at Prime and Provision, Susana found us the best room with a view, Bess and April saved me heartache when they found my drivers license and credit cards in room after I had checked out and was on my way to airport, brief return to hotel and then back on course! Thank you all, we will be back

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Both Room and Service A Cut Above
text: This hotel is in a fantastic location on the river, and the building stands out off of Michigan Avenue. Entering the hotel you go up to the second floor for the lobby, which is beautiful and has an inviting bar area to the right of the reception.The employee at check in not only made a mention of my Hilton status, but upgraded me to a one bedroom suite which was magnificent. Even when the bathroom had issues and required maintenance, they were incredibly fast and polite. The suite had lots of nice touches, including a Tivoli radio on the bedside, and all the furnishings fit in really well.Every interaction with a staff member was fantastic, and when I am back in Chicago I'll absolutely have this place at the top on my list.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing weekend!
text: We had an incredible time at London House this weekend. The room was gorgeous and immaculate, and the service was exceptional. We were especially pleased with Bess at the front desk, whose kindness and attention to detail truly made our stay memorable. Thank you!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Hiccups during the stay, but made right after the fact
text: Hilton Gold.  Random stay as we were moving to Chicago.  Pros:- Great location for those who want to be downtown. - Attractive hotel. - Suites are great. - Lots of restaurants and bars on site. Cons:- 2 people working the check in line, took 40 minutes to get to the front of the line and then another 20 minutes to get checked in.  Other staff saw the line, but did not look to help. - Iron stained my white dress shirt.  I'm assuming this isn't the first time this happened, but was still left in the room.  Front desk was helpful in getting it cleaned overnight and returned first thing in the morning.  - Front desk staff during checkout was lacking.  Not asking if the hiccups were resolved, annoyed that I asked for a print out receipt, etc.  Not the attitude you want to see at this class of hotel and the price paid for the stay. Maybe I got unlucky and everything that could have gone wrong went wrong during my stay, but nonetheless it was disappointing as service was lacking.  I am giving it a 3 vs 2 due to the fact that Susannah did everything she could to try to make it right after I checked out.  Don't know if I would stay again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Experience
text: The service was so welcoming and accommodated our requests. April and Bess were very friendly and answered every question with enthusiasm. We will be returning to this hotel from friendly welcoming service we received from everyone. Thank you and see you soon.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful views, friendly staff, perfect location...
text: As a frequent traveler to Chicago (primarily for business) the LondonHouse is always my preference. The friendly and accommodating staff, amazing views from the rooms, delicious food options and comfortable rooms make this hotel one of the highlights of every trip. I was recently in town for business and my birthday happened to fall within that travel week. The concierge at LondonHouse made my stay really special by having a bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries in the room upon my arrival! I will continue to make LH my number one hotel choice for both business and pleasure!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Spectacular position and fabulous surroundings
text: Location: on the Chicago Riverfront, steps away from the Mag Mile, Millennium Park, the Art Institute etc.  Our room had window views of the riverfront buildings.  You could walk to several CTA stations in the Loop or the Millenium Park Metra station for ease of transport options.Curiously the reception is not on the ground floor; there are two entrances from Wacker Drive, and you have to go up one floor to get reception.One unusual feature was that you had to request the floor you wanted to travel BEFORE the lift arrived, and you could only get into a specific lift.  This means you can't just rush into any lift with the door open, as it won't have "programmed" your floor.The room: spacious with a window "seat" (even if we had to look at the Trump sign) with river views.  There was a small study desk, generous wardrobe with hangers, robes and an in-room safe and fridge; coffee and tea making looked quite posh.  There was a comfy chair beside the bed, perfect for curling up and relaxing. Bonus full length mirror!The bathroom: generous sized shower and sink with plenty of storage options and drawers.  Fluffy towels, great hot water, beautiful amenities.One downside: we were near the hotel lifts.  The lift shafts make a lot of whirring noises, with the cables going up and down, all day and night.We seriously enjoyed a fabulous stay in this beautiful historic building in an unbeatable location, and would definitely stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect Combination of Location, Service, & Luxury
text: After three stays at LondonHouse Chicago, I can confidently recommend it for its perfect combination of location, service, and luxury at an affordable price. The hotel is close to Millennium Park, the Art Institute of Chicago, the Chicago Cultural Center, Michigan Ave., energetic Wacker Drive, and even the Loop business district if your trip is for work. Many rooms also have amazing views up and down the Chicago River. The only downside - depending on your point of view (literally) - is that some rooms look across the river at Trump Tower and its hideous TRUMP sign. The hotel is in a historic building surrounded by similar buildings from Chicago's past with interesting architectural details visible form the higher floors. The hotel has a trademark cupola at the top of the building, which you can enter by way of the rooftop bar/restaurant. It's a great place for a drink with a stunning view when weather permits.We usually choose a suite, which is spacious and comfortable; I love the amenities, like the in-room refrigerator and Nespresso machine. The rooms are clean, well-kept, and quiet, with luxurious bedding and large bathrooms - although I'm not a fan of the sliding, frosted-glass bathroom door, which doesn't quite give complete privacy.Then there's the service, which really distinguishes this hotel. On our first visit, the staff helped me plan a surprise for my wife's birthday: Champagne in the cupola, along with flowers waiting in our room. On each visit, the staff have been extremely attentive; I love that I could make requests via text message, and there was always someone monitoring the number and following up after each service. They genuinely wanted to make sure every request was taken care of and that we had everything we needed. It's the service most of all that keeps us going back.I do have to quibble about a few things, though: The hotel restaurant on 21 is a dark, mostly windowless space, and when we went for Sunday brunch, we turned around and left, because they were incongruously playing loud, not-very-soothing music, which seemed like an odd choice for such an otherwise relaxing hotel. Speaking of music, I didn't like the fact that the music channels on the in-room TV are a $10/day charge. I would love to relax in our suite with classical music playing, but not for a fee. Seems excessive to nickel-and-dime guests that way.On the whole, though, you can't beat the space, the location, and especially the service.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: COO
text: Had a long day of work and rolled into a calming and beautiful lobby. Check in experience was flawless and instant - Ricky did such a great job making me feel welcomed and taken care of. Topped it off with a martini at the bar and then went straight up to my comfortable room with amazing view.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay wonderful staff!
text: I was extremely satisfied with my stay at this hotel. The room was spotless with a beautiful view of the city. The entire hotel staff was very helpful and courteous. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: April
text: We Stayed Saturday Night 11/16/19 April was working overnight at the front desk and she was amazingly helpful and friendly.She took pictures for us she gave us great recommendations for food and entertainment. Thank you April For making our night special

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House great location
text: London House is what you would expect from a top tier Hilton hotel. The staff is professional, friendly and helpful. The room and overall hotel is very clean and tidy. Most of the views face the river.The location is perfect with the main attractions within a mile and a half radius. Short enough to walk to or a cheap ride if it is too cold. It is also a few blocks away from the metro station for those who land at O'hare and decide to take the metro in.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Exceptional Hotel
text: My daughter an I stayed at the LondonHouse to celebrate her 40th Birthday.  The hotel was amazing and the location was perfect.  I will definitely return to this hotel when I visit Chicago again.  The views from the rooftop bar are breathtaking!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel in heart of city
text: Chose hotel because of the Hilton Honors Program but was pleasantly surprised at how beautiful this hotel is inside and out. It has old world charm on the outside and all the modern amenities on the inside. Would definitely stay again and recommend to friends and family!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic Hotel
text: I stayed with my daughter 17 Y and my husband in this beautiful hotel in Labor Day long weekend in Sep 2019.We enjoyed every second in this hotel . our room was beautiful with special decoration and great view to river and city .The bathroom was big with rain shower , we all loved it .There is fantastic roof top restaurant with mazing view and nice DJ , my daughter loved that atmosphere and went for dinner two nights in the rows .Hotel Location is awesome , it close to everything and live during night . Customer service in this hotel is number one and they really care about customer satisfaction . Bug thank you to all staff in London house , I highly recommend to everyone and I will be back to this beautiful hotel in our next trip to Chicago for sure .Cheers , Kimia

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic!
text: The hotel is perfectly placed on the river with beautiful city views.  It is beautiful on the inside and the out.  The welcoming staff will make you feel at home and the history of the hotel will provide an unforgettable experience for your next Chicago trip.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic!
text: Really fantastic hotel at this price range. The location couldn't be better and the rooms are excellent, with very good mattresses, linens and pillows. The view from my room was amazing... I was also surprised that the drinks at the bar in the lobby are priced at a good value taking into consideration the place you are in. Great staff, thank you Ana, you are very kind and the hotel is lucky to have you.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location, lively and fun
text: Decided to spend one night in the city before heading to the suburbs for work! London house was great! Really happy about this choice! We got in late, but the bar served great food even let, and the crowd was energetic, young and friendly! Had a great evening! Surely recommended and will come back

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Desk Staff Condescending
text: Desk staff including Ken O were condescending to my guests for whom I booked this superior room with lake view for 3 nights. I own a hotel in Minnesota the manner in which you treated these guests was appalling. There were many issues but I will leave it at that.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Top notch stay at the LondonHouse
text: I am a Hilton Diamond member and decided to switch up my usual hotel to the LondonHouse in Chicago for a long weekend get away.  What a great decision!  This hotel is absolutely fantastic from top to bottom!  I upgraded to the Vista King Room and the view was stunning.  The hotel amenities were fantastic including the room top bar and the lobby bar.  Excellent cocktails and especially delicous Old Fashioned's!  Location is prime time.  I will differently stay here again whenever traveling to Chicago.  I had a small hiccup with receiving my honor points and one of the front desk managers, Susannah took care the issue in break neck speed.  Fantastic experience.  I look forward to my next stay already.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Couples Hotel
text: The staff is professional and very friendly.  The location is fantastic. We stayed during the weekend and were taking care of immediately.  We had a little issue with the ice machine being nearby which could be noisy but the management took care of that issue so we ended up being 100% satisfied.  After a night of being out, it was nice to come back to the bar which was lively but not too crowded. Live music was something nice to come back to the hotel for.  I appreciated the comfy bed being that it was a night away from home.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Above & Beyond Service
text: My husband and I recently stayed at the LondonHouse for our anniversary. The views/hotel are spectacular, but the customer service is top notch. We had an incident with the valet company during our stay, and Paloma from Guest Services went above and beyond to be sure we were taken care of. She really turned the situation around, and we can't wait to stay here again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Unbelievable views
text: Unbelievable views. Super friendly helpful staff. My fianc√© and I came early to the city after spending the week north of the city in the suburbs with family. We had never been to Chicago before and wanted something downtown close to everything. London house definitely delivers. Directly across from Trump hotel your a hop skip and a jump from everything. The staff were amazing. Will definitely be back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location with views.
text: Fantastic hotel with views from most rooms and especially the roof top bar.  Great staff and comfortable rooms.  Do know that on weekends this hotel is busy with guests having a good time. If you need quiet, make sure you ask for it.  Avoid the 5th floor and any adjoining room.  But would definitely stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very comfortable and good location
text: Just very happy with the room, the location and views from the roof. Ken at the front desk was very nice, helpful and kind. I recommend that hotel without hesitation. The food on the roof restaurant was good but little bit too small plates. The decoration and ambiance were very nice for a drink night. You can see the picture of a margarita while in front of the fireplace. Again if you have the chance to get Ken at the front desk you will love his service. Enjoy Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great experience ! London house <3
text: Amazing staff ! Thank you to SAIF at guest desk our stay was perfect. He made sure we were able to manage some last minute reservations for our family and friends traveling in. Accommodate all our requests. Wonderful bar and restaurant as well. This is the probably the best experience I have had so far from the staff and accommodation in Chicago. Thank you saif and Donnie at guests services and  Vinny ( see him at the bar ).

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: What a find!
text: For starters this is a Hilton property so I get bonus points on my Amex Hilton credit card.  I've been in Chicago for 8 days and  I started  at the Hilton on Michigan Ave., near the "MILE" which I did enjoy but after my initial 3 day stay  I checked into the London House and wow what a difference. I started at 2:15 pm on a Saturday with checkin time being 4PM. I simply wanted to store my bags so I can watch the LSU game until checkin. Grace immediately told me there were 2 rooms available if I wanted to check in, saw my Hilton Gold status and upgraded me to an absolutely amazing room with a stunning view of the River. The Lobby bar was upscale and hip compared to the corporate feeling at the Hilton and then the Rooftop bar was breathtaking. Service was attentive and I felt like a VIP.  I booked for two days then and extended my stay another two days with Bess at the front desk. He was truly the highlight of my trip. He upgraded me as well but also offered me a complimentary breakfast at the downstairs restaurant, Land & Lake. He remained my contact for the rest of my stay and when I had a problem with the slow internet he immediately remedied it. Overall I can't say enough about the staff even down to the friendly bellmen. This will be my home away from Los Angeles anytime I stay in Chicago. Highly highly recommended. 5 stars.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wedding
text: Beginning with the tasting, the service at the LondonHouse was amazing! As mother of the groom, I was delighted with the ceremony and reception at the LondonHouse. The food was incredible! Thanks to Steve and the entire staff for a wonderful weekend.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic location
text: This hotel is conveniently located within walking distance from shops and excellent dining locations! The rooms are very nicely done, clean, and very comfortable!  The entire staff provides excellent customer service, from arrival to departure!  First trip to Chicago and picked the perfect hotel. Definitely Recommend!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: WONDERFUL SERVICE
text: April was a charm to deal with. I had a pleasure she helped out a lot with my business partners arrival. I will definitely be staying here again. Great woman and great service. Thank you kindly hope to see you again

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A unique experience
text: Staying at the London House was a unique experience. Check in was fast with fantastic service from Trevor. The rooms are great and the overall atmosphere in the hotel is just cosy. The location is top and staff is so friendly.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: 50th Birthday Staycation
text: I absolutely enjoyed the hotel and staff. I strongly recommend the London House. I look forward to staying in the future. The room was clean and the view was amazing. I hope to return next Summer in July or August 2020!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Incredible hotel in the heart of Chicago...
text: Wow!   You could not pick a better place to stay while visiting Chicago.   The LondonHouse was fantastic from the moment we arrived until the day we left.Our room was on the 16th floor and had a fantastic river view!  The room was kept immaculate by the housekeeping staff during our entire stay.   The in-room Nespresso coffee maker was a big plus in as we have one at home and loved being able to have espresso early in the morning.The fitness center was well equipped for a boutique hotel gym.   There were multiple treadmills, a Concept 2 Rower, several ellipticals, dumbbells up to 50lbs and a Hoist cable machine.  A huge perk for us was the two Peloton Bikes that were in the fitness center.   As my wife and I are avid home riders of Peloton,  having a bike we could use while visiting Chicago was a big plus.   The only downside was the bikes could use some serious maintenance.  One bike had several adjustment  handles broken off and the rubberized floor in the fitness center made the bikes less stable than had they been on a solid floor.   No indoor pool though so if you are traveling with kids who love to use the hotel pool, this might not be the hotel for you.If traveling to Chicago again in the future I would definitely consider staying at the LondonHouse hotel again.Pro Tips:>>Rooftop bar (outside) is insanely crowded so get there early if you want to enjoy your time and the view>>Hotel gym has two Peloton Bikes with SPD/Toe Cage Pedals (LOOK cleats will not work)>>Lobby Bar has fantastic cocktails including a great Empress 1908 Gin & Tonic>>Top floor rooms may not be the ideal choice if you are a light sleeper due to noise from the rooftop bar.   River view rooms on floors 10-18 still have a fantastic view.>>Save your empty water bottles - there is a filtered water bottle filling station in the hotel gym.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Chicago
text: To whom this may concern, April C, was the most professional front desk employee I‚Äôve met thus far. The knowledge she displayed help my stay go well. Also, when I went to the bar at the rooftop the bartender Dina was so warming as she gave me my drinks. She told me all the places to visit in Chicago. Most importantly, I come to Chicago a lot on business and this is my new go to spot. Chris W helped me feel safe doing security. He was not on a power trip because other hotels treat mean at times.  Jocelyne the hostess with the mostest  told me about this place called the tunnel. Omg I a had ball. Overall, I hope we become family.Regards,RII

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cave room with great view
text: Great location - very close to Chicago Architecture Center.  Great view of bridges on the river.Vista Room (2 double)  felt like a dark tunnel. Poor lighting - could not see to read or to see what was in closet. 6" access to closet. Beds on pedestal and kept sliding around so alot of toe stubbing. Temp was hard to maintain - blew right onto 1 bed so couldn't use when air was on. No note pads.  wifi worked for 2 days then stopped for last 3.When we commented to the front desk, the clerk was sarcastic, rude with no attempt to help or offer solution. Felt very dismissed & minimized.  His comment about the lighting was "the room has floor to ceiling windows" - great help at night!All other staff was nice and  helpful.They offered 1000 points for no housekeeping - we declined the housekeeping but did not receive the 1000 points.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Host: Mark Bellman
text: Mark: was more like a concierge. Engaging, informative, enthusiastic and fun!  I actually went back to this hotel 2 more times (to visit) because the rooftop was glorious and the customer service is extraordinary!   Mark and on my second & third visit an African American man who was equally brilliant blew me away.  My OLD iphone ran out of juice and I went back tot the Lond Hotel to get Mark's help w the address of a restaurant that I had reservations with etc.   Mark was gone but his colleague (aforementioned), resolved all my issues & initally said, "I will do ANYTHING to help you!"   Go to the London House for drinks a meal and the rooftop as well as your lodging.    Joni Murphy

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Guest Services!
text: I checked into the hotel last minute after work tonight in order to make a work meeting in the a.m.Bess and April at the front desk went above and beyond for me. Treated me like I was family. As a person who also works in the hospitality industry and recognizes great service and hospitality,this was a great way to end my long day. Nice job Londonhouse Chicago. Charley Ryan,OP Chicago

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great good hotel to explore the city
text: Just next to the river, 5 minutes to the golden Mile, 15 minutes to the Art Museum, nice rooms. Bar in the reception area should stay open longer, since the roof top bar is always crowded and the breakfast could be a bit less fatening, but all over all a nice place to stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Loved the location!
text: We were in town with friends for the Lobster Fest and stayed the night since we live in NW Indiana.  It is right across the street from the Riverwalk and the view of the river during the day and night are fantastic!  We were directly across from the Trump hotel and we loved that!  The rooms were lovely.  Very quiet.  The only thing I hated were the elevators.  They seemed like a great idea how you plugged in the floor you wanted but they were very congested, would zoom by, it was crazy.  Everything else was great.  We would definitely come back for a visit.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Bess and April are the hosts with the most!
text: I recently booked LondonHouse when my connecting flight was cancelled on my way home to Denver and have to say that it was the best experience in a hotel that I‚Äôve had in a long time! The ambiance is incredible it‚Äôs very loungy but and the same time incredibly cozy but the thing that made my trip were the night hosts Bess and April. They were incredibly empathetic to my situation of the cancelled flight offering suggestions on amazing places to eat and sights to see while in town. As my flight was cancelled and it was a 24 hour lay over they also pushed my check out to 1:00pm to allow me some extra time to catch up on work. - To the management get these two off the night shift and on during the day! They are an asset you your team and have turned what should have been an irritating lay over into a much needed mini vacation. The next time I‚Äôm in Chicago I will only stay here because of them.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Weekend in Chicago
text: First off, we are Hilton Honors members. Our visit started out on a positive note when they were able to honor our early check in request.  Highly recommended paying for a room with the floor to ceiling windows on the river side of the hotel.  We were able to watch both the Marathon and the Columbus parade while having coffee in our room. They provide an espresso maker. Coffee is not provided in the Lobby which is on the second floor.  Room is sleek, modern  and clean.  Upon check in you should be told that the platform bed has draws underneath and a few hooks in the bathroom would be useful.  Rooftop bar is fun.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Front Desk Service From April
text: I had an issue with my booking details. I contacted the front desk and  April so kindly assisted with my issues. She was very nice and helpful and I appreciated her tremendously! Thanks April for helping.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel!!!!!
text: My partner and I came in for the Chicago Marathon. The hotel was clean and very nice. Parts of the hotel had great views. As a gay couple one of which is a Mexican with a green card, our view sadly was nothing but a big ugly TRUMP sign on the building across the street. Pick your room wisely for the view.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Group Travel for Chicago Marathon
text: The hotel provided a great space for guests and a small meeting.  We had easy check in and they upgraded my room as the meeting planner which was appreciated when the need for shipping packages to the hotel to have extra space.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location
text: Loved the views, architecture, nearby theaters, museums, and proximity to shopping, restaurants, and Millennial Park. Service was great when we needed something. Our room was  nice...not amazing, but too close to the elevators.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A very comfortable, chic hotel in a great location
text: We were very pleased with LondonHouse.  The location is very convenient, which is a good start.  Also, the room was clean and very comfortable.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  Also, we were very pleased with the variety of equipment in the fitness center and it was all in working order.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A fantastic 50th birthday surprise!
text: We came to the LondonHouse to celebrate my husband‚Äôs 50th birthday. I cannot begin to give this hotel enough praise. Without a doubt they knocked it out of the park! Susannah, Shane, Yessica, Kevin, Saif, Ricardo, and Matthew absolutely killed it! My husband was blown-away by his surprise. The staff bent over backwards to accommodate our every need. Thank you to all of you for making this an awesome experience. We will definitely be back! The Theisen‚Äôs

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Mr Mack
text: Ok London is in the heart of Michigan Avenue at River great views from from your hotel room they also have wonderful roof top there also steak and seafood restaurant on second floor they also have casual dining on first roof top view Is died great place for proposal

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Clean, comfy and modern
text: The staff was great, from the person at the door to the person at the front desk.  They were helpful and nice.The room had fantastic views and was modern.  The room was very clean.  You can tell it was dusted, vacuumed well and roped off with nice linens.I might have found my goto hotel for Chicago trips.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The best hotel in Chicago!
text: My favorite hotel in Chicago for many reasons! The rooms are beautiful, and spacious with amazing views. The staff is super friendly, and helpful and go the extra mile to make your stay great. This hotel is in the perfect location--walking distance to pretty much everything. The roof top bar has some of the best views that I've seen.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Hotel, Great Location!
text: The location was perfect & the tips made our anniversary weekend in the City PERFECT! Stayed in Room 1013 & had the best river view (Trump tower was directly across the river out our window)üòç Walking distance to everything!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful Hotel
text: Professional and courteous customer service. The staff at the front desk was very hospitable and friendly. The room was beautiful and clean with a fantastic view of the city and river. I was a fan of the espresso/coffee machine in the room. (wish I owned one like that) We had dinner at the Ocean Prime restaurant, and the food was delicious. The only negative I would have to say was the breakfast we had at the Land and Lake restaurant in the hotel. The staff was nice, but the food wasn't good at all.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Absolutely Fabulous!
text: Great weekend in the city and perfection, from location to service! Frequent traveler for business and leisure. Since very discerning to say the least, LondonHouse exceeded expectations. A shout out to Shayne, Guest Services, who had me at hello! The Rooftop is a spectacular amenity! I spent years living in this great city and have many favorite hotels. This is now my favorite. Bears game and win was the icing on the cake. Bringing back my friends from MN for my birthday weekend celebration next summer!,Cheers LondonHouse,Kim

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great customer experience
text: When I come to Chicago I try to stay at the LondonHouse, overall very good hotel, however my experience was not the best today because I was having issues locating a package that was delivered to me and no one was able to help me, I called front desk multiple times and they transfered me to the security team but I was getting the voicemail that happened at least 4 times, then I was promised a call back that never happened, I decided to go in person to the Lobby and then Bess was super polite and kind enough to go personally and find the package for me, in my opinion it‚Äôs all about the customer experience, I do a lot of business with hilton I am in fact a Diamond member, I can tell you that actions like that save the day, thank you Bess for being helpful and helping me.Regards,Jose Luis Mora AlvaradoHH 198878142

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Magnificent Treasure in the Heart of Chicago!
text: Professional service, courtesy and hospitality at every turn at this gem that overlooks the Navy Pier and within walking distance to shopping and entertainment.  The various restaurants within the property and beautiful rooftop views leave nothing to be desired--it's all in the hotel.  Room service was even delivered in an opulent fashion. I raised an issue related to my stay and Keith the General Manager immediately addressed and resolved the matter at once.  As a now frequent visitor to Chicago, I can't imagine staying anywhere else.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Customer Care is Top Notch
text: Having stayed at the LondonHouse prior our expectations were very high. The attention to detail that the staff maintain is fantastic. While our most recent stay was definitely atypical in the level of service we received, management was quick to follow up and addressed the issues at hand. Our most recent visit (September 2019) was still great, but the front desk agent did not stand up to the level of professionalism we were used to at this property, there was no "check in to see how your stay is" text, and there were some minor issues with pillows being subpar/minor room details. Paloma was fast at following up and happily addressed all of our concerns in a timely and professional manner. She turned our experience around and I would not hesitate to stay at LondonHouse again. Being a Hilton Honors Member I like to feel like I'm being cared for. Paloma and her team made sure of that and I feel reassured that Hilton truly cares about their customers (Honors Member or not). If you're staying at LondonHouse I highly recommend checking out their rooftop bar and the floor below it. While the rooftop was crowded during out latest visit (there was an event), the views are incredible and it's easily accessible. The floor below the rooftop was great despite them being out of the honeycomb, which we really looked forward to trying. The truffle fries were absolutely delicious, as were our drinks. All in all, if LondonHouse keeps up with the attention to detail and care for their customers I see no issues with returning time and time again. Definitely a must-try when you're in Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Celebrating wife's birthday
text: My wife and I stayed at this property for 3 nights last week. The location and the rooftop bar/restaurant set this apart from other hotels in the area. When they found out we were in Chicago for wife's birthday, they upgraded us to a room facing the river. Although the room wasn't large, it was very nice. The LH21 rooftop restaurant is a must. The views are amazing. I have to give a shout out to Anthony Gates from the concierge team. Anthony contacted me prior to our arrival and stayed in touch throughout our stay. He was very accommodating with all of our requests.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fun Chicago site
text: Room was very clean and quiet.   Great comfy bed.  Check in was fast and efficient and just friendly enough.  Hotel is in great location on the river.  Windows actually open 3" each which is a plus for fresh air!  Both high end and casual dining in walking distance.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Booking experience ever!
text: We have not taken our trip yet, but after reviewing a lot of hotels, decided on LondonHouse. My husband wanted a river view, while our daughter wanted a city view. After calling the hotel directly, Shane, who answered, gave us a room suggestion to fit our wants. We had to call him 3 times to get the room verbiage correct, and he never seemed annoyed. After booking the room, we called to make sure we booked the correct one and he not only made sure, but booked us for what he thinks is one on the best floor with the best view! I cannot wait until the end of the month to take our trip to Chicago and thank Shane personally!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The LondonHouse Experience
text: I‚Äôve always come to this property to hangout at their incredible rooftop because of the magnificent view.  I decided to stay with them at the last minute last weekend.  When I checked in both Shayne and Donnie at the front desk were exceptional.  They not only were great to talk to about Chicago and the hospitality industry but they provided great ideas on things to do during my stay.  I would most definitely stay there again.  My Riverfront view, the breakfast in the morning at Land & Lakes and the comfort of my bed made it one of my better staycation visits.  Glad I made the right choice where to stay

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful location and friendly staff
text: I was in an amazing room on level 5 with full river views. It‚Äôs a beautiful hotel and staff are super helpful and friendly. Being on the river is a nice treat if you don‚Äôt come here often. I was here in Chicago on a course - so I was able to set up a gorgeous little nook overlooking the river to cap off my learnings each day. The hotel was a little noisy though. They hold parties in the function rooms and on Saturday night it was extremely loud until around 11:30pm. There were also people walking through the foyers all night and my room was right near some lifts. If you have kids or need a good sleep I‚Äôd recommend an upper level room or a room that is not near the lifts. Great location. CBD, North and West easy accessible by foot. Also directly opposite magnificent mile - so good for shopping. Highly recommend and will be back. Had in room dining once, roast chicken. It was ok. Nothing I‚Äôd order again though.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Hotel
text: The stay could not have been better. The room was spotless and very comfortable, all of the common areas were spotless as well and the views from the rooftop and our room were incredible. The concierge was very tentative and friendly, my girlfriend left her makeup bag in the room when we left, I didn‚Äôt even call the hotel until 2 days after I checked out (assuming it was gone) and they were able to locate it easily. Will definitely come back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Staff
text: Shout out to the amazing staff this hotel has. Great hospitality! Location was great, had an amazing view from the room #1501. The rooftop bar was amazing too. Great host! Me and my wife had a blast..

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Place to stay in Chicago hands down
text: Perfect location, beautiful building, clean and great looking rooms, fantastic views and great rooftop bar. Also great concierge service with text messaging communication. Great value, rate was fairly priced considering the quality of this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Don't stay anywhere else in downtown Chicago - go to LondonHouse.
text: Everything about LondonHouse is great - the facilities, the staff, the rooms, the location. Not just one of my favorite hotels in Chicago - one of my favorite hotels anywhere. Another great Hilton property.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Review
text: Great room and expiernce nothing that I have witnessed before! The staff was great the room was phenomenal ! I upgraded to a high floor and the roomThey picked was great no complaints at all. Lovely time

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location
text: I have stayed in many hotels around Chicago as I frequently visit for work. London house was elegant, clean, modern decor and is centrally located. The roof top bar is amazing with views as far as the eye can see. The price was competitive with other hotels of similar caliber; however depending upon demand, it can be quite pricey. I would stay again if the rates are good: all around a lovely hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Many annoyances
text: Good location, friendly employees but tv doesn't work when it's raining, Chromecast never worked, toilet paper holder falls apart, elevators are convoluted (a delivery guy was almost crying about his inability to get to the ground floor), the hot water will burn you, and there was a large hole in the carpeting in the bedroom and duct tape was used to cover a ceiling vent.  Oh there is no microwaves anywhere in this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing stay in a great location!
text: Perfect for those who want a boutique experience in a great part of town. London House is a short walk to Millennium Park, the red-line if you want to head up to a game or a short car ride to the theater. Awesome views from your room or roof top bar. If you are on Wacker St. bring ear plugs or use the sound machine if you are a light sleeper.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing!
text: This hotel has a great location, amazing views of the city from the rooftop bar, and great staff! I was staying for a conference and the hotel was clearly able to handle a crowd. Can't wait to stay here on my next trip to Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: My favorite Chicago hotel
text: Best decision to stay at this hotel rather than ones offered in the conference block I attended. I was attracted to the great location and reasonable price as We were staying for 5 days . The Londonhouse did not disappoint. The lobby is elegant the greeting welcoming and friendly. Since this was a first visit for my boyfriend I asked for the possibility of a room with a view , I was graciously accommodated for a very reasonable upgrade. And OMG the view! Right in the middle of all the action easy to get anywhere needed. Rooftop bar was a fun experience and the adjoining restaurants equally good. The room was very comfortable the bed plush after a long day on my feet. Londonhouse you have a forever fan we will be back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Chicago experience!
text: If you want to be in the middle of the action, this is the perfect hotel!  It is located right where the Chicago Riverwalk intersects with the Magnificent Mile.  Everything you would want to do is in walking distance.  The hotel is fairly new but located in a gorgeous historic building.  The rooftop deck/bar is incredible.  The staff is fantastic.  The price is reasonable.  I will be staying in this hotel every time I go to Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: DO NOT visit on Mexican Independence Day
text: Location should be great. People celebrating independence from Spain are making this stay less than pleasant. Hard to empathise past midnight- honking horns 2 nights in a row- even the Street drummers have moved on! Location normally would be great- usually check for US holidays but next time will check for Foreign holidays. Not sure better glazing would help.While in a bad, sleepless, mood- rain showers without much pressure not good for those of us with long hair- hotel interior designers could add this to checklist.STAFF ARE LOVELY, a great asset, hopefully paid well. Architecture gorgeous but needs triple glazing & European shower option.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location and Views
text: We loved this hotel!  We were fortunate to have a room with a view of the river.  Our room had a small living room which was nice along with a Nespresso machine :) Staff was very friendly.  Roof top bar - great for taking in the sights.  We will defiantly come back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wow! beautiful hotel!
text: This is one of the best hotels! All the options for food and drinks are outstanding here! The rooftop bar is not to be missed! The view is so beautiful at night. The cupola is also a great place to take in the view!  The french toast breakfast was so good, I'd eat it anytime. I just loved the room they put us in for breakfast on the 21st floor. So comfy on the couch and a fireplace too. The bedding and everything about the room was spectacular!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location, interesting dining options
text: This is a building with a long history, and it's located right in the heart of Chicago's tourism, entertainment and shopping areas. Most of which is within walking distance, and it is a real pleasure walking around in this part of Chicago.Its Rooftop bar is extremely popular for its Riverwalk view, leading to long queues of both patrons and visitors. For breakfast/ brunch, the Land and Lake restaurant is adequate, though with a very limited menu.The newly opened Ocean Prime Chicago is accessible from the 2nd floor lobby, offering a very upscale surf/ turf dining experience.Their so-called 'high floor room with a view' turned out to be nothing of the sort, offering (thankfully!) just a sliver of a view of the Trump building, of all things.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Hotel
text: London house in Chicago is in a great location off Michigan and Wacker right by the riverwalk. Rooms were nice size with great views of the riverwalk and of the Wrigley building and Trump international. Spend some time at the roof top bar for great views and fun times. Walking distance of millenium park and magnificent mile shopping. Suggest taking a ride over to Navy Pier for great selection of activities and food. The Riverwalk architecture tour was interesting and a good time.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Views from Room 1733!
text: Stayed on a Friday-Saturday night visit and the service was friendly and helpful, the room clean and comfortable, and a fantastic proximity to everything in the city. Nice access to the rooftop bar, LH 22, which is a must do if you‚Äôre staying at this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Option for Downtown Chicago
text: This is an excellent choice for anyone wanting to stay in the heart of Chicago for either business or leisure. My room was well appointed, had a comfortable bed and an excellent work desk. Room service was good. There's plenty of cafe's around, and getting to the local sites is a quick walk generally. The only small complaint I had was the lack of proper block out curtains - not a huge issue but would have been nice. Overall, it's my goto hotel in Chicago

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Solid choice
text: You will find this hotel on the river very close to State and Lake basically a perfect spot for Chicago.The room I had this time was internal, and was small with a mad layout, the rooms facing the river are much better but the premium they asked for was 100 dollars a night... a bit of a joke for me.Rooftop bar was great but was often shut for a private function

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Special Mother/Daughter weekend
text: We stayed at the LondonHouse over Labor Day, and had an issue on our last night, but the next morning the manager on duty, Paloma,  and Jalesa from guest services were very prompt to resolve it. I appreciate this as I can walk away focusing on all the positives of the weekend and our stay. The LondonHouse is in a perfect location by the river and between the magnificent mile and the Loop. It is within walking distance of nearly everything you would want to see. The rooms are very clean and tastefully decorated. The room size is comparable with most other luxury hotels in the city with a beautiful walk-in shower. The rooms have a refrigerator and espresso machine but there are three coffee/breakfast/bakery places right outside the hotel. The river and city views are beautiful. There is a rooftop indoor/outdoor bar and restaurant. We had a lovely brunch there. It is a very popular local night spot as well, but if you are a guest at the hotel,  you do not have to wait in line to access the rooftop. There are spa services available with flexible hours and several other restaurants on site. The concierge was very helpful and friendly. The hotel will keep your luggage after checkout if you are leaving the city later in the day. Housekeeping comes daily to clean room, replace towels and make bed. You can opt out of this at your choosing. We have stayed at other hotels of the same caliber in Chicago. Even though we had a hiccup with our stay, because the Hotel went out of their way to make it right, I would definitely stay here again. We have been staying in Hilton hotels exclusively for the past year and a half and have been very satisfied.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Kevin was GREAT! Beautiful hotel!
text: I would highly recommend staying at this gorgeous property! Kevin was great at the front desk! It was my husbands birthday & we were celebrating with some friends who were in town from Georgia. We couldn‚Äôt believe the beautiful room Kevin gave us! It was a corner room facing the river. It had a gorgeous layout with a dual sided fireplace, a large living room, full kitchen, & had about 6 windows with awesome views of the city! This surprise really made our weekend over the top! We appreciate Kevin‚Äôs wonderful hospitality! We will be recommending this property to everyone & we will be back again soon!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Spot
text: Super location on the river - stroll out onto the riverwalk - river cruises 3 minutes away - excellent diner next door/part of the hotel - if staying get a room with a river view well worth ti - also well worth reserving a table on the the rooftop bar BEFORE you arrive as people queue up to get into it - 5 minutes to the L also & close to everything - good staff - would stay her again no probs !

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Chicago
text: The hotel is newly renovated 4 year old hotel.  The staff, service, food, beverage, meeting space, and hotel rooms are an exceptional value for the price.  I cannot say enough about the food - Delicious!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Such an amazing stay
text: I visited the LondonHouse for Labor Day weekend and my stay was amazing. The hotel is gorgeous and chic! The rooms are spacious and the service was great. It‚Äôs in a prime location AND they have a beautiful rooftop with the best views!! I highly recommend staying there if you visit Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House Chicago
text: Excellent location and amenities.  Valet parking way overpriced at $73/day with no self park available. Breakfast was good, with $12 daily credit for Hilton Platinum folks. Rooms were a bit small...expected for a downtown location like this,  but they were comfortable with excellent views.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Experience!!
text: We stayed at LondonHouse in Chicago for a birthday celebration in the city. Paloma and her staff were incredible!! They made us feel like celebrities upon arrival for check in. We were early, so we left our bags and went shopping in the city. I got a text from the staff that our room was ready, well in advance of normal check in. The suite we had was one of the nicest I have ever stayed in. It was spacious, had a great view, and the bed was SO comfortable. I will stay here every time I come to Chicago, and I suggest you give them a try. You won't be disappointed!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Additional comments
text: We wanted to add what a wonderful check-in experience we had.  When we arrived we were greeted with a warm smile by Grace.  We explained it was our first visit to Chicago, and she described several places to see.  She also nicely explained a room upgrade option where we could view the river.  There was absolutely no pressure, and when we agreed she found us a fantastic corner room with a magnificent view.  My wife tells all of our friends it was the highlight of our stay.  As a Hilton Honors member I greatly appreciated Grace's friendliness, competence, and professionalism and she is a jewel of an asset for London House.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Hotel - Even Better Concierge!
text: I go out of my way to stay at the LH in Chicago because their concierge - Shannon Boland is awesome.  No detail goes overlooked in Shannon's world.  She's one of the best, if not the best concierges I encounter in my travels.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The place to stay
text: The London House offers all any traveller could want when visiting Chicago.  Location, experience, friendliness, cleanliness, knowledgeable staff, great choice of bars, and a place we would stay at again and recommend to our friends.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Bday celebration
text: What an amazing stay at Londonhouse... Staff were very attentive and rooms exceptionally clean. The rooftop bar was a major bonus - if staying as a guest, you do not need to stand in the long line to get into the bar. Notable mentions: Keith in Guest Services and Anna, our server at the rooftop bar made the experience so much better. Thank you for a fantastic stay - we are returning next month to celebrate another bday and finish our Chicago excursions. Cheers!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chic and busy, superb location, staff with careless attitude
text: 4 nights stay. Hotel is very well located, facilities are cool, and room was well appointed, but not well kept. Door handle on bathroom door about to fall off and toilet seat was loose. I informed the hotel about this early morning after the first night, however nothing happened. Only after addressing the issue once more in person they seamed to care about it and have it fixed. As a gold member I was told in the booking confirmation to inform to the attendant when having breakfast to get the "Continental Breakfast". However, that was not true. I was told that I should have been given vouchers at check in. I am annoyed that the receptionist pay no attention to such details when checking in guests. Why have a loyalty program if the employees do not care about it! After getting the vouchers I noted that they were just for a few dollars, and would not even cover a "Continental Breakfast" from the a la carte menu. So in fact the "free continental breakfast" for gold members is not true, or lets say "not accurate" to be kind.I did address the lack of follow up on the maintenance issue to an agent via the Hilton app. They offered me 50USD or 5000 points compensation, which I accepted all tough I will probably get any benefit out of those as I think I¬¥ll pass on Hilton hotels in the future. There are better alternatives around.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wouldn't stay anywhere else whiles in Chicago
text: From the moment we arrived we got offered help with our bags , check in was friendly and easy , we asked for rooms with a view of Lake Michigan and they sure well did not disappoint the views from the running were stunning  , we got one room on floor 7 and one on floor 8 both with them stunning views .The rooms we got were very clean and spacious , the facilities in the room were perfect (Fridge, 55inch Telly, Safe, , Air conditioning ,plenty of cupboard space to hang your clothing, desk etc) we couldn't of asked for much more within the hotel room , the bathroom was also very well equipped with a decent shower etc, we also had ice machines on both floors which were very well used during our stay in July.The location of this hotel is brilliant smack bang in the middle of the action , very short walking distance to 9/10 of the typical tourist attractions and for the attractions which require use of the CTA you are within throwing distance to all the main CTA lines and bus routes.This hotel is really worth the stay ,I wouldn't recommend anywhere else but here.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Trevor and the great Service
text: What a beautiful hotel, clean comfortable room and friendly staff. Trevor at the front desk went above and beyond for my wife and I on our one year anniversary. So happy to have made this choice for my time in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lobby bar
text: We went to the bar in the lobby and just had a fabulous time with Michell what a wonderful person you get treated like a king I assure you  Michelle does that extra mile Don‚Äôt be afraid to ask for anything

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Looks nice, not worth price
text: Hotel appears luxe with luxe prices but not worth the price. Service is average at best. Carpet in my room was wet and smelled putrid. Rooftop is cool but crowded (on a Tuesday). Location is prime. There are better options for the price.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: What an experience!!
text: My wife and decided to go on vacation and visit Chicago. I grew up here but it‚Äôs been 25 years since my last visit. We decided to stay downtown for one night so we didn‚Äôt have to drive so much. At check in they up graded my room and gave me one fabulous view of the city. The rooms are very nice and the rooftop is a great place to hangout and have a few drinks. If your looking for a nice place downtown, you should consider Londo

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Upscale and stylish city hotel!
text: We have stayed at the London house twice and love it! They have a beautiful lobby and lounge area. The view is amazing overlooking the water and bridges. This is a great spot to watch the city activity with a cocktail and appetizer. The rooftop restaurant and terrace are outstanding.The rooms are tasteful, and I love the bathroom toiletries. The location is ideal with Michigan Ave shopping and dining just across the street. Surrounded by good restaurant options and upscale shopping. Always a pleasure!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic hotel and location
text: Managed to snag this hotel on a great deal for July 4th weekend and couldn't have picked a better location. Lovely upscale rooms with fridge you can put things in, coffee machine, TV with chromecast to view your own content, comfy bed, great good sized bathroom. All in a great room to stay in.Check in was done through the app so straight up to the room on arrival and used the Digital Key. Then found it a bit temperamental so got a physical one only then to find one night the battery had gone in the door lock - swapped by the maintenance guys in 15 mins. Roof top bar looks to be one of the hip places to be given the queues on the ground floor. Luckily as a hotel guest you are straight up and no waiting. Good drinks and good view although disappointingly no viw of the fireworks in the harbour. Location wise, bang in the centre of town, I'd stay here again.  Oh and the view from the room was amazing.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: BEST PLACE TO STAY IN CHICAGO
text: Just got back from a weekend trip to Chicago and my stay at the LondonHouse was absolutely perfect! From check-in to check-out the staff was amazing. Special shout out to Kevin and Shayne from the Front Desk who assisted us with anything and everything we needed-- they were so hospitable and helpful! There are a ton of beautiful hotels in Chicago but the service is what really makes a place great and the staff at the LondonHouse is the reason we will stay there every single time. The view from our room was amazing (see picture). We had drinks at the Rooftop bar which was breathtaking at sunset- the drinks were also very affordable which is hard to find in downtown Chicago. The location is perfect for everything you want to do in Chicago- it is walking distance to great boat tours, the Chicago Theater, the Donut Vault- all the essentials! We can't wait for our next trip back to the LondonHouse :)

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: April Hostess Roof Top Bar
text: My husband and I had the pleasure of meeting April on a sunny day during the Blue Angels practice day last Thursday.  The bar of course was full of lookie loos for the Angels soaring above.  April was so professional and seated us right away and also with an umbrella to shield the hot sun.  She is a delightful person and I can only say that she is definitely an asset to the hotel.Jacqueline and Ottmar

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chicago Trip
text: We stayed in the Vista King. The staff was very polite and helpful. Our room had a perfect view of the river. The bed was comfortable for both my wife and I, even tho I prefer a harder bed and she a softer. The bathroom is a bathroom. it had a nice tile shower vanity and toilet. Not sure if it was water pressure or the low flow faucets, but had to take a longer shower to get the soap off. Like most hotels they are trying to be energy efficient.  We didn't eat in the hotel. We wanted to try other local restaurants. The first night we had deep dish pizza. Unfortunately we couldn't eat it all and it was a small. When I went to warm it up later we had no microwave. We were told the hotel chief doesn't believe in microwaves. So there is not one in the hole hotel. But there is a refrigerator so you can keep your drinks cold. The elevators threw me off a bite. We are use to getting in and selecting your floor. At each elevator where we normally push up or down is a pad. You select your floor number and it tells you what elevator to take. Several times I forgot to look and see what elevator it was. But no worries just put the floor in again and it will tell you. In the evenings the rooftop bar is nice. It is a popular spot for people to visit because the view. If you are a hotel guest you can skip the line and go right up. Yes there was a line every night we were there. It gets very loud and some what a pain to get to your room. We would come back every day to loud music and people waiting to go up. They do try to keep people out of the way but as larger groups stand in line the wider the line got. Also the louder the music the louder the people. Luckily we were several floors away so we didn't hear it from our room. The concierge was very helpful. The restaurants she suggested where great. She also help us with several things to do and see. Some we got discounts booking through the hotel. It is centrally located and easy to get around to any you wan to see. Some things we walked to and others hoped the L. We visited from Wrigley Field all the way down to China Town.  Not once did we Lyft, Uber or take a cab. Overall our stay was great. When we return we will stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Stay and Even Better Hospitality
text: My stay at Londonhouse was wonderful.  The room was clean, comfortable, overlooked the river and was very quiet.  Shannon Boland, concierge, took things to a whole new level.  She not only made me feel like a king with a room upgrade, but she went out of her way to send me a welcome basket which truly made me feel beyond special.  I highly recommend LondonHouse.  Great location, great stay and great people! Thank you LondonHouse and Shannon!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful Hotel!!
text: This Hilton property is right on the river with sweeping views of Chicago!  The hotel had sort of a cool old school Chicago vibe.  We had a small suite with a huge shower, espresso machine, chaise lounge, and a 55' swivel TV with Chromecast so we could watch Netflix in the room.  There is a tri-level rooftop bar which gets packed so it's worth checking out for a drink, otherwise, it would be smart to make a reservation.  This was a beautiful hotel and I wouldn't think twice about staying here again!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Simply Perfect
text: Nothing to complain about our experience at this hotel. Located right on the river, you can walk to the main attractions that you want to see in Chicago. The room was super quiet, even though it was right next to the elevators, due to a small hallway that added some space to separate the bedroom from the elevator traffic. The bed was super comfy and was like sleeping on a cloud. Special requests (for an additional pillow) were prompt, and we appreciated the complimentary Nespresso coffee machine in the room. The bathroom was spacious and a night light is a nice touch when you need to find your way to the bathroom at night in new surroundings. The lobby area isn't on street level; you go up one floor via some very modern elevators on which you indicate the floor you're going to before you get on. We didn't have the hotel's breakfast as there's a Corner Bakery with direct access from the hotel that had breakfast options for about $10 per person. If this hotel fits your budget, look no further.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful stay
text: Booked using Hotel Tonight- But would book again in a heartbeat directly through hotel. Comfy beds - friendly staff. Very clean. Great views . Bathroom is well equipped with towels and bath products . Hotel utilized automatic lights .

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: AF Holding board meeting
text: We are enjoying our stay at the London House in Chicago.  I want to mention Trevor at the front desk especially.  We had some confusion with our company's booking and the manner in which he handled it was outstanding.  He made a difficult situation not only bearable but an almost upbeat experience.  I was left with the impression that not only was he a consummate professional but that he actually cared about the guest, the hotel and our experience.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic hotel.
text: This hotel is in a fantastic location. We upgraded to a front river view room and it was worth every cent. We stayed 3 nights and found the staff  very helpful and friendly. The room was large and clean and big bathroom. Would definitely recommend and stay here again

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Stunning banquet facilities with five star VIP service
text: This review is for Londonhouse's banquet facilities, not the hotel accommodations. I held a private party in Londonhouse's Etoile room for ~40 guests. Both the facilities and the service provided by the conference staff was world-class. We had a lovely private room on the 21st floor with our own gorgeous huge PRIVATE outdoor deck with stunning views of the city (similar to the views from the rooftop deck which is one level above). Honestly i think it has the best view of the city. Our guests had priority access to the elevator and didn't have to stand in the long line for the elevators for the general public. Our deck had lots of comfy outdoor couch seating for 40-50 people, as well as a big private indoor room with big windows. The room also had AV equipment so would be perfect for a corporate meeting or private parties such as a small wedding reception. The banquet menu was over 40 pages long with a ton of different food options, not only all the typical food you'd expect from a conference facility but also unique ideas such as a poke bar, hot rock station, and ceviche or sushi. The food was excellent and they were very accommodating of special requests (food allergies and other modifications to the menu). The best part was not only were the facilities world-class, but the conference staff were amazing as well. The staff were incredibly responsive to all of my questions during the planning process leading up to the event, and extremely detail oriented and flexible. They were all very professional and treated us like VIPs. I can't wait to hold another event at Londonhouse so that I can work with them again, (and also get on that private deck again!).

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Hot town, summer in the city.
text: A friend and I went to a concert downtown and decided to stay the night. I wish we would have stayed all weekend. This hotel is gorgeous, classic Chicago architecture. Our room was a good size for two people. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The view of the river is the selling point of course. The Lake and Land restaurant next door is worth a stop too. Didn‚Äôt have a chance to go to the rooftop, but I will be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Room with a view
text: The location of the hotel was perfect.  Had a wonderful view of the river and the skyline.  The rooftop bar was beautiful and the service was very good on all levels.  I was there for a wedding and it was a perfect venue.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Not Too Shabby
text: Stayed here 2 nights while on a business trip. Room was very clean and comfortable. Had a 9th floor view of the Chicago River, directly across from Trump Tower. Not much street noise overall at that height. And speaking of height, there‚Äôs a rooftop restaurant and open air bar at the top of the building that offers breathtaking views of the surrounding area any time of day. Room service was prompt and very tasty. Large flat screen TV on the wall made me feel right at home. My only real complaint was that when I first arrived at the hotel and walked in at street level, I couldn‚Äôt figure out where the lobby and reception desk were. There was no signage. After asking a random bellhop(?) I was told I had to go upstairs to the second floor. Not the most welcoming experience. Otherwise it was great. Housekeeping staff I encountered in the halls always spoke to me and were warm and friendly. I‚Äôd sleep there again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect rooftop view
text: I stopped by the rooftop bar for a quick 11AM mimosa and the view, and it was worth it! You can easily just have a drink and move around the patio, and see the city from different view points. Beautiful view for sure!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Stay
text: Stayed at this hotel for a long weekend and had a spectacular time. This hotel is well located and in walking distance to everything! We arrived very early and upgraded to a corner room on the 11th floor with a fabulous view of the river which was available immediately. We had a nice spacious room with an additional sitting area which was nice. Large windows everywhere made it hard not to stop and stare at the view all the time. I made reservations to the LH Rooftop prior to coming to Chicago so getting a table was quite easy and seamless. Views from the rooftop are beautiful and are a must see.Overall I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone and will be returning here when I'm back in Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great place
text: Just an amazing experience with the staff and dinning. Very very clean and up scale. Thanks everyone for making our stay just awesome. We will be returning soon. Almost felt like being at Disney world with the amazing staff l.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Stay
text: Stayed for three nights and really enjoyed this property.  Room was on the 16th floor and very clean and comfortable.  Rooftop bar on the 21st floor has awesome views and always seemed t be packed and even had a wait.  Food during our meetings was excellent and the staff was extremely attentive and friendly regardless of where we encountered each other.  Recommend strongly.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Stress Free
text: I will definently be coming back to stay at the London House. It seems to be in the middle of everything. The room was so nice and clean. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Not to mention the roof top view is amazing.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great experience
text: Conference for work. Amazing hotel,  perfect location to venture out walking. Beautiful view from.the rooftop bar, great restaurant on the premises.  Very welcoming and beautiful. Great workout room, if you have the time

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location, clean, friendly front desk receptionist
text: This hotel is just in the center of downtown Chicago, you can walk to everywhere. The hotel is clean and has very good accommodations. The front desk receptionist is very friendly and helpful, especially one receptionist Shayne, he is very helpful and friendly with very good smile and sense of humor, definitely will come back next time when I visit Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Home away from home!
text: LondonHouse Chicago has become my home away from home, when traveling to the city for business.  Gorgeous rooms, amazing and hospitable staff, and Michelle and Dijana behind the bar make the stay even better!  I highly recommend this hotel, and/or the lobby bar with plenty of room to work and have business meetings.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing hotel
text: The londonhouse hotel is absolutely beautiful! Check in and check out was super easy and hassle free, and our room was always cleaned perfectly. The location is great as well, perfect for those who want to walk to the major attractions in chicago. The views from our room and the rooftop were spectacular.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Location, Location, Location
text: This hotel is in a great location. If you select a river view room you can see the awesome Chicago skyline and my room could even see Lake Michigan. The hotel is withing walking distance to 100's of restaurants, shopping, and many things to see and do. Some tours even leave right out front of the hotel. The rooms were clean and super comfortable if a little small. Staff was friendly and public areas were well kept. The rooftop bar of this place is popular with waiting lines all weekend and people dressed very well to go. My only complaint with the hotel is the price for parking. $78 a night for parking is robbery, if I had to have a car it would have completely eliminated this hotel as an option for me. Luckily we were able to get around without a vehicle. If you don't need a car this hotel is a great option. I would definitely stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
