text: I traveled to Chicago for a business trip & ended up booking the King Bed Vista Room & was glad I did - the view was amazing! The room was also impeccable.  Will definitely look into staying here again when I visit Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fabulous place to stay.
text: We booked this hotel on the same day we arrived due to a previous hotel being unsuitable. We were greeted by Abel at reception who was courteous and informative and persuaded us to upgrade the king room we had booked to a king room with a view of the Chicago river  - so glad we took his advice, not only was the view amazing but so was the room, complete with 2 x 55 inch TVs in the sitting area and bedroom.. the facilities were top of the range and the room spotless.  The lifts were something I had never seem before, you typed in your destination on the keypad outside the lift and you were then directed to the relevant lift to your floor. Very efficient. There is also a roof top bar which was not open when we were staying but we were able to have a look and i could imagine it being lovely to have a cocktail on a summer evening, watching the world below go by. There was also a lovely bar in the reception area and another on the ground floor.The bell staff on the ground floor who are on the door constantly, helping with luggage, giving advice on where to go and directions were very friendly, always welcoming you back and a real asset to the hotel. Fikret was very helpful on our last day, organising a taxi to the airport for us  - the taxi was very reasonable, much cheaper than the taxi we had paid to get there!!!! All in all a brilliant hotel that made our stay in Chicago amazing. Thanks.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great weekend get away.
text: Great location and accommodations, courteous staff and execelent entertainment. Joey Edwin (Musician) is the reason we stayed at London House last year and we returned this year to hear him again. We will be back to hear him again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: One of the best locations to stay in Chicago
text: I am a Hilton Diamond member and frequent guest at this property.  One of my favorite properties to stay in Chicago.  My room always meets expectations and the staff is friendly.  Especially the 21st floor lounge bar staff- Stephanie & David are the best! Great service, friendly and really value regular clients.  Highly recommend this property to others.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel in perfect spot
text: We stayed here to see a concert at the united Center.   Took the cta in from the airport to Washington station then 10-min walk to hotel.   Nice hotel beautifully refurbished.   Service was great.  When we checked in I told them it was my wife‚Äôs birthday trip and they upgraded us to a bigger room.   Two breakfast options on street level.   Plenty of restaurants within walking distance.   We liked the Beacon Tavern a short walk just across the river.  Would absolutely stay there again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Extra Ordinary Hotel
text: I picked this hotel because of its location, reasonable price and supposedly being a 4 star. Well it‚Äôs much more like 5 star! The rooms are spacious and have a luxurious feel to them, in fact the whole hotel has a luxurious feel. The top floor bar is a sophisticated buzzing place with a great selection of wines and bar food.Breakfast on the ground floor was a more modern coffee house like area and also good food but a different feel to the rest of the hotel. I‚Äôll most certainly be revisiting this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: My go to hotel for work in Chicago!
text: Great location, great service, amazing room and probably the best rooftop bar in Chicago. This will be my go to hotel from now on when I‚Äôm in Chicago. Walking distance to everything (including the Bean) and has some great staff members that make the stay that much enjoyable. Making a regular business traveler feel super comfortable and taken care of...Well done London House! See you again soon.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: I might be biased but...
text: I have probably missed out on staying at a million other Chicago hotels, but there is a reason. Look at that view. The hotel is friendly, professional, and so efficient.  My check in took 3 minutes and my room was excellent as always. I love this hotel!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Yearly Birthday Go to Staycation!
text: Celebrated my fianc√©‚Äôs birthday here again as it is our go to place for a staycation each year. We love the London house. The views, staff and everything is awesome! I wouldn‚Äôt pick another place to go to. Rooms are SUPER clean. Bottle service Excellent. The rooftop AMAZING! Highly recommend

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome Evening at LondonHouse
text: What an awesome first hotel experience at LondonHouse.  We had been to this property several times to enjoy the amazing rooftop.  This last weekend was our opportunity to spend the evening.  We took advantage of a Hilton website offering of a king room and parking.  Once we arrived we were upgraded and given breakfast vouchers to put towards our meal in the morning.  My husband frequents Marriott‚Äôs so we have a base of gold status at Hilton properties.  We were treated like royalty and asked for nothing, which is a nice change of pace.  The room was very quaint and we were upgraded to a room facing the river.  It was perfect and we couldn‚Äôt have been happier.  Even better it was such a value!  We will be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: One of a kind
text: Sometimes the people are the best part of a hotel stay. I travel a lot for work and I was combining a work trip with a Birthday Trip. I was not only happy with the room, comfort and location, but Abel Rodriguez who works at this particular hotel made my stay better than I would have ever expected. Not only did he wish me a Happy Birthday, but had graciously sent me a hand written note, wine and chocolates to my room...I felt very spoiled. As a diamond member I often get treated really well at Hilton hotels, but Abel made it feel personal. It's not always easy traveling -and certainly not on days like Birthdays and he made it super special! Kudos to Hilton for hiring people like Abel -Thank you!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful building, nice accommodations
text: The Londonhouse is an historic building revitalized into a very nice hotel.  I did enjoy our stay, the rooms had ample space without being too small.  I would have to say there was no area to set any of your items down in the room or bathroom, maybe some added hooks to hang items & used towels in the bathroom would be helpful.  Complimentary coffee in the lobby should be a provided, but alas no coffee.  The bar and rooftop viewing area are a must-see, very comfortable vibe in bar and beautiful architecture of building.  Drinks were not cheap, but it is Chicago.Overnight Valet was ridiculously over-priced....we parked elsewhere.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Love this hotel and the view!
text: We loved the view from our Vista room overlooking the river. The beds were comfy. Room was very clean. Rooftop was amazing. Staff was very accommodating. Would definitely stay here again for business or leisure.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chicago best
text: Beautiful hotel,Food is amazing and employees are friendly and very welcoming:)I was Surprise by how everything within the hotel is well put together, the arts is breathtaking...I'm definitely going to be coming back here again doing the summer with some friends.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Where you stay when you want to feel at home
text: My husband and I absolutely love the London House, mostly because of the wonderful staff. We first visited in Dec. 2017, and honesty went back because of the young ladies at the lobby bar. Michelle was the friendliest and truly made us feel like we were longtime friends. She helped us make the most of our Chicago trip. The hotel is beautiful with a wonderful view. It is in the perfect location for enjoying the Mag Mile.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: So good we went back
text: We visited here in 2017 and enjoyed the hotel and staff so much that we had to go back.  This hotel is in a perfect location for all the sights on the Mag Mile. The rooms are very nice with a fantastic view to boot.  Michelle at the hotel bar is fantastic.  She went out of her way to talk to us about the places and sites to see.  We were not too impressed with the roof top bar, not the same type of conversation and welcoming is the downstairs bar. There was also a young Spanish bellman that went out of his way to help u with some issues.  I can not remember his name but he too made a difference for us.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: high-end historic place to stay at
text: Exceptional accomodations in a beautifully restored building in central downtown Chicago. You simply cannot ask for a better location. Up to or even above any Hilton standard, even considering top of brand like WA. Amazing.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful, clean and great service.
text: This is a stunning building that mixes new and old.    It‚Äôs very modern but in a classic Chicago skyscraper in an unbeatable location.  The concierge helped us get a near impossible reservation at Tao Chicago which was amazing! The hotel is clean with a fabulous rooftop bar. Our room was large and had a magnificent view.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lovely hotel, but be selective of your view
text: Beautiful historic hotel with well trained staff. The room was lovely with high quality amenities. My husband enjoyed the Nespresso machine, the large flat screen and I enjoyed the high end toiletries. Breakfast in the Land & Lake is a separate review but *spoiler alert* delicious. The chicken sausage and house made biscuits were worth writing home about. High praise for a hotel restaurant: I will come back when I am not staying in the hotel.About the view: the property is Across the river from Trump Tower and you can see it with him most every view. It is startling and unpleasant. I genuinely felt some PTSD when I looked out my window in the middle of the night and saw it. I highly recommend being selective in your choices of rooms. It‚Äôs too bad that the river has to be spoiled, but when I stay in a beautiful hotel I don‚Äôt want to look out the window and see that. Otherwise, a lovely experience.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Must stay here !!!!
text: Where do I even start this is the best hotel I ever stayed in hands down as soon as I walked in hotel all the staff were happy and with smiles on there faces I got to the front desk and abel who helped us was such a nice kind gentleman he showed us where everything was and gave a nice view in our room another person who helped us was juan leyva such a great and wonderful guy both of these guys knew how to treat there guest I felt like I was at home This place is a must stay place best place ever !

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Honeymoon!
text: Love this hotel! Can‚Äôt say enough nice things about the staff and our stay!  When we checked in on February 14th- there was a slight glitch in the way our reservation was booked- due to using points and paying for one night. Trevor fixed us up- got us on the 20th floor- with a great view of the river.  He went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of. We had a mishap with our Amtrak reservation- that caused us to have to depart early Sunday morning vs our planned late check out -  We had paid for breakfast & a late check out. Once again- Trevor and Andrew were able to accommodate our needs. Upon check in and check out- due to having to wait for the issues to be solved ( which didn‚Äôt take long) Trevor gave us a few drink passes for the bar.  The bar and view were awesome- and so was Michelle. She took great care of us- and gave us great suggestions for drinks- and things to do / see while in Chicago.  Also- there was some live music in the bar -Mike Hayes I believe was his name. What a voice!! This guy is was great.Our room was clean, comfortable & quiet. Awesome view- loved the Nespresso coffee maker -  55 inch tv‚Äôs & comfy bed and linens. I want to thank Trevor, Andrew and Michelle for taking great care of us during our Honeymoon stay. Can‚Äôt wait to come back to Chicago & stay at this property.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great downtown hotel
text: I have stayed here a few times and find the welcome and rooms to be excellent. the rooms are a good sixe and some have great views. They are also quiet. the 24 hour gym is small but well equiped. Don't miss the rooftop bar.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: AMAZING Experience!
text: I have stayed at the LondonHouse over five times now for business and it just keeps getting better every single time... the staff, the views and the rooms are amazing! 11/10 would recommend LondonHouse over and over again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nice when reality meets your expectations
text: Fabulous hotel-where the people really make the difference!  Rooms are gorgeous and beautifully appointed and views are breathtaking!  Steps to everything we wanted to see and do.  Staff are welcoming and really helpful-from door team, housekeeping- even maintenance team bothered to stop and say Hello, or Good Morning.  You can tell the staff here are a tight team.  Folks at Concierge desk- Shannon, always sent us in the right direction and didn't push touristy sites or restaurants- we experienced some great off the beaten track eateries that really made our trip!  Cannot recommend this hotel enough.  Will be my go to hotel when we come back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay at the London House!
text: I had a great stay this past weekend at the London House. It was my fourth stay. The service has always been consistent and amazing. Throughout my stay I received multiple text messages from Guest Services checking in to see how we were enjoying our stay. It is the small touches that I really appreciate!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Outstanding Service; Awesome Views
text: From the warm welcome of Andrew at the Front Desk, to the continual text checkins from Caitlin to see if we needed anything;  from the spectacular room views and central to everything location to the nice room appointments;  From the attentiveness of concierge Shannon to Every Single Staff Member greeting you on the automatic elevators with warm ‚ÄúHellos‚Äù. And ‚ÄúHave a nice Days,,‚Äù This Hilton Curio Hotel is special!  And the exceptional service the staff provide is even more so.  Will most definitely return!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cupid's Cure
text: We work in Industry and had to save valentines day for Friday night. Head concierge Shannon was our cupid and we couldn't be more grateful! We had a late dinner reservation and she made sure to notate this so we could check in with no problems. We got into our room that was an upgraded River view, and awaiting us was a covered plate with an envelope titled "Andrea". Beside our window with the view of the nighttime city, we enjoyed the contents of the covered plate, a heart shaped mousse cake from Shannon. The remainder of our stay was a dream. Can't wait to return for future celebrations! We will never forget our first Valentines Day.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing
text: I loved this hotel!!! The view was amazing but the rooftop view was breath taking! The room was comfortable and so clean. The shower was huge and the staff was so nice. I will definitely be back. It was walking distance to everything downtown.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great staff
text: Decided to do a last minute Valentine's day with my girlfriend, and this hotel accommodated me perfectly. With the help of concierge Shane and Matt, I was able to get a great room with a beautiful view of the city. The pricing was extremely fair (especially being last minute),along with last minute Valentine's day preparations that were made by concierge pierre. Overall, a very nice stay at a very nice hotel with exceptional staff.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Place
text: Stayed for the night to celebrate my wedding anniversary and it didn‚Äôt disappoint. Great place, very friendly staff that was more than willing to help you out! Rooms were great. Awesome layout with two large screen TVs and great view over the city.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel with amazing views
text: Stayed here valentines night with my husband. Great location with the most amazing views of the city! We had a corner room and the views are just something else. Defo recommend paying that bit extra for the corner view. You can see everything! The room was clean and modern. Quite small for the price but we weren‚Äôt in it that much. Bathroom is beautiful. So modern and a giant walk in shower. Really one of the nicest bathrooms I‚Äôve stayed in. There wasn‚Äôt a lot of staff around in the hotel. Seemed to be only door men and then the guys at the check in. We ate downstairs at the restaurant for a quick bite before we left for the night. Amazing Parmesan fries and chicken wings and nice drink specials. After we got back we decided to try the rooftop bar. We didn‚Äôt feel comfortable at all. I mean we were dressed nice and we are usually comfortable in fashionable bars but this was so stuffy and felt like every eye was on you as soon as you entered. It didn‚Äôt seem to be hotel guests that were at the bar more just other patrons. We left as soon as we got there. We did check out the rooftop for views and it was amazing. Just amazing. You need to go up and take some pics. Room service stopped at 10. This was really annoying as we wanted a drink in our room. So we had to pay the over the top prices from the bar up stairs and bring them down. Overall a great stay the views really are worth it.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect Location
text: The London House by far exceeded our expectations in quality and location of the hotel. The views are amazing and everything is within walking distance. I highly recommend this hotel. You won't be disappointed!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Girls Trip
text: Great hotel tucked away in the middle of the heart of Chicago!  Wonderful open inviting lobby bar with plenty of places for your group to gather.  Rooms overlook the river and are very comfortable.  Elevators are strange and had mechanical issues - hard to use but other than that it was perfect.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chic stylish hotel
text: The Londonhouse is my favorite spot to stay in Chicago. The rooms are unique in design and the amenities are top notch. The bed is more comfortable than mine at home! The door staff is helpful and even remembered our name!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Girls' weekend in the Windy City
text: This is my new "go-to" hotel when staying in Chicago.  The location is a 10, the quality of the rooms is a 10, and the service is a 12!  Hilton has outdone themselves!Interesting to note, this hotel gets extra points for ease of accessibility to rooms for guests.  Usually hotels in historic buildings have elevators that are inefficient.  The elevators at LondonHouse route riders based on their requested floor and so no one has to wait an exorbitant amount of time to get where you're going.  This is particularly convenient during checkout hours.  Also, there are 2 entrances to the hotel, one from Wacker and another from N. Michigan.  At the end of a long day of walking, saving those few extra steps is magical.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location, very clean and nice people
text: This location is great.  You are within walking distance of the Magnificent Mile and other attractions.  It is across the street from Trump Tower which also has a very nice restaurant.  Room is very clean and our view from the 18th floor, room 1810 was superb.  Couldn't be any more happier with our stay.  Restaurant inside of hotel had great food and the bar on the 21st floor was also nice to hang out.  Very busy at times but worth the visit.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great weekend stay
text: What s great place for a weekend downtown!  Great location, very nice rooms and super nice staff!  The Lobby bar is a great place to hang out and Michelle the bartender was so attentive and handled a big crowd with ease!  Great service!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome Chicago hotel on the river
text: One great weekend experience in the city. Starting with the check in where we were treated so well the time in the hotel was so gratifying. Nice city view up and down the river. Most important factor was how we were treated by the staff all over the hotel.Would definitely go back just for the great service!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Terrific service.
text: Spot on fast front desk service.  Forgot my lint brush. Had one on its way up in a few minutes.  Nice touch. Nice view too...sort of. Lovely historic building and nice location. I‚Äôd come back again.....

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome stay!
text: I recently stayed at the London House and really enjoyed my stay! This hotel has great rooms, perfect location, comfortable beds, large tv in room, full fitness area, in-house restaurant that has beautiful views and friendly staff. I will definitely be staying here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Stunning Hotel
text: The London House never fails to satisfy. The hotel is beautiful from the rooms to the restaurants. I have stayed here every time I've been in Chicago and will continue to recommend it. The prices are great, the rooms are always extremely clean, the bathrooms are beautiful, the staff is nothing less than helpful and always extremely kind. On top of this the location is perfect!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Spectacular Stay and View of Chicago
text: We stayed at the London House on one of the coldest weekends in Chicago however the London House accommodations and their staff warmed our hearts.  Shayne Blidy checked us in and went above and beyond to welcome us.  He is a wonderful young man and is definitely an asset to your organization.  The concierge made recommendations for restaurants and we loved every one he suggested.  The hotel and rooms are beautiful, clean and our view of the city was magnificent!  We will definitely revisit to take advantage of the outdoor deck when the weather is warmer.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location!
text: Our family‚Äôs first trip to Chicago was made better by staying at the Londonhouse. Great location and great views. We originally booked the 1 bedroom suite without a view, but when checking in using the app, I realized all of those rooms are next to the elevators. When we got to the hotel, the front desk happily changed us to the 1 bedroom vista suite. We loved the breakfast restaurant on street level. The rooftop bar was beautiful. It was very cold, so only stayed a few minutes. We would stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Birthday weekend
text: Hotel staff was very helpful and friendly. Spa services were excellent. I was very impressed with my stay here. Rooms were clean and comfortable. I liked the convenience of being near restaurants and activities. Great place to stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lovely stay
text: Stayed here after arriving late coming home from a trip to Europe. What a perfect hotel!  Location, amenities, staff, restaurant, top floor bar, all top notch. Easy walking distance to The Billy Goat Tavern to boot!!  I‚Äôll definitely stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Hotel and Location
text: I was here for a conference during the Polar Vortex.  Thank god I was at this hotel.  It had everything I needed and the valet staff were wonderful.  They ran to get our luggage even though it was -45 degrees.  And they smiled while doing it.  Heroes is all I can say.  So glad no one was hurt during this extreme cold weather.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent stay at London House
text: From greeters at entry to the exceptional front desk arrival/check-in, our stay at this hotel was fantastic! We were offered an upgraded room at reasonable price and the room was worth every bit of it! The view was breathtaking, room was beautifully appointed and even warm when we entered -an appreciated detail in the winter following the polar vortex that had just lifted. Service in this hotel is exceptional. And the restaurant is outstanding, especially as 2 foodies with particular taste. Every staff member we encountered was delightful. Will definitely stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great visit..even better than the first time
text: In December  I stayed for one night and it was great. This visit I was there for 2 nights. The rooms are incredible with great views and so clean and organized. the staff is very friendly and truly cares about you as a person and very accommodating. from the valet to the front desk to the lady who served us wine with our meal for room-service. Shannon the concierge was one of the BEST I have ever encountered and help me with all my questions and needs.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Linda
text: Enjoyed our yearly girls trip to Chicago and it is such a joy to see Trevor always smiling and taking such good care of us!! Trevor makes sure that all our needs are met and goes above and beyond all expectations!!! We enjoy coming to LondonHouse! And as long as Trevor is there, we will, too!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Hotel
text: My favorite hotel is Chicago! Rooms, staff and vibe all top notch. Love the bar on the 21st floor and the restaurant on the ground floor for breakfast. I highly recommend staying here whenever traveling to Chicago!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Gorgeous Hotel, Friendly Staff
text: This hotel is beautiful! From the room, to the lobby, to the bar on the rooftop everything is absolutely gorgeous. I spent two nights here for a meeting last week and couldn't have loved it more. The staff was friendly and helpful, the bed was out of this world, the Malin & Goetz bath products were excellent and the location is amazing. This is not only my favorite hotel in Chicago, but one of my top 10 in the world!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chicago's Best!!!
text: My stay from beginning to end was simply the best! From the moment I was greeted at hotel entrance, I felt very taken care of and in good hands. My room was spectacular and temperature was perfect during the beyond frigid temperatures! I decided to take a trip to LH21 for a few cocktails where I found the staff and ambiance to be simply amazing. I HIGHLY recommend this place and look forward to coming back during warmer weather so I can enjoy the outdoor portion of the rooftop food and beverage venue.Keep up the great work team LondonHouse!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellant Business Winter Stay
text: Stayed for 2 nights last week and it was great. The hotel offers so much itself + all the walking distance restaurants, businesses and things to do. Room quality + amenities that this hotel offers cannot be beat. It was my 2nd business stay and can't wait to be back for a leisure stay this upcoming summer. TY LH for your great hospitality as always!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Place to Stay in Chicago!
text: I stayed at LondonHouse last week for a conference and had an amazing stay! Bell Staff at arrival were extremely efficient and very friendly. The Lobby is very well appointed and extremely clean. The Front Office staff were amazing at check-in answering all of my questions and making sure I had all of the information I needed. Naturally after a long trip I stopped in the lounge for a night Cap and the staff couldn't have been any more friendly! The rooms are beautiful and extremely clean, housekeeping really does an awesome job here. I travel a lot and cleanliness can be hit and miss but these guys really know what they are doing. Highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to the Chicago area!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellant Business Hotel
text: The hotel staff members were professional and very accommodating.  Excellent location for my business trip - close to restaurants and shopping - and very nice and clean room.  Good price point for business traveler, and the hotel is within walking distance to and from train.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Regular business traveler
text: I‚Äôve stayed at the LH about 30 times over the last couple of years and cannot recommend it highly enough. From the well equipped rooms (espresso machine, digital speaker etc) to the lobby bar (Dijana is a cocktail wizard) and, of course - the rooftop. It has it all - nothing is too much trouble for the LH team.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing staff and lovely accommodations
text: Abel, Paloma, and Shayne were at the front desk when I arrived and they were amazing. High energy, friendly and helpful. Would recommend this hotel. Room was nice and they accommodated my early arrival.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect Location, Clean Accommodations, Great Staff!
text: It doesn't get any more "Chicago" than the London House! A perfect location right along the river. Walking distance to so much. We opted to use a close parking garage vs. the expensive valet - the same situation you've have at any downtown hotel. We were able to easily park and unload when arriving and did the same upon checkout with ease. The valets were kind and helpful. As was all of the staff. Check-in was simple and we were greeted by several kind employees. My friend was even able to checkout a phone converter from the the concierge - super accommodating! Our room was very clean and spacious. We had a great view of the river even from a "partial view" room. It would definitely be a fun place to stay for St. Patrick's Day! Don't miss out on the rooftop. We were there in December so we didn't do drinks up there but the views were breathtaking and made even better with the Christmas lights. The bar was nice for a drink before bed however, the service was lacking and almost rude. Also, our drinks were not the best. I have never ordered a coffee and Bailey's and gotten it served cold? Perhaps, just a miscommunication on my end but again, I've never had it served that way so it was a bit off putting. I will definitely stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Hotel!
text: Stayed here for one night when we arrived in Chicago, upgraded to a One Bedroom suite. Hotel is very modern, clearly been refurbished and had money well spent on it. The room was spacious, HUGE smart TVs with very modern bathrooms. The view from the room was amazing. As Diamond member we got credit to use on breakfast down in the restaurant - plenty of choice and again nicely refurbished. Staff throughout the hotel were super friendly and helpful. Roof top bar was cosy, and again great views. We stayed in 3 hotels in Chicago this trip, and this hotel was our favourite!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House
text: Good location. Helpful staff.You can check-in through app in advance and select your room.Parking is v expensive, that‚Äôs the same story for all downtown hotels I guess.Hotel should tie up with nearby garages and provide benefit to customer.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Classy meets modern
text: I stayed here with my wife for NYE and got a fantastic riverside room in the 15th floor. The room was beautiful with lots of wood accents and modern features such as smartphone-controlled TV via chromecast and room key. Beautiful overhead shower (no tub). And most importantly, an excellent bed for a restful weekend in the city. It is right in the middle of all the action. We walked and Ubered to different places including millenium park (the bean), the Shedd Aquarium, and the Field Museum. Also, great lobby bar, rooftop bar, and restaurant. Tried all the in-house amenities and loved them all.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Quick trip to Chicago
text: Stay at this hotel on your next trip to Chicago--you won't be sorry you did! Amazing view of the river and river walk. Walking distance to everything and felt very safe in this location. The customer service was beyond amazing! The only time I have had comparable treatment was at a Ritz so that should tell you alot!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location for both business & pleasure
text: This is the 2nd time I have stayed at this hotel and it‚Äôs at a great location for both business and pleasure trips. The rooms are beautiful to boost and love the views....it‚Äôs a good choice in my opinion

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Snowy nights
text: Wonderful hotel with a great location right on Michigan Ave close to many highly rated restaurants and world class shopping. Room was spacious and incredibly clean view was excellent as well. Do not search anymore just reserve your room and move on with where to eat!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: So awesome I had to write a review
text: Someone suggested I try this hotel and I am very glad I did.  I was a little skeptical when I booked it because the price was so reasonable I figured it must not be that great, but I liked this as much as I liked the Waldorf despite being a fraction of the price.  Everyone was so friendly and helpful, I really can't recall the last time I couldn't come up with at least some small quibbling complaint about service, but that was the case here.  People say things like "friendly and helpful" all the time in reviews, but this really stood out to me, to the point I had to write a review and mention it.  The rooms were also very nice.  I have never seen bathroom fixtures that sparkly and clean.  And the view from our Vista King room was awesome.  I can't say enough about how happy I was with this hotel, and for the price I paid, it just blew me away.  I got to Chicago frequently, and this will absolutely be the place I stay from now on.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful location and great experience
text: Gave this lovely Curio a try this trip and it felt like home. The staff was extremely friendly and inviting to conversation. Greeters always smiling and concierge efficient and accommodating.  Loved the location and the rooftop.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing!!!!!
text: My daughter and I go to Chicago every year around the same time, and usually, we stay at a different Hilton location. This year I chose the LondonHouse.  From the moment I checked in, they made me feel special.  I was given one of the Vista rooms that overlooks the river and the room has floor to ceiling windows.  From the windows, I could see down the river which was spectacular.  The room was clean and very comfortable. Then, my daughter got lost driving in from Indiana and Mark, a bellman, helped me on and off for over forty minutes to help my daughter find her way.  Mark was finally able to get her location close enough to the hotel so we took off running to get to her.  If it wasn't for Mark I don't know what I would have done.  I have never stayed in a hotel that has gone above and beyond for me and Mark did that which reflects well on the LondonHouse. With an employee like Mark, you can't go wrong staying at the LondonHouse.  From check-in to check-out our trip was exceptional and I would definitely stay again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect weekend stay :)
text: This hotel, aside from being beautiful, is located in the heart of the city. It offers great views, a nice rooftop bar, rooms are clean & spacious, and the concierge service is excellent. Our stay was perfect üëå

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Good view and location
text: As HHonors gold member, I got a room with the river view. The weather is not good, the sidewalk of the river is still beautiful at night.The room is small and TV screen is too big. It is not comfortable to watch TV on the bed.Breakfast is not good because they offer limited veggie dishes. Internet is good as usual.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Service
text: The Hotel was very well located. I loved the room, big and comfortable. The bed was super comfortable. The pressure of the water in the showe was also pretty good. The staff was super nice and helpful when asking for directions.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: I had a great stay at the Hilton Curio in Chicago
text: This is such a great hotel in Chicago! I've  been there twice for business and would easily select this hotel for personal trips. It's conveniently located to so many things: shopping, site-seeing, restaurants, etc. (In-room dining is spot-on, and there's a great bar, and there's a great place to eat downstairs, etc. etc. etc!)

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Stunning
text: 4 months on, and I'm still a bit miffed that a flight delay leaving LaGuardia meant I only had about 9 hours at this hotel instead of the planned 14, and most of it was spent sleeping and getting ready in the morning.It's beautiful. I received a lovely upgrade as a Hilton Diamond member, and the room was fantastic. The only downside was it was so big it took a while to close the curtains and turn off all the lights. The bed was big and comfortable, the furnishings classy and different, and the bathroom/shower was lovely too. I had a working breakfast so skipped it in the hotel. The staff were super friendly and helpful. I'm now trying to find a way to return to Chicago soon, so I can visit LondonHouse properly!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great services and a unique city view
text: This hotel is very unique.  The decoration in the lobby and guest rooms is tastefully picked.  Unlike the mass-produced items used by a lot of chain hotels, objectives at this hotel are very different and camera-appealing.  The hotel is a example of craftsmanship.Although the hotel is in a building back to 1920, the hotel is an up-to-date facility, from elevator, room key, bathroom to coffee machine.  The bar on the 21st floor is a must-visit.  From there, you can have a great view of Chicago river and bridges.  It is especially beautiful in early evening.People at the front desk are helpful.  Normally there are only two staffs at the front desk.  If you have HH status with complimentary water and breakfast, get 2 bottles of water and a breakfast coupon from the front desk.  The breakfast coupon is less than $15 dollars, so it might not be sufficient for a full breakfast.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chic Property with Government rates!
text: If your in town don‚Äôt miss out on staying here, specially if your a Federal Employee. You‚Äôll experience a high end hotel experience with a magnificent location. Best bang for buck in the city. Will definitively return.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic!!
text: Highly recommend!  High-end finishes, great views, awesome staff!  Beautiful property that really stands out in a competitive market. We would definitely choose to stay again and highly recommend it for anyone!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: ‚ú®Perfect Place to Stay‚ú®
text: Recently, stayed for the weekend and after staying in a few different Chicago hotels this was by far our favorite! The staff, especially Ken  & the young lately that helped check us in, were just off the charts! Kind, helpful, informativeüôå Our view was top notch, our room was on point, staff was fantastic, and our breakfast was delicious... what more can you ask for? Would highly recommend and hope to stay again soon!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome Visit, Great staff!
text: Wow,we loved our visit to LondonHouse! We stayed 3 days from Florida. We arrived around 10am from an early flight and were acknowledged for being HH members at check in and were giving the same room (Vista corner room) one floor below without asking due to it already being ready which was appreciated so early in the day. Hotel staff was great from front desk, bell hops and staff member helping me w/ WiFi issues from automated check in text message system. Hotel is very new, modern and affordable, located in the hub if everything. Smart elevators are quicker than ever. There is a rooftop bar that has the perfect view that we wished was open because it even had a indoor cover but no one manning it, so we went one floor down to their other bar instead. Land and Lake restaurant is also great which is in lobby but technically isn't affiliated, we ate there every morning. We will definitely be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Spent nye here
text: We got a room called 1 KING 1 BDRM VISTA SUITE and it was well worth the money! We came here for nye to see the fireworks. Our room had floor to ceiling windows so we were able to catch up close the fireworks right outside of our window. No joke. Literally right outside. They have fireworks along the river and one of the stops is across the street from the hotel. Hotel was very nice and modern. Elevators take awhile but that‚Äôs ok. Afternoon tea in the lobby bar was wonderful. Hotel is situation at one head of magnificent mile very easy to walk to and convenient

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Modern, Clean and Comfortable
text: I spent three nights there last week.  This hotel is lovely.  Almost completely renovated the entire facility is beautiful.  Very clean, fast moving elevators, nice lobby bar.  Extremely helpful staff.  Always greeting with a nice word and a smile.  I needed to print some documents that were e-mailed to my phone, sign them and send them back out and the concierge was extremely helpful.  Highly recommend this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great experience and perfect location!!
text: LondonHouse is a beautiful hotel located in the prime area of downtown Chicago. From the beginning, we were pleased to be there. It is right on Michigan Ave, overlooking the beautiful skyline as well as the Chicago River. We were checked into our hotel seamlessly, and accommodations were spectacular. The rooftop is a must! Also, the amenities (breakfast etc.) were all above and beyond. If you don't wish to stay here, I would highly recommend just sitting on the rooftop for a drink!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Exceptional Service at the Lobby Bar!!!
text: The entire staff is always amazing.I normally don't spend time at the bar when I'm staying at a hotel. My last trip, I stayed 5 nights. The first night I decided to have a drink at the lobby bar. It was there I met my new barfriender, Michelle. That became my thing. I had drinks at the lobby bar every night Michelle was working. She is an amazing person and bartender. I watched her interact with other patrons. Always polite, and always with a smile.I might plan my next trip to the LondonHouse around her schedule.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: WOW!!
text: The LondonHouse Chicago has been absolutely incredible! Right from the start the gentleman Mathew I believe his name was, treated us with the utmost respect and hospitality you expect when staying at properties like this. All of the staff from the concierge to the staff at there gorgeous restaurant were nothing short of amazing! Everyone went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable. I still have another night here but I could not help but write a review. Awesome location with top notch amentities and staff, I highly recommend this hotel I‚Äôve stayed at a few curios and this is by far my favorite.5 ‚≠êÔ∏è

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A night out
text: Amazing service the staff was great very helpful the gentleman that checked me in was great. The roof top is gorgeous. I will definitely continue to come back. This hotel is such an amazing hotel and has a great view.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location
text: Can't get a better location in the City, right on the river and a stone's throw from the Magnificent Mile.Good size corner room with amazing views on 18th floor.Busy bustling hotel but quiet room so great. Very slow lifts and had to wait an age at peak times. Good breakfast in the downstairs restaurant.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Our favorite in the City
text: We love the London House Hotel or as we just call the LH. It‚Äôs our home away from home. We stay here at least once a month sometimes even more. Great Service, beautiful rooms, cozy beds, fabulous views and close to everything!Abel Rodrigez (Pre-Arrival Coordinator) has made us feel so welcomed time after time again.Thank you LH keep doing what you‚Äôre doing. We will be back soon!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful hotel!
text: Lovely hotel, great location and friendly staff - couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better stay! Comfortable beds and clean, modern rooms. Beautiful view of the river especially with the fireworks on New Year‚Äôs Eve.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great view and staff
text: Shayne who checked me in was amazing.  Had an wonderful view of the river from my Vista suite room.  The room was great.  Drinks at the lobby bar were on point and the ambiance was nice.    I cant wait until summer to enjoy the roof top bar.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing property, great staff
text: Everything was just great in this hotel, from the staff to the room and amenities. It has everything you need to spend a good time while being in the centre of Chicago. Would definitely come back here.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent hotel in the heart of Chicago!
text: From the time we walked through the door until check out, our stay was fabulous. We enjoyed the hotel accommodations and amenities, the atmosphere inside and outside the hotel. The staff was extremely kind, Professional and very helpful. Amazing view from the room, rooftop bar and restaurant is really alive. The hotel was centrally located to shopping, entertainment, museums, restaurants, riverboat tours, and parks. All were within walking distance from the hotel. We would stay again in a minute.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great property!
text: This hotel was everything we needed for a family adventure. Not having a pool for the kids was quickly overshadowed by the amazing views and the proximity to all the fun stuff! The staff was fantastic, the location was top notch, and the hotel was clean.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fabulous location
text: Great location in the heart of downtown Chicago.  Cleanest rooms in the city- by far.  Only drawback, rooms tend to be on the small size, but the views make up for the room size.  Gorgeous, historic, and in the heart of everything ... literally 10 steps from the Mag Mile !!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Hotel
text: Most Convenient location to access downtown Chicago, in a walking distance to all places we are interested in visiting. Hotel facility is neat and well managed. Staff members are friendly and very helpful!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Post Christmas Downtown Diversion
text: Live in the Chicago suburbs but wanted a little something different after Christmas.  Decided to spend a weekend in downtown Chicago. The LondonHouse is a beautiful hotel.  Room had a view down the Chicago river.  Location makes easy walking to Michigan Ave, River North, and Millennium Park

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great way to start 2019
text: What a great experience! I stayed at a different hotel on New Year's Eve. I booked this one New Year's Day and called to see what time I can check in. I spoke to Abel Rodriguez and informed him it would be my first official stay as a Diamond member. It was just after 9am and he said, "come on over, I've checked you in and upgraded your room". We hurried to check out of the other hotel and rushed over here. Abel was pleasant and very professional. We enjoyed the room and friendly staff so much that we booked 2 more nights immediately. Our first 3 days of 2019 are off to a great start thanks to this great hotel and staff

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very good hotel
text: Very good hotel, the lobby was beautiful and the area was perfect! Had to take a star off because our first room was cleaned sloppily, one of the white sheets had a dark stain on it, and there were shopping bags left in the closest. We requested a new room, and the new room was much better.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay.
text: The view was amazing.  The service was excellent.  The location was perfect.  The town is always fantastic.  I missed the hotel (and Chicago) as soon as I started my trek home.  I didn't take advantage of any of the amenities, save for internet access, (which was excellent.)  I did arrive at 10:30am and they had a room already prepared, so I was in sooner than expected.  I have to give the baggage check a hat tip for that - conscientiousness and going the extra mile means more than people realize.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing and luxurious
text: I got the chance to stay at the LondonHouse again and I couldn‚Äôt be happier. Was extremely happy with the hotel itself and the amenities offered. Trevor, at the front desk greeted me with a smile and answers to all my questions. As  a frequent traveler, I was pretty impressed. Hilton really knows how to do service and I‚Äôll definitely be back again soon!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: One of my favorite hotel stays of the year
text: This is a beautiful hotel in a great location. I was upgraded to a 1 bedroom suite, which was very roomy. It was in the older part of the hotel...but this is not your grandmother's hotel room with floral sheets and curtains. It's very modern and comfortable. I was a little worried at first that it was literally right next door to the elevator, but I didn't notice any elevator noise when I was in my room. Every employee I interacted with was very friendly. The friendliness always felt genuine; never fake or overbearing. I hope management appreciates how lucky they are to have a group of employees who have great people-skills. Make sure to check out the views from the rooftop. Even in December, I was able to go outside to take pictures of the skyline.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect location, amazing staff!!!
text: Me and my wife recently went to Chicago for short shopping/City visit trip from UK. We had a great time in Chicago and big part of that was thanks to the hotel we stayed in.LondonHouse is extremely conveniently located. We went to the city from the airport by train which is not only cheap but also much better way of getting to the loop. It took about 45 minutes to get from the airport to Washington station and about 7 minutes walk to the hotel. We have got to the hotel around midday and our room was not ready yet but we have pre checked in, left the luggage and were told that we will receive the message once the room will be ready. About one hour later we have received the text. We stayed in one of the vista rooms and I have to say that it is worth every penny. The view from it is amazing. Our room was located on the 6th floor and after couple of days we have moved to floor 15. Both were great, but the higher you go the quieter it gets. Rooms are very clean and spacious. Hotel is located extremely conveniently to enjoy the city. Many attractions are within walking distances and if they are not there is an bus stop right outside with the choice of lines and the ‚ÄúL‚Äù train is less than 5 minutes walk.Even the famous Andy‚Äôs Jazz Bar is 10 minutes walk as well as many more bars and clubs.What also make LondonHouse great place to stay is the employees. All of the staff where extremely helpful and friendly. They really care about their guests and want to make sure that you have a best hotel stay possible.I would like to say special thank you to the gentleman at the concierge. Unfortunately I can not remember his name but he help enormously with a very important printouts and scans.Thank you very much.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Elegant and Comfortable
text: Historic yet all the modern comforts. Four stars because the bathroom needed more towel/robe hooks near the shower. Placement was awkward. Overall, very nice, comfortable mattress, and pillows though some firmer ones would have improved our sleep. Very quiet, really didn't notice the street noise.  Smart elevators arrived quickly.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nice Hotel for Great Price
text: Up to date rooms. Great value.On site restaurant was delicious. Staff was courteous, especially Trevor at front desk took time to get to know our party and meet our needs. He is an ideal employee. Location was perfect!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Hotel in Chicago
text: I normally stay at Marriotts but had some extra Hilton points to use and the London House was a good value considering it was over the Chicago Marathon weekend. The hotel has a very modern feel. Although my room wasn't ready when I checked in, everyone was extremely accommodating and helped to store my luggage while I went out to explore the city. The room itself was very spacious and had a large bathroom with a huge stand alone shower. Additionally, there was a robe as well as Nespresso instead of your run of the mill hotel room coffee maker. I was able to use the gym during my stay and it had a nice selection of equipment. If given the opportunity, I would definitely stay here again. The location is prime right on the river and close to Michigan Ave and Millennium Park.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect location
text: Perfect location for all there is to do in Chicago. Right off Magnificent Mile at river. Take advantage of higher floor for better view. Be sure to ask about elevators since they are not the usual. Toiletries were Malin + Goetz which were great.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lovely place, brilliant location
text: People from my office stayed here while attending a conference at the Hyatt. It was lovely. One thing to note is that the elevators are kind of weird. You select your floor before getting on and then it tells you which car to take. I saw a lot of people getting on then looking for the button. I wish staff had explained better. Luckily, a coworker stayed there before and clued me in. My room was lovely. I enjoyed the Nespresso machine. The river view was nice, even if Trump Tower was staring at me. This hotel is on Michigan Avenue, so we walked to several places. Since I was here on business, I didn't do much exploring, but this would be a nice base for lots of Chicago fun. I would love to stay here again. The restaurant was good for breakfast and lunch. Staff was very helpful.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic Holiday Experience
text: This was the 3rd year we stayed at the London House on the evening before Christmas eve (Dec 23rd).  The hotel is beautiful and everyone is attentive and friendly.  Be sure to visit the rooftop to see the wonderful skyline and lighted buildings.   Rooms are wonderful, especially Corner King - which I would reccomend over the 1 bdrm king suite- multiple large windows.  Very confortable.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location and Amenities
text: Great location with walking access to Loop and Miracle Mile. First class rooms and hotel systems. Fast elevators, with a touch screen floor select system. You enter your floor on wall mounted touch screens outside the elevator, and the screen then shows you which elevator to take. Rooms are beautifully decorated with several large windows yet full heavy duty draperies allowing darkness if you want to sleep in. Wonderful bathroom. Friendly and helpful staff.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fabulous Hotel
text: Spent 4 nights at London House during the Christmas holiday and it was a marvelous experience! My view with floor to ceiling windows on a high floor were incomparable, both day and night!  The room was tastefully decorated and clean. Guest service personnel were friendly, caring and professional. When access to my room was delayed beyond the 4:00 check-in time, Trevor was extremely kind, accommodating and apologetic. A follow-up apology from the Desk Manager on duty was appreciated. The staff really cares about their guests.As a single traveler, I felt safe and comfortable at all times.This hotel is perfectly located to reach most attractions on foot, which adds to the experience because there is so much to see and places to wander into along the way.This will be my go-to hotel for all future visits to Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Bess is the best!
text: Spending the night in our own city as a tourist. Bess was extremely helpful. All of the staff were very warm, friendly, and accommodating, the hotel is clean, beautiful, and conveniently located to all CHICAGO has to offer. Don‚Äôt miss the rooftop views!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Londonhouse ~ Best Stay
text: Booked Londonhouse mainly for location- S. Magnificent Mile/The Loop Area; also curious to see the recent renovations...Booked thru HHonors App; given an incredible rate ~ almosttoo good to believe-digital key & picked our own room!Arrived early Wednesday morning- Contacted Hotel thru App.Susannah (MOD) texted immediately - gave us ability to check-in early afternoon...gave courteous luggage storage until timeto check-in. Trevor & Keith @ Front Desk gave exceptionally superior Customer Service.Our room was a Vista- gorgeous designer appointments ~Well use of large space ~ the floor to ceiling window providedan extraordinary view of river & draw bridges. Marble bathroomw/spacious shower & frosted glass sliding doorThe Digital elevators provided extra security & efficiency; the rooftop bar & Terrace provided excellent views of city & river.The private bar area with fireplace lends an air of intimacy.From check-in to check out; top notch service & professional courtesy delivered by each staff member; from curbside Bellhop to Management...exceptional customer service The Land n Lake Restaurant is an added Bonus - superior service & mealsOur new ‚ÄúGo-to‚Äù Chicago Hotel! We have already begun the‚ÄúWord of Mouth‚Äù Advertising ~ such a Treat! Thanks to allinvolved in our Best Stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Hotel in Downtown Chicago
text: Absolutely hands down the best stay in Chicago. I visit Chicago monthly for leisure. I have stayed at multiple hotels here and since staying at Londonhouse over thanksgiving, and now over Christmas, this will be my new ‚Äú Go To‚Äù The biggest reason is service. Absolutely top notch. Over Thanksgiving Caitlin took care of us, and this stay Matthew checked us in. Extremely professional, prompt, accommodating, and extremely friendly. The beds are super comfy, very clean fitness center, awesome bars, and unique touches everywhere. The view out the front door is awesome, and within walking distance to everything! Even the walk to water tower isn‚Äôt bad! So, if you want an awesome hotel in a Chicago, this is the place to go!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Hotel Fantastic River View...
text: I booked the LondonHouse Chicago hotel mainly for its great location and also for the good reviews. Both good reasons individually but when combined made it irresistible. We wanted to be right in the mix of things in this vibrant city and LondonHouse Chicago was spot on and perfect for our needs. The hotel is located on the corner of Michigan Avenue and Wacker Drive and sitting beside the Chicago River and right in the heart of Chicago‚Äôs premium shops and restaurants. Our King Bed Vista Room had a fantastic view of the Chicago River, and was typical for this type of upscale Hilton. The room was comfortable and well fitted out with all the usual facilities but we found clothes storage a little too minimal. The bed was very comfortable and we both slept well during our stay and our large bathroom, with a really good walk-in shower, was just about perfect. The room was also complete with the usual complimentary tea/coffee, flat screen TV and Wi-Fi and safe. All fixtures and fittings were of really good quality too and generally the accommodations were great.We did not eat in the hotel so we cannot comment on the catering services. However, there are a plethora of restaurants and bars in the area so dining out is easy but not cheap. But with a little effort you can find local gems to dine that won‚Äôt break the bank while enjoying this great city. And I must say that all the staff we met were extremely helpful and nothing seemed too much trouble.Overall we had a very enjoyable stay and we would recommend LondonHouse Chicago hotel to anyone wishing to visit Chicago in the future.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: My new first choice hotel in Chicago!
text: From the first to last moment of my three-night stay, the LondonHouse was exemplary in every category.  I cannot emphasize enough what an ideal location the hotel occupies.  Situated right at the corner of Michigan Avenue and the river (Wacker Dr.), it is a perfect launching point for any of the downtown adventures.  You can walk practically everywhere, whether north or south of the river, the theater district, Millenium Park, Symphony Hall, Magnificent Mile shopping.  Befitting of hotel named after London, there is a Nando's practically across the street as well so many dining options at many different price points within walking distance (even on a December day).  The restaurant on the main floor was excellent for breakfast, but that is the only meal I tried there.  I did not try room service, but the bar on the second floor was quite good with ample, comfortable seating and both a bartender and attentive server.  There is also a rooftop bar which I did not try, but looked very nice.The staff in every detail was not only friendly but genuinely proud of this hotel.  I got a text from them once or twice a day asking how the stay was going, and any questions were answered quickly and courteously.The rooms are very comfortable and quiet.  While I wouldn't call them spacious, they also weren't cramped; and they were beautifully appointed.  It had a safe, a fridge (with a quick-cool setting), and what appeared to be an espresso machine, although I didn't use it.  The bathroom was lovely and modern, and the shower was excellent--firm flow of water through a rain-style shower head.  The bath products provided were also excellent.  I have read some questions/concerns about the elevators.  They are a little different, but I grew to like them.  Instead of pressing an up or down button, you actually enter your floor # on a touchscreen, and the panel tells you which elevator to go to.  It took me a time or two to appreciate that I knew which of the 10 elevators would be opened and then could queue at the correct one.  Do be aware (trigger warning...) that the LondonHouse is right across the river from the Trump Hotel.  They were able to accomodate my request for a room that didn't look at that ugly, bloated building.  Instead, I had a beautiful view of the Wrigley building, the Tribune building and the Apple Store--did you know that the roof of the Apple Store is an inverted iPad?  Brilliant.Thanks again to the LondonHouse staff and their manager.  This is my new top choice for hotels in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location and wonderful hotel!
text: This hotel is located approximately in the middle of the Miracle Mile on the river.  It is just minutes to Millenium Park and The Art Institute of Chicago in one direction and a short walk to the Navy Pier and the Water Tower in the other.  The views of the river are beautiful and the hotel had great service (even a Wine Hour) and the staff was extremely helpful.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Hotel with Great Staff
text: We stayed for one night in a vista room on the 18th floor. As a family of 4 we had plenty of room. The view from the room was beautiful. The best part of staying was the staff. Everyone we interacted with was very professional but still very welcoming. We will stay at the hotel when we go to Chicago in the future. Take advantage of the Land & Lake Kitchen on the first floor. The food was American fair.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic Christmas weekend stay in the City!
text: My wife and I had a fantastic visit at the LondonHouse property in downtown Chicago.  The level of service from the moment we arrived  was impeccable.   As a Hilton Diamond member they treated us extremely well throughout our stay.   The Christmas Carolers during our time at the hotel lobby bar were a very nice touch to put us in the holiday spirit.   Special kudos to the built in texting service.   They continued to stay in touch with us via text regarding any service needs throughout our stay which made it quite easy to request any additional needs.   Be sure to schedule a spa treatment on the 4th floor it was amazing.   Great job LondonHouse!!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A night on the town
text: Cool location next to the river.  Central to the location to walk everywhere.  Valet parking on site.  Love my suite, elevator is tricky if you don‚Äôt know how to use it.  Push the floor number you want and it tells you which elevator to use.  You walk in and it goes up to your floor!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Abel Rodriguez and his Knack for Hospitality
text: Being someone who works in the industry, from time to time you want to enjoy yourself and be the one who's the guest even in your own city. LondonHouse has been by far, my favorite hotel in Chicago I've stayed at all due to the wonderful Abel. Upon checking in, this gentleman couldn't make someone feel more welcomed and satisfied in regards to staying at a hotel. Abel, when I think of hospitality, you're the definition of it, cheers to you!The room was gorgeous and the views were breathtaking. We needed four wine glasses and immediately Front Desk, PBX, and In Room Dining were prompt in regards to answering calls and request. The staff all in all knows what they're doing so thank you all for everything.I will definitely be back in the near future.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay
text: Overall great stay!!! Spacious room and clean!! Great service and the rate for night stay was amazing!! Perfect location for everything you need to get to in city. Recommend this to anyone! Rooftop bar is one of a kind with the best city views and the DJ playing in the LH bar was really good! Kept the night going after a holiday party!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel with a perfect location!
text: We decided to surprise our son with a trip to Chicago for Christmas. We boarded the Amtrak in Holland MI for the short ride over and grabbed a Lyft to our hotel. We arrived early (about 9:30 am) and thought we'd see if our rooms were ready. One of them was ready for us so we stashed our luggage on got on our way. I'll start with the bellmen downstairs, before even checking out they were friendly and helpful. The front desk was accommodating and happy to give us advice if needed. We had a "Vista Suite" on the 19th floor which was perfect for the 3 of us. Our travel partners had a king room on the 18th floor. We had a fantastic view of the city and river below and our son loved having his own "room". We will be happy to stay here again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cannot beat the location!
text: This was my first time staying at the LondonHouse, and trust me - I thank those good third-party sites for getting me the stay at this fabulous hotel for less than the booking price! It is truly a luxury hotel - beautiful lobby, wonderful staff, the rooftop bar is breathtaking. The room was clean, super comfortable, and had one of the best showers I've put my body in. The highlight of the hotel though is the LOCATION. Three blocks from Millenium Park, and a five-minute walk from Mag Mile. Cannot beat the location at all. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: We will be back!
text: Beautiful hotel! Perfect location for enjoying our weekend in Chicago. So much in walking distance. Great staff!  Enjoyed Land and Sea - try the avocado goat cheese toast! Thank you Shane Blidy for encouraging us to share our great experience!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel in a great location with friendly staff
text: I've been wanting to stay here since it opened a few years ago.  This latest trip has finally given me an opportunity to visit this property.  I'm a Hilton Honors Diamond member and have stayed at most Hilton properties in the Chicago area.From the moment I approached the front entrance, I was greeted by friendly and helpful staff.  That continued with my experience with the front desk, conceirge, lobby bar, rooftop bar, and housekeeping.  The room itself was a nice size with all of the needed amenities.  I was able to get some work done in the room comfortably.Finally, the location of the hotel was perfect for me.  Close to my customer site from a business perspective.  From a personal perspective, close to the river which I took a walk down towards the lake.  I'd stay here again for either business or personal visits.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location, Perfect Hotel
text: One of Chicago's best kept secrets is this hotel.  Old world meets new world.  Perfect location, best staff and fantastic amenities.  A must stay when in the Windy City.  Don't forget to see the view of the city from the roof top lounge.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing hotel
text: This was our second time staying here and it didn‚Äôt disappoint. Treat yourself to this luxurious hotel in Chicago. Wonderful hotel, very clean, great staff, great location will definitely stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Hilton in Chicago
text: My Husband and I stayed this past weekend in Chicago. We booked two nights at the LondonHouse and one at the Waldorf. After our stays we are both in agreement that the LondonHouse is by far the better choice. It was a quarter of the price and well above in customer service to the Waldorf. Check in was super quick and easy. The elevators were so quick with a high-tech new system. The employees went above and beyond. We were thanked numerous times for being Diamond members. Our room was upgraded and we had an amazing view. The shower was huge! There was also a cappuccino machine in the room. I highly recommend this hotel. It was superb in every way.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great place to stay!
text: Stay here not the Waldorf so much more professional and helpful staff.  Hotel is a much better value and what an amazing stay.  Love the breakfest at the in hotel restaurant.  This is the best ever in city hotel I have had the privilege of staying at.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse chicago
text: This  is an amazing boutique style hotel in the heart of downtown Chicago. I highly recommend this to everyone and I will be returning for business and pleasure. Every detail of this hotel was met with high-end luxury from the shampoos and lotions to the frette bedsheets and down pillows and comforters.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Suzanne is simply AMAZING
text: I never write reviews but the level of service I received at this hotel was spectacular! All the employees were friendly and always asking to assist.Suzanne Saylor -Assistant Front Office Manger is a true value to this hotel. When I checked in she took care of me from the beginning to the end of my stay. She not only ensured I had a nice room, she sent me this fabulous bottle of wine which happens to be my favorite. She is very detail oriented and you are lucky to have her managing your front office. I appreciate the service your hotel provides to their gold members THANKS AGAIN SUZANNE!Best,Fayth

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Welcoming Hospitality
text: The London House is in a fantastic downtown location on the river. We arrived around 11am and there was no problem checking in as our room was ready. The bellmen are very friendly and helpful as were all the staff we interacted with. Our room had a very smart layout and was not the usual one rectangle room. Bathroom was a good size with a grab bar in the shower. There were posh bathrobes from Frette, along with a mini fridge and Nescafe machine. No minibar which was just fine by me. Hallways were quiet. We plan to return. Also, no visit is complete without a visit to the outdoor rooftop open all year round.In nice weather it functions as a bar, at other times it's a place you can go for an urban picnic or photo opps. DON'T MISS IT.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Thanksgiving in Chicago
text: I have traveled through Chicago on many occasions for work but have never had the opportunity to really spend sometime looking around this great city. My Girlfriend and I spent weeks looking at various hotels in the area that we wanted to stay and after slowly dwindling the number of hotels down we found ourselves left with just two. I'm originally from England so "London House" in pure name won the battle.First the facts! It's location is quite simply perfect. You are 10 - 15 minutes walk from so many amazing things to see and do and even after that you are a short 10 cab ride from everything else you could possibly want to see or do. The hotel as a whole is very clean and presentable. The door staff as you arrive set the stage for the pleasant experience that you are going to have throughout your stay. We arrived at 9pm at night and found a friendly and efficient front desk person who offered us a discounted upgrade which sadly we were unable to take advantage of. However the process of checking in was very quick and smooth. Gotta love that smile!Upon getting into the room I noticed that we didn't have a safe in the room. As I travel with a lot of camera equipment a safe is a priority for me. After a phone call down to the front desk a friendly gentlemen arrived at our door less than twenty minutes later with a safe in tow. Just a couple of minutes later he was leaving the room with a friendly smile job done.One of the highlights of the stay for us was "Mark" the bellman. Mark was always a friendly guy to chat with while waiting for a cab or my girlfriend to come downstairs. He offered some great advise on places to eat and even on our last day helped us arrange for a car to the airport. He and all the bell staff were quite simply on point. I travel a fair amount for work and I've seen some of the best hotels at their worst moments but I can't honestly say I didn't have a single bad thing happen throughout my stay here. I can not recommend this hotel experience more to anyone coming to Chicago. Chicago is the cupcake but London House makes for the perfect icing on the package.P.S. Do not forget to check out the roof top patio for some awesome views and those ever important Instagram/Facebook picsP.P.S We are hoping to return to Chicago in February 2019 for another week and if we do, and can afford it, we will definitely be staying back at this wonderful hotel.Gary

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Review
text: Abel Rodriguez was a lot of help and was very greeting! Love the Room selected for my stay! The city view was gorgeous and the room was very accominated to our needs! Valet parking was very help for my stay as well!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location and hotel
text: Lovely Hotel in an old building, very design decoration, great location between the two part of the city! Stunning Rooftop with an amazing view ! Room confortable, bathroom confortable as well N√©gatif points: the light is not enough in the room, we don‚Äôt really see well at nighttime... and in December it‚Äôs dark quickly ! And the elevators are very slow...

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful Staff, Atmosphere, and Location
text: A couple of friends and I have a yearly overnight in December in Chicago.  The London House is in a great location.
