We arrived for dinner and Eric escorted us immediately to the table where Manny and Cruz made dinner so enjoyable.  As a Hilton Diamond guy, I have made the London House my "favorite" when in Chicago

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect location
text: Couldn‚Äôt have been in a more perfect spot.  5-15 minute walk to everywhere my family wanted to go.  And even was easy to get to the subway, for a short ride to Wrigley Field to catch a Cubs game.  Wonderful stay.  But just a tip if you‚Äôre there on the 4th of July like we were.  Don‚Äôt go to the navy pier for the fire works.  Way to may people.  Follow the river walk to the lake and you can get a great view there.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel
text: London House is in a beautiful old building and a great location in downtown Chicago. The rooftop patio was the best view of the river and a great place to stop for pre/after-dinner drinks. Our room was perfect.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Getaway greatness!
text: So I am sure most people will agree and praise the incredible views (say yes to the room upgrade for views of the river!), the rooftop bar, the lobby sofa greatness, the location, all which would be very very true!  But I have to also give props to the amazing bell staff.  Each time we needed something, Mark, Corey, and Fikret went above and beyond customer service to downright hospitality at its best. They were each so good at what they do and it felt like it was more than a job but a natural ability to make people feel welcome and comfortable and helped in any situation.  So yes!  Go for the historic building, amazing location and incredible views, but someone has to give those boys some props from these satisfied customers who easily recommend this property.   Pic #1 our room view in the a.m., pic #2-5 rooftop wows.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel in a great location
text: The rooms were roomy, clean and have great views of the river. We were able to walk to almost all of our destinations. The porters were very attentive. The views from the rooftop bar & restaurant were terrific. Unfortunately the staff at the rooftop restaurant were not very attentive and each time we asked for something, we were told that they didn't have it up there, it was downstairs. It was rather disappointing.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect location, great view; Google Maps needs to figure out where this place is
text: Had a nice 2-day stay at LondonHouse. It's hard to find a better location in Chicago (Michigan Ave and Wacker Dr.). Unfortunately the maps programs send you to Lower Wacker Dr. and for a non-native, that was a distinct displeasure trying to navigate my way out of that. When I finally made it there, it was a little challenging finding a place to park for valet since the hotel directly next door will have nothing to do with you parking in front of their place. I did not use in-out privileges while there.I'm a Hilton Diamond member and the breakfast comp is only worth $5 at the attached, but unaffiliated, restaurant. As for the room, I had a great view of the river, which was awesome. The staff were friendly and the room was always clean. The room itself wasn't cheap, but there shouldn't be any expectation of that at this property, at this perfect address.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Cool Hotel.  Great Staff.
text: Stayed at this hotel after reading the reviews.  Its got great views of the river.  Our room was clean and spacious.  The staff was responsive and friendly.  I'd recommend the hotel to anyone looking for a place in central Chicago that's near serveral restruants and river walk.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fine for Business Trip
text: LondonHouse is a fine hotel for a business trip. Location is great, lobby is nice, and rooms are modern, clean, and spacious. No real need for much customer service, but staff seemed friendly enough. Many restaurants within easy walking distance.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: they ruined my niece's wedding night
text: My niece and her husband showed up to London House on their wedding night, only to learn that the hotel had overbooked and gave their room away to someone else. ON THEIR WEDDING NIGHT. They're at their reception so of course the last thing they are thinking about is calling to say they would be late. The desk worker was completely unsympathetic, even though they were standing in front of him in a tux and wedding dress, past midnight and exhausted. He refused to give them a refund. Instead he sent them to a less nice hotel and gave them $15 for a taxi, which was not even enough to cover the fare.I called the hotel today to complain. I give 3-4 stars to one of their staff who said she would send them a voucher for a free night's stay at a Hilton hotel. That is the least they can do for ruining their wedding night. I would give her 5 stars if she had gone above and beyond. I asked her for 2 nights but she said they couldn't b/c they had already covered Saturday night (at the less nice hotel...). She said that it wasn't marked in their reservation as their wedding night. But regardless! You are in the HOSPITALITY business. You can at least show some sympathy and human kindness to a young couple in the moment on their wedding night, even if you can't do anything in that moment. And that desk worker could have done something.  If I was able to get a voucher for them just by calling to complain, that desk worker could have gotten something for them. He could have said, "I'm really sorry this happened. We know it's not as nice as London House but we'll cover your hotel and cab fare tonight and give you a free voucher for another night." It would have taken so little. London House turned what had been a joyful day and gave it a sour ending. They aren't the kind of people to complain on TripAdvisor, but I am so angry I'm doing it for them!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful stay
text: My husband and I always wanted to make a trip to Chicago and I am so happy we decided to stay at LondonHouse. It was extremely convient and in walking distance to all main attractions in Chicago. Once we arrived at the hotel it was fairly late due to our flight being delayed but Abel at the front desk was extremely helpful, kind and friendly. He found out we were celebrating my birthday and gave us complimentary drinks and an appitzer at the bar. We would defiantly return back to this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Vana
text: Vana was an amazing waitress. She put the guest before herself. She made our day with her dedication to hospitality! Thanks Vana. Also the views at Londonhouse are insane around happy hour. We will be back and we will recommend this to all of our friends!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Overnight Stay
text: I had a overnight stay at the London House and there was a bug in my breakfast. So Disgusting ! I called front desk repeatedly no answer, nor was I accommodated for my breakfast. I was not even given a refund. Awful hotel

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse
text: Beautiful property, friendly staff, clean rooms and an amazing river view. We were offered an upgrade for a very reasonable price, allowed to checking early without even requesting it. Some friends checked in later and we had a great time at the rooftop bar. Will definitely come back to Chicago and most definitely will stay at the LondonHouse.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great views, amazing rooftop bar, luxe rooms
text: LondonHouse has quickly become my default hotel choice in chicago. Hyper convenient, chic rooms, excellent rooftop bar, and the staff is world class. The rates are quite reasonable and I believe it's the best value you can find in the Loop.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Conference
text: The London House - Chicago is a beautiful hotel. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I had a great view of river. The only issue was that the free wireless network wasn‚Äôt always working, but hotel made accommodations with this.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Location excellent.
text: I stayed for a single night at LondonHouse.  It was a last minute booking and I received a king bed room on the fifth floor with a river overlook.  My room was clean and the check in process was efficient.  The view was excellent.  The location on Wacker is really perfect for shopping.  The quality of the sleep was ok.  The hallway noise will come through to the sleeping area and it something that one just can't be fixed.The rooftop bar is terrific.  Great views and viewing platforms.  It is clear that the hotel has made tech improvements to blend the historic charm of the building with the efficiencies of today.  The elevator is where you will first encounter this juxaposition of old and new.  It is completely electronic and not only did I but others have a difficult time on first use.  I can tell you that in talking with others, the elevators are the most challenging part of a stay at the LondonHouse.  I found that interesting.Tip of the hat to the staff for their curtesy and engaging personalities with guests.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Hard Selling Room Upgrades at Check In
text: I was looking for a nice hotel downtown for a late arrival and early departure.  I booked it thru hotel tonight and the rate reasonable.When I arrived I found the lobby on the second floor. It‚Äôs nicely appointed, like a large living room and not formulaic like so many hotels today. My check in agent was quick and polite.  He asked to upgrade me to a higher floor with river view for an additional $100. I replied all I needed was a quiet room so the floor and view would not matter.I do not like it when they try to up sell me at check in. Bad behavior in my opinion.Then he asked if I had been to the hotel before and when I replied no he said he was going to upgrade me to a higher floor and a room with the river view at no charge.  Exactly what he wanted to charge me $100 for a minute prior.If they think this is a good way to treat customers, they are wrong.  I think appears it‚Äôs the only room left and he tried to charge me more for my assigned room. The hotel is pleasant, the room contemporary, fresh, and nicely appointed.  This is an upscale, four star hotel. I did not use the restaurant. I recommend the hotel.  It‚Äôs a nice hotel that is comfortable. I did not like the up-sell but I would stay again if the price competitive.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: THE NASTIEST HOTEL EVER !
text: This is the nastiest hotel ever! This hotel does not change the duvets unless a stain is visible. Maybe if your ladies on floor 13 stop talking so loudly in the hallways everyone wouldn't know we are sleeping on dirty/ recycled duvets.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Service for a Conference at LondonHouse
text: This is the third time I have thrown a corporate conference at LondonHouse Chicago and each time the service continues to get better and better.  From beginning to end, the assistance is always spectacular.  Our Conference Planning Manager, Lydia is excellent and so helpful and our banquet staff including our Banquet Captain, Robert and his staff Justin, Edgar, and Gonzo were incredibly accommodating, quick on their feet, and very friendly.  They even recognized me from previous events and remembered specifics of events that my boss preferred.  On top of that, the entire staff of the hotel is friendly and helpful, the rooms are sleek and clean, and the rooftop bar is a must-see.If you are throwing an event or conference in Chicago, I would easily and highly recommend LondonHouse.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location at Chicago River; room ok; food ok
text: The people throughout the hotel were all very nice and helpful.  What made my rating AVG was the amenities and access.  We tried to get a room with 2 queen beds but the entire downtown was packed with conventions and so all we could get was a king suite with a sofabed which seemed an acceptable second option.  Not even close.  The sofabed was not suitable for anyone to sleep on.  That made everything pretty difficult.On our night of arrival, we decided to order room service.... the menu said ‚Äúall-day dining‚Äù and so we called with our order.  The voicemail said the room-service had just closed at 10pm.  That would have been good to know.... no where was that made clear.  Trying to get anything g to eat after an evening flight...pretty difficult.I would say the room was pretty ordinary regarding furnishings, bathroom, towels, etc.  The pillows were great and the view was wonderful, overlooking the river.I don‚Äôt think we will be returning.  I just don‚Äôt think it was the quality for the price.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location
text: The hotel is really nice and the location is amazing. Steps from all the major attractions in Chicago. The reason I am giving 4 stars is that I had to change rooms 3 times following my check-in. First room I got was facing a brick wall. Literally NO VIEW. It was about 1 meter from my window. I go to the front desk to ask for something a little more decent. I got to the second rooms and the curtains were broken and one was on the floor (i'm wondering how the cleaning lady didn't notice that?). Third time's a charm, I ended up getting a room on a lower floor but at least I wasn't facing a brick wall! I usually don't complain since I don't spend a lot of time in my room but having some sun is important for me. (avoid room 1632 or 1642!)Other than that, the hotel is great. I ate at the bistro close to the lobby with an amazing view on the river and went upstairs at the bar for drinks after a basketball game. I can't even imagine how nice the rooftop must be in the summer! Definitely a place to try during my next stay in Chicago. I would stay there again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Location, location, location
text: First time in Chicago, stayed over a week.  Highly recommend and would definitely be coming back for my return visit to Chicago. Friendly, helpful hotel staff, good amenities, amazing river views and unbeatable location:(1) 30 minutes from O‚ÄôHare airport;(2) great place as a base for sightseeing - Big Bus tour and the CAF architecture First Lady boat tour by its doorstep ( literally);(3) walking distance to Millennium Park (bean structure) and the Magnificent Mile. (4) close to restaurants ( eg Giordano‚Äôs deep pan pizza) and convenience stores , Walgreen etc;(5) by the Chicago Riverwalk and North Lake Shore which is great for morning runs and enjoying the city‚Äôs twilight in the evening; and (6) Rooftop bar with band and amazing views of the city.What is not to love ?

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Yessica A. Thanks for helped me get my high floor room !!!Staff is friendly and efficient
text: I had a wonderful experience at London House, rooms are clean , city view is just amazing!! Rooftop bar and drinks !!!  Staff is awesome and friendly Thanks to the Yessica A. for helped me to get my high floor room !!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing hotel!!! Highly recommend it!!  Quick two day stay in Chicago after touring Notre Dame in South Bend, IN
text: Amazing hotel stay!!!  You cannot find friendlier staff anywhere.  From the valets, to the front desk, to housekeeping, they were all great.  Valet is $72.00 per night.  View, PRICELESS!!  Make sure to get a River View.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome city views
text: The rooftop city views are FABULOUS. It's a must visit when in Chicago. The food is ok. The service subpar. All waiters, waitresses and employees are rude and act like you are bothering them when you ask them something. The rooftop tables are extremely hot, if the sun is shinning on them. Your drinks, including iced water, will get hot in 2 minutes if you are out there in the summer.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location, Great Service
text: I chose this hotel for the location (near all my business appointments).  It turns out to be well located in general.  There were plenty of eatery options nearby (from chain to local, from fast food to fine dining).  My room had a great view of the city and river.  Most important, the rooms and service were outstanding (upscale, modern, and comfortable without compromise)..

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Nice 'Boutique'
text: Definately didn't feel like I was in a standard Hilton. Little upgrades like a cappuccino machine made the difference. My room was very quiet but others with me had lots of street noise, so request a room away from the street. Great wifi.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Good location and nice views
text: Booked four night stay with points and was upgraded to vista suite with reasonable additional cost of 50$/night as Diamond member. View from our suite couldn‚Äôt have been better for this location besides big Trump sign. All worked well and staff at Land & Lake Kitchen was nice and friendly.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Hotel!
text: London House is absolutely BEAUTIFUL and not to mention it's in a great location! It is walking distance to restaurants, bars and shopping. The staff was friendly and helpful (bellman especially). The rooftop bar has breathtaking views, however is very crowded. The lobby bar is a great place to relax. The bartender, Michele was friendly and made a great mango cocktail. We had several of these throughout our weekend! We visit Chicago often and plan to come back to London House!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel, beware of the rooftop bar
text: I wish I could give the hotel 5 stars, because the hotel service and staff are great! Our room was wonderful and the desk staff and GM were great to us. And the location is perfect. Unfortunately, the rooftop bar put a damper on the weekend. We had a reservation at the rooftop bar for 6pm on a Friday night, and were greeted at the hostess stand like we stole something. They didn‚Äôt have the reservation and treated us like we were 19 trying to sneak into a 21 bar. Once I got the manager to help us, we were seated. Then no one came to serve our table until I got up and asked them to come over. Once we had a server, they were great to us.The next morning it happened again. We went to the rooftop for brunch, and again waited for service. When they finally came, service was good.Major issue though...THEY DONT SERVE COFFEE AT BRUNCH. Unbelievable.Food was fine, but by then they had lost us.Their issue seems to be that they believe because they have a rooftop bar downtown, that supersedes service. It doesn‚Äôt. There are lots of rooftop bars in Chicago.So we can‚Äôt recommend this one.Our recommendation is go to the hotel, enjoy the location, but eat and drink elsewhere.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Loved this place.
text: I  have never stayed here before and usually like to stay a bit further down on Michigan, but I am so happy we tried London House. Our room was great and we paid for the "view" side which was amazing. I did eat breakfast there and that was very good. Overall just very helpful staff - great location, many things to just walk to - and seemed to be very clean and up to date. I would highly recommend this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Would definitely visit again!
text: I was actually staying at another hotel down the street for a work conference. My husband was joining me for the weekend after my work was done and originally we were just going to stay at the other hotel....wellllll, after a couple nights, I decided that wasn't a choice. I talked to a colleague that was familiar with Chicago and he recommended LondonHouse. I booked last minute and the price was right, so checked in fingers crossed. I walked in and immediately walked up to the second floor lobby and felt just like home. The staff was helpful, quick. I upgraded to a river view room. The room was great sized and the bed super comfy. Felt everything was clean, modern, with Malin and Goetz products (MY FAV!) and a Nespresso. Only room for improvement would be to have a mini milk in the fridge for the Nespresso, but that's it. The rooftop bar was great... I suggest if you're 34+, that you go in the afternoon not in the evening, and not for the clubbing atmosphere at night. It was perfect for an Aperol Spritz - they even have parasols for when it gets super sunny. Couldn't recommend more, will be back!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel
text: I was in Chicago for business and booked at one of the historical hotels, which I was not impressed with. A representative from Hilton referred me to the London House and it was the best move I could have made! I had an issue with a few stains on the down comforter, but it was quickly addressed. This hotel is absolutely beautiful inside and out. It is conveniently located to the area where the boat tours (highly recommend) depart. It has breathtaking views from the rooftop bar. The staff is very accommodating and friendly.I would highly recommend this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A scenic location
text: This hotel was absolutely beautiful inside and out. At night you pull up to the whole city skyline being lit up by the city‚Äôs current choice of color. Immediately I was greeted by the valet and once I was assisted in getting my vehicle unloaded they gave me my stub and i had no worries the rest of my stay. If I needed my vehicle it was only a ten minute wait which was perfect once I got down to ground level. Somewhere between the valet parking and sitting out front it managed to get struck by something on my rear bumper but that‚Äôs not too bad for Chicago. The room had the most comfortable beds and the bathroom was extremely open and bright. In the morning breakfast was served and I ate while I took in the view of the Chicago river flowing into the lake. For a hotel in the middle of downtown that has to be the best view I‚Äôve ever had. There is also a bar upstairs on the 21st and that also caters to your every need. If you‚Äôre in the hotel that is a must go for top notch service and beverages.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful Hotel
text: I have been to many hotels throughout my years and I would put the London House right at the top in regards to amenities and service. The hotel staff were very friendly and professional throughout the hotel. The dinner on the 21st floor and drinks on the rooftop were top notch. The room is updated and very comfortable. I look forward to my next stay at this wonderful hotel!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House
text: After visiting the rooftop bar on past trips, I finally had the opportunity to stay at the LH & I was not disappointed.  Quietly attentive staff, beautiful interiors, great location & the best views around.   Don't miss the rooftop deck!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Classy, clean and refined!
text: My stays at Londonhouse have always exceeded my expectation. As a frequent business traveler, I am always looking for comfortable, clean and modern updated rooms. Londonhouse fits this perfectly - rooms are always clean including the bathroom stall. They take care in every detail in the quality of bathroom soaps etc - it makes frequent business travel more relaxing knowing I have such an awesome place to retire for the evening. The front desk is always helpful and friendly! This hotel is a quintessential example of class and customer service!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Stay!
text: We just spent three nights at LondonHouse Chicago. The hotel is beautiful! Great location. Our suite had a wonderful view of the Chicago River. The suite and hotel were very clean. The staff is very accommodating and attentive, especially the bellman, Mark Z. We will be back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lovely
text: Very charming hotel and comfortable rooms. Of course, all the rooms look into the Trump Hotel parking garage, but the view of the river is fantastic. The staff is super friendly and helpful even though it was extremely busy the week I stayed.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: GREAT overall but bathroom door situation may not suit everyone
text: This is a really cool hotel in an excellent location, close to everything! The only and I mean the ONLY complaint we had was that there is no lock on the bathroom door. They are a brushed glass type sliding doors with about a 3/4-1 inch gap between the wall and the door when closed on either side. You can easily hear everything inside the bathroom from the rest of the room and could see someone showering if you really tried. It was just kind of odd to us. Now, depending on who you are traveling with this may not matter at all, just wish we had known sooner because it made some in our party uncomfortable. We asked for a different room but this is a design standard and they have no other room types available.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Couldn‚Äôt Enjoy the Rooftop Lounge
text: Selected this hotel primarily becuase of the draw of a rooftop terrace lounge. HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT. So crowded and loud. Lousy service and medicore food. The servers can‚Äôt handle the sheer numbers of people. Made a reservation a week in advance assuming that would get me a prime spot. Wrong. Stuck at a table in the back and the only view was of bodies packed together. We gave up and left.Front desk personnel at check-in were aloof.Hated the elevators. Who decided to reinvent the wheel? Everyone was confused.On the plus side, the bell and housekeeping staff were stellar, the property is lovely, bed was comfortable, bath spacious, the view from our room was spectacular, and we got everywhere on foot or took nearby transit. Anytime we called guest services with a question we received a quick and very pleasant response.Unfortunately, the rooftop terrace is what sets LHC apart and we were unable to enjoy it. Since there are so many other nice hotels in that area, we probably won‚Äôt go back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very helpful!
text: I love the staff at London House!  My son and I was going to a Chicago Cubs game.  My son got info from a friend on where to stay and how to get there.  I did understand everything from the friend.  So I called LH and the staff was very helpful telling me about the South Shore train.  Then when we got to Chicago I called again and got directions to LH.  The day of the game they told us the best route to the game and back.  I feel they went out of their way to make this a very memorable weekend for my son and I.  Our room was very clean we could see the canal and Trup Tower from our room.  I would definitely stay at the LH again and I will recommend to famil and friends!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great weekend getaway!
text: The location and accommodations are first class. Spectacular views of the city, especially from atop the rooftop lounge on the 22nd floor. Shout out to Anthony at the concierge desk for taking special care of us assisting with some amazing arrangements. Many thanks!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Night in the city
text: Great hotel! Very friendly staff so helpful, and  perfect location! We were able to walk everywhere. Awesome roof top bar nice vibe over looking the river! Great food in the restaurant, Land and Lake! Our room was immaculate and clean and came with river view! Not overly priced either, very affordable rates. Definitely would stay here again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: London House Private Dining in The Cupola with Executive Chef Jacob
text: The Cupola is a hidden gem at London House.  We recently hosted a family and friends dinner in the Cupola.  The Chicago skyline views are one of a kind from the Cupola.  We were treated to a custom menu with wine pairings by Executive Chef Jacob and Pastry Chef Matt.  We started with a champagne pairing with appetizers that made us anxious for the next course.  Having Chef Jacob grill scallops and even A5 adjacent to the Cupola's largest round table you've ever seen during the main courses was something special.  It was like being right in his own kitchen.  Thank you Chef Jacob.  Pastry Chef Matt blew us away with his grilled cornbread in a tres leches. You've never tasted anything like it.  Our hostess Nikki and Dina were professional and personable.  When the Chicago wind cooled off the evening heat Nikki and Dina both provided London House blankets for the women to wear to keep the chill away.  Talk about service!  I would suggest making London House's rooftop and The Cupola a must.  Call London House and ask for Lydia and she can help plan your event.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing customer service
text: The London House does an amazing job of ensuring that you enjoy your stay.  The bellhop employees were amazing and were who made my stay memorable.  They were extremely personable.  They always greeted me by name when I when I was in the lobby and they made amazing dining recommendations.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Just lovely and great staff
text: The hotel is lovely and the location is perfect for miracle mile, the loop and the lake.     I was able to walk 5 minutes from CTA Washington stop from O'Hare airport which beats being stuck in traffic   There are tons of nightlife options right outside the door as you are in center of town.  Staff are lovely and welcoming and bathroom amenities are top notch.  You can see that the design is very new and modern.   I recomend this hotel highly.  Reception is on level 2 where there is a bfast place and a bar.  There is a very popular roof bar that folks were lined up to enter.   Elevator system is high tech ask if you need help

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: A massive let down...
text: Hugely disappointed in this hotel. We were so looking forward to staying here on our second trip to Chicago. We stayed here for 6 days. The check in and check out experience were both absolutely terrible... have had so much better in budget hotels. None of the front of house team made an attempt to engage with us, to ask if we'd been to Chicago, to enjoy our stay, to even tell us what the room number was or how to get on the wifi.. we were simply handed a room key and not even looked at. Very similar experience on check out too... no attempt to engage in anyway. The only members of staff who smiled or made any attempt to engage were the luggage guys who were lovely. The rooftop bar and restaurant was always so busy we were never able to get a seat or get served .. one of the reasons we booked this hotel. The service up there was equally obnoxious. We paid a lot of money to stay here.. but even we had paid a little.. I'd still be incredibly disappointed and let down Don't let the pull of a rooftop bar make you book this hotel. It's got a beautiful lobby and some nice decor but that's about where it ends. Such a shame.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect Location & nearly perfect Hotel
text: Wonderful Hotel in a great location in Chicago. Walking distance to everything we wanted to see and do. Public areas were beautiful and staff were attentive. Our suite was huge and had everything you could ask for in a luxury Hotel. The only thing that soiltt it for us was part of the attraction for booking our stay here was the rooftop bar which was closed for a private party on our first evening. I always think this is unfair on paying guests, All in all though I would highly recommend to anyone and stay again without another thought.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wow on top of Wow. On the River
text: Another stop on our 35th wedding anniversary trip to Chicago and I must say this hotel is another top spot on the list of our favorites.  From the greeting by the bellman at the door ( I cannot recall his name sorry) to Shannon the Concierge this is a great place and wonderful addition to the Curio collection.  We had another great view of the city and the river and loved the bar located on the rooftop.  Our room was great with a really neat tv/mirror panel that rotated depending on what and where you wanted to be to watch tv, not that we did, as there is too much to do along the River walk area.  Only thing I did not like was the amenities are foreign made, whereas the other hotels we stayed the amenities were made in USA. The bathroom though, was very cool with a very nice modern shower.  Loved the place! and the location?? Right on the river walk and near State street and Michigan avenue.  Wish we can come back for another visit soon!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Value
text: Located at the heart of Chicago, few steps from Michigan Avenue. The hotel is modern, with has a very nice atmosphere. The rooms are of a very good size, clean, and if you get one that faces the river, the views are spectacular.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great place
text: We were greeted as soon as we walked in the door. The room was more modern than we expected. Very clean and well maintained. Alonso gave us some great recommendations on things to do and see. Room had robes and slippers for your stay, very surprised! Didn't have a chance to visit the rooftop lounge just not enough time. Would definitely recommend staying here. It's right in the middle of everything.This is the view from our room.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel - Great staff
text: I recently stayed at the London House where I had a surprise engagement. Lucy Sharkey(corporate Manager) could not have been better helping setup little surprises and make sure our evening was perfect. If you are in a similar situation, make sure you speak to Steven(Director of Wedding Events) he is spectacular and not pushy at all. We did a lot of this while hanging out by the 2nd-floor bar where Kurt (with a K :) ) could not have been more fun. overall, this could have been a very busy stressful day for me but everything was made so easy and enjoyable by the great staff at the London House - The hotel is amazing and beautiful in every way as well

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great service at the front desk
text: Beautiful hotel with a great view of the city!! Staff at the front desk was amazing! Trevor helped me check in, he was was very friendly, professional, and helpful!! I definitely recommend staying at this hotel for a short or long trip! also make sure to check out the fab rooftop.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wedding Reception and Guest Hotel.... AMAZING!
text: We chose LondonHouse Chicago because of its central location, beautiful views and the professionalism of their Director of Weddings, Steve.   We wanted our out of town guests to have a total Chicago experience and we found it at LH.  We have received an overwhelming number of compliments from our guests on the food, service, venue and attention to detail.  The entire staff at LondonHouse Chicago was without a doubt top notch.  Steve from Day 1 of planning through our wedding day was extremely helpful.  Every email answered, questions addressed, schedules laid out and he made the whole wedding day 100% worry free.  Thank you, Steve and LondonHouse Chicago, for making our wedding day PERFECT!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: First Time Chicago
text: This was my (and my husband's) first time in Chicago, and we were lucky enough to stay at LondonHouse. We were there for a Mother's Day weekend family reunion, and our location couldn't have been better...comfortable walking distance from everything that we wanted to see, and places that we needed to be. For the few times that we needed transportation, the bell crew were impeccable. Friendly, helpful, courteous, professional; they made us feel like family. Our front desk agent, Trevor, set the bar at check-in when he started by telling us "There is small problem, but I think you'll be very happy when I'm done"; our King room was unavailable, but was quickly replaced with a King Suite (at no additional cost!). Thank you, Trevor. The room was spectacular, despite the side street "building canyon" view (still interesting for Chicago first-timers!). The dining is top notch, with "Land and Lakes" dining room and bar offering outstanding breakfasts through late-night gourmet snacks & drinks. Again, the staff couldn't be more accommodating. This review wouldn't be complete without a special "hat tip" to Lucy Sharkey, who saw to every detail of our stay and was ever by our side to guide us through the hotel and ensure that we wanted for nothing. LondonHouse will be our base of operations whenever we visit.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Very noisy
text: The windows seem to be a hundred years old - you can hear everything single street noise. Impossible to sleep. Nice room but that‚Äôs a moot point if it‚Äôs impossible to sleep. Not worth the money, terrible inconvenience

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Highly Recommended
text: Great location and views, especially at their roof top bar and dining area.  The food is also excellent at the rooftop bar and dining area (not sure where the kitchen is located).  My room had great views of the river, very comfortable beds, very nice bathroom, and quiet rooms.  Its also across from the Architecture River Tour, which is a must do while in Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Chicago's best
text: Having been around Chicago downdown hotels, this is by far the most exciting location. The view is amazing surrounded by the best of Chicago. Rooms are well sized and well equiped for business traveller.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful night in the city!
text: We were in for a concert in the city and staying one night for our anniversary. Hotel staff were extremely welcoming and gave us a room with a lovely view of the city/river to add to our celebration!!! Enjoyed amazing rooftop bar with more spectacular views...although is does get pretty crowded at night. Room was super clean and nicely decorated. Also enjoyed a delicious breakfast at the Land & Lake.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: An Absolute Favorite!
text: We rented 2 rooms last weekend of April and now myself, my husband and our friends who joined us there are absolutely in love with the place. Interior decor is absolutely beautiful the rooftop bar features best Chicago views. A must visit.Every hotel employee we met was attentive, professional and courteous.Big thanks to the rooftop bar crew on Sunday for their patience with our group!We will definitely be booking a stay there on our next trip to Chicago

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing Chicago Hotel
text: Top notch hotel with a fantastic staff! Food here is top notch as well! No need to leave to eat at all! Views are stellar as well! Rooftop bar is great place to grab a drink. Staff is amazing and very attending to any need you would have as well! If we get back to Chicago, we‚Äôll stay here for sure as it is everything you‚Äôd need in the middle of the best part of town!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Poor Reception and it got worse
text: The hotel is training new employees, but has no one overseeing their training. I was given a room with broken blinds which kept the room in the dark the whole time I was there. Lighting was terrible in the room. Street noise woke me both mornings. ( I realize not controllable). A  disappointment as I always stay at Hilton Hotels and love them.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Hotel, Great Location
text: Stayed here over Memorial day week end.  Hotel is incredible.  Location is right in heart of Chicago.  Easy walk up Michigan Avenue.  Water taxi across river.  Elevated trains one block away.  Navy Pier 1 mile away.  Hotel is awesome.  Clean and Modern.  Fitness room very nice.  Rooftop Bar has awesome views but very pricy.  Had cocktails and was not impressed with them.  Should have had a beer.  Lobby is inviting and can enjoy view of river.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Change of heart
text: This is my second review, I deleted my first after speaking with the hotel manager Keith and also after having the GM reach out to me. The first one was not good and got 1 circle because of the interaction  I had with the assistant manager who was on duty during our check in Saturday. Although he used very poor judgement in how he dealt with the situation the front dest clerk Andrew did what he could as far as being pleasant and seeing how are stay was going. The manager Keith left his card under my door because of the "do not disturb" sign on my door, but was able to make contact with me today but I had already checked out. He listened and understood why I was upset, he did not attempt to downplay the situation nor make excuses for the assistant manager. He was very kind and I truly felt that he was sincere, he offered a couple of options to rectify the situation and made me feel as if he cared about my feelings. Whoever hired him did a wonderful job and I feel comfortable that once he speaks to his assistant manager he will handle future situations in a more professional manner.   One person does not represent a company as a whole but a negative interaction with one can lead to bad reviews that can affect potential customers from doing business with them. Now the hotel was beautiful and they cover little things that most don't in your room like a loofah sponge, toothbrush and toothpaste. The elevator system can confuse you at first but then it's  different and saves time even with 6. The bed and pillows are very comfortable and the view was nice. The staff was friendly but the valet parking when you arrive is a little confusing, just pull all the way up and you will be ok. The rooftop deck had nice views but I can't speak on food or drinks because I didn't eat or drink there because I was angry. There were several dishes on the menu that I wanted to try as well as the spa, but I didn't because of that first negative impression. Normally I never stay in the same hotel twice in Chicago because I want to experience each one, but after my conversation with Keith I will give them another try when I return. I truly appreciate the time Keith took to address the situation and wish there were more people like him in those kind of positions, because I believe very few hotels would get bad reviews if management knew how to not only talk to but listen to customers.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Convenience+Comfort+Luxury=LondonHouse
text: This is definitely a must-stay for travelers to Chicago.  The location was very convenient, the room comfortable yet luxurious.  All the staff were friendly and the service impeccable. Unfortunately, we were there only one night (catching the Empire Builder the next morning), but we were pleased nonetheless.  Next time we're in Chicago we will definitely stay at LondonHouse Chicago!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: One night getaway
text: Wonderful location on Wacker Drive across from the Riverwalk.While I was the only overnight guest, my granddaughter and her family took advantage of a place to cool off while exploring downtown and visiting one of the downtown beaches.Wonderful common spaces, The Roof Top patio bar looked very popular, always a smoothly flowing line to get in. Planning a longer stay in the future, because this is the perfect base for shopping and enjoying what the north loop and Michigan Avenue have to offer.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best Hotel Experience Ever!!
text: We arrived to stay for my 50th Birthday. The Staff was Amazing! The front desk staff was SO Welcoming! Caitlin was unbelievable! Caitlin was there for our every need, with amazing birthday surprises!! I can honestly say, this was one of the best hotel experiences in my life! They took my special day and made it 1,000 times better! We will defiantly visit again and again, and recommend to our friends and family! Beautiful rooms, super clean and stylish. The Rooftop restaurant  was wonderful as well! The staff took it to the next level!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Another wonderful visit
text: Second stay here, and this is now my go-to accommodations in Chicago. Clean rooms, lovely views of the river, friendly staff, and great location along the riverfront. Already looking forward to my next visit.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Best view and sevices
text: Oustanding rooms, excellent rooms and hotel staff. We had a great view og the lake and river. Beds were so comfortable, I havent slept that late in a long time, and didnt want to get of bed. So relaxing classy. Higjly reccommend this place for anyone coming downtown.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great rooftop bar
text: Awesome views.  Good food.  Great place to hang out and enjoy the downtown Chicago skyline.  Located along the river across from the Wrigley building.  Close to shopping so good place to camp out while others go shopping.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: C5 Graduation
text: Fantastic location-across the street from the Apple Store & all of the shopping on Michigan Ave. Not far from Millennium Park. Very centralized.  Roof top bar is s must-beautiful views. Got talked into the room upgrade & wasn‚Äôt disappointed. Huge room, comfortable beds, great view. Would definitely stay again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Memorial Day weekend
text: 4thumbs up. Oops I only have 2thumbs but üëçüèΩüëçüèΩüëçüèΩüëçüèΩ. Great location in chicago, a couple of blocks away from Navy Pier watched the awesome fireworks last night. Had a AWESOME time at this fab hotel. The frenc fries are OFF DA CHAIN upstairs at LH21 rooftop. The ROOFTOP is amazing. If you don‚Äôt have any fun sumthing is wrong wit you

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wow...a fantastic experience!
text: Thoroughly enjoyed my quick stay at LondonHouse. Hotel is very new (although located in a historic building on Upper Wacker) and has everything. The lobby on the 2nd floor is more like a lounge (see 2nd pic) that has wall-to-wall windows with an incredible view of Wacker and the Chicago River. The staff throughout was very professional and seemed genuinely ready to help.My room on the 17th floor was spacious and well appointed - bathroom was also large and the shower was perfect: excellent pressure, temperature and sq footage.Location couldn't be better - you're at Wacker and Michigan so close to everything. What's more is that the rooftop bar is very popular at all times and you get priority as a hotel guest. The views are amazing (see last pic) so definitely a strong selling point of the property.The restaurant is large and serves a nice breakfast - I enjoyed the egg white omelette with broccoli, avocado & goat cheese. Although I'm sure it's not always this cheap, the rate I paid for my room (under $200/night) made it an incredible value. I would not hesitate to stay here on my next return to Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Hotel wonderful, but Bar 21 staff needs training
text: Went to Bar 21 on May 25th. Sat down and was completely ignored for almost 30 minutes. Others came in and were served but not us. My husband even went up to the bar itself and was told bartender would send someone over, but she couldn‚Äôt take our order because she was helping others. BTW - they came in after us as well. Waited another 10-15 minutes and others around us were served and we were still ignored. Needless to say we left. So much for being Hilton Diamond Members.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The worst experience I have ever experience!
text: A new low in Hilton hospitality ... the key to my hotel room was issued twice, once to me upon check in and once to a stranger the 2nd day of my hotel stay. A strange man walked into my room @ 7:30PM, while I was getting ready for an event w/ business associates. The staff then changed my key, for obvious reasons, without notifying me. Obviously no recommendations for Hilton.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Love this place!
text: Got an oversized King room and it's FABULOUS! People are extremely friendly and they check in with you periodically to ensure the stay is going perfectly. Rooftop dining was picturesque! Love this place!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: top location
text: location is everything here, all the  city highlights are easy walkable. the boattour on the river starts opposite the hotel, the art institute is also not far and the shopping area as well. and there is a rooftop bar with great views of the city day and night.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel and friendly staff
text: Absolutely stunning view out of a great room that has all of the amenities you could need and probably a few extra. The staff was very attentive and pleasant. I would stay again if I am able to come back to Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful Hotel, Perfect Location, A Treat!
text: I was able to stay here on business last week. What a beautiful hotel, it was a real treat to stay here.  The beds were super comfortable, the view from my room was spectacular, and the hallways (and hotel in general) were exceptionally quiet, which I really enjoyed.  The meals I had were catered as part of the conference, but they were fantastic.  The in-room TVs are enabled with Chromecast so you can watch your own Netflix or other castable apps in your room.  Caitlin was really helpful to me when I checked out, and the rest of the staff were also wonderful.  I hope that if I come back to Chicago that I can stay here again!  I highly recommend it.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Wonderful Hotel, Wonderful Staff, What a Joy
text: At 72 years old I thought it would be wonderful to take a trip with my three daughters and we decided to go to Chicago.  After careful research on hotels I decided on the LondonHouse.  From the time we pulled up the staff began to treat us like we were special (we're not, we are just ordinary people).  Checking in was so easy and a big thank you to you Daniel for your help in checking out.  The rooms are very clean, very beautiful.  The beds were very comfortable, and three pillows too!  We stayed in 903 and 1103 and the view of the riverwalk was just beautiful.  Anyone who stays here will be very pleased with this hotel.  The location is great, the restaurant was really good too.  Try the oatmeal with pecans, yummy.  Thank you LondonHouse for giving us the wonderful memories.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect location
text: This is probably the best downtown hotel I‚Äôve stayed at in Chicago. The rooms were fantastic and so was our view. The bathroom  was outfitted with Kohler products; very relaxing shower. I didn‚Äôt even mind the barn door and I usually dislike them for bathroom doors.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Perfect location and awesome staff
text: This hotel was previously an office tower and was converted into an upscale very modern hotel. Loved the location next to the river and easy walking distance to all great downtown attractions. Chicago is a great city for walking in and this place makes the experience special. All the staff we encountered were very friendly and were sincerely interested in knowing where you were from and if they could make the visit better. Loved the modern rooms with huge flat screen TV, bathroom lights turn on and off as required - d√©cor is modern and fresh. Great views from the rooftop bar and lookout. I would definately stay here again. Good value for price and location.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Service was Excellent
text: Check in went smoothly. Front desk was able to change my room from City view to River View. Thank you... Lobby bar was efficient and courteous. Roof top bar was packed (The indoor lounge). The actual roof top was only open the second night once the rain stopped. They closed the rooftop around 10:00. Would have like to stay and enjoy my drink. Security asked that I move inside so they could lock up. I was able to get 1 picture (pano) so you can appreciate the view. Wish I could have stayed longer. Beautiful night. Valet Parking is on the extreme side. $72However, the prime location can not be beat. I will be back. Mainly due to the front desk/ lobby bar staff. All were very kind.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: I'd give it a 5 but dreadful room features knock it down.
text: London House is a perfect location, very fine service, food and amenities like rooftop bar. I loved everything about it except for the poorly designed room and bath. First, the bed's base extends beyond the mattress, and I have sore toes from all the stubs. The lighting is fine for Millennials who know how to fiddle with complicated operating pads. What happened to simple switches? One needs an operating manual to turn the lights on and off.  The fixtures in the bathroom are cheap. Nobs fall off in the shower, and the TP holder falls apart due to its open/close design. The sink stopper is difficult to reach and operate. Little stuff, I realize but it all can add up to comfort & functionality. The decor is modern for modern's sake - poorly coordinated, uninviting and lacking any real theme - just clunky looking.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Training meeting
text: This place has it all, style, location, views, great food, vibe, comfort....very classy and my favorite is the rooftop bar. What more could you ask for?This place earns my highest recommendation and I think I found a new place in Chicago

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: The BEST of Chicago
text: I only ever want to stay at LondonHouse in Chicago--this is my second stay, and it was even better than the first! AMAZING VIEW!!! I cannot say enough great things about how fast the check-in was, how nice all of the staff is, how totally lovely my room and all the amenities are. I don't normally enjoy hotels, and find that no matter how posh, the stay is often lackluster. If what you want is something stylish but not BUMPIN, this is THE hotel to book. LOVE how quiet my room and the hotel is over-all.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Mother's Day 2018, at London House
text: My family attended Mother's Day brunch at London House. It was fabulous! Walking into the ballroom was magical. Pristine linens, beautiful place settings and floral centerpieces on every table. The staff was professional, friendly and attentive. Edgar took such good care of us, anticipating our every need with a huge smile.  The food was exceptional. Such a variety and all done to perfection. We had vegetarians in our group and there was just so many options to choose from. It was an overall wonderful experience. Thank you!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel in the middle of everything
text: My wife and I just spent a long weekend at the Londonhouse and we both agree the place is amazing.  Check in was speedy and the front desk staff very polite.  The Lobby bar is a great place to have a drink and relax before you head out.  The rooftop bar would have been fun if the weather was better, but they still have an inside section that is plenty large enough.  We were upgraded to a corner room that was really great.  The only complaint is that there were 8 windows in our room and it was a bit noisy in the mornings.    If you are a Gold/Platinum member of Hilton Honors, you do get a breakfast voucher for the restaurant on the main level.  I read some reviews that were disappointed with this, but it was fine.  Coffee, fruit cup and a coffee cake is fine for us, and it was only $6 to upgrade to a salmon omelette.  We had a great time and for the price paid it is an amazing place to stay in the middle of downtown.  Would stay again!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing View
text: The hostel is clean and stylish and the staff is friendly. The best thing about this hotel is the view from the opposite side of the Trump Hotel. Breakfast was American Black Fast, and was a good choice. I was a little disappointed that I could not choose a variety of breakfast.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Amazing time in the center of the CHI
text: We had an amazing time, from the rooftop to the food.  It‚Äôs such a joy when you can arrive somewhere and feel welcomed and prepared for.  Even how fast was the check In makes a huge difference. Will be returning soon!!!!!!!!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Really great place to stay in Chicago
text: This is a lovely hotel right in the middle of anything and everything in downtown Chicago. The rooms are beautiful and the hotel is completely updated. The rooftop bar has a really fabulous view!!!! Great place for a drink. You can walk to just about anything. Would highly recommend it.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Practically Perfect
text: We‚Äôve stayed at a number of different hotels in Chicago but this is our new favourite. Our standard room was surprisingly large, spotlessly clean and exceptional value for the money. The bathroom was well appointed my only small complaint was it lacked counter and storage space. The hotels location is ideal, close to all the tourist spots and restaurants.Plan to spend time at the rooftop bar, the view is amazing! Unfortunately it gets very crowded so if you‚Äôd like one of the limited seats go early.We also had drinks in the lovely lobby bar. They had great happy hour food specials, the charcuterie board was as good as it gets and can‚Äôt be beat at half price.I can‚Äôt recommend this hotel highly enough. I can‚Äôt wait to return.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic property great stay
text: Had the pleasure of staying here 1 night on business.  No negatives at all.  Building is beautiful‚Äîroom was immaculate‚Äîgreat views‚Äîwill look to stay here again on future trips to Chicago.  Perfect location downtown

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Lovely weekend getaway
text: We stayed here while visiting Chicago for a wedding.  The hotel was beautiful throughout and the room was very tastefully appointed and comfortable.  The rooftop bar offered beautiful views, great music, comfortable seating, and plenty of space to spread out and relax.  Our room was right outside of the elevators, but we didn‚Äôt hear a peep from inside the room the entire time we were there.  And the bed was incredibly comfortable - woke up feeling rested and refreshed after an eventful day and a long night.  All of the staff we encountered were incredibly friendly, welcoming, and attentive.  It was such a pleasure to stay here and we can‚Äôt wait to come back up again this summer.  The park and stay package is a great deal for those driving.  Just one note to travellers GPSing the directions - call the hotel and ask.  It‚Äôs super easy to get to and super easy to get out of - GREAT location.  But our GPS (google maps and Apple maps) got confused and led us around underneath the city for a good 20 minutes before we found our way topside again.  Save yourselves the trouble, call the hotel for directions, and forget GPS this time.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Awesome View, great rooms, and restaurants!
text: Amazing view of the Chicago river and Lake Michigan!  The restaurants on site were awesome, and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  Walking distance to Millennium Park and numerous restaurants and shopping.  Would definitely stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: This hotel is fantastic!
text: Everything from the location and amenities to design and the helpful staff was TOP notch.  I didn‚Äôt want to leave.  Our suite was large and well appointed.  The view was amazing.  The Roof Top bar was just lovey. Perfect location. Near everything you want to see in Chicago! Don‚Äôt miss out, book your room here!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great stay
text: I enjoyed my stay here. The hotel is in an old building that they have renovated nicely. The room was very nice, good pillows, great location near Michigan ave. They have a rooftop bar that provides great scenery at sunset.  Bar was pricey, could have had a better selection of craft beers.  Restaurant downstairs is not owned by hotel. Out of the few items that I could get for free as diamond, they did not have them in stock, so I left with just a coffee.  But overall the was a great stay, staff very friendly and wanting to help.  Great location.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Another Great Stay
text: Ideal location for river and Michigan Avenue. Excellent service. Can't go wrong. Extremely quiet rooms. Fast and efficient elevators. Only possible feedback? Better deserts on the room service menu! But that's picky.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Counselors of real estate
text: Fantastic service, beautiful rooms. Bed so comfortable that i slept late a few days of my conference.  Only complaint is that the hotel food is very heavy on meat and carbs. Ground floor restaurant is leased so they cant charge to the room. But, they have a good happy hour.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great central base of operations for a long weekend in Chicago
text: Prior to a week of meetings in Chicago, my wife joined me for a long weekend of relaxation at the LondonHouse Hilton property on the river in Chicago. The folks at LondonHouse couldn‚Äôt have been nicer. We were in a Vista room, that had floor to ceiling windows and a lovely view of the river. The location was perfect for doing some things around town, as it was a short walk to things like Millenium Park, Navy Pier, and is right on the Riverwalk. There is a nice open air bar on the roof, that was just opened recently for the season. The view up there is spectacular. Of course, you‚Äôre paying extra for the drinks at LH21, but you are paying for the birds eye vista on the city.When there was a hiccup during our stay, (the battery in the door lock died and we couldn‚Äôt get back into the room), the folks at the front desk offered a credit for some drinks in the lobby bar while security fixed the lock. Tip: If you are a Hilton Honors Gold or Diamond member, you can pick a free breakfast or 1000 points. The breakfast is a little more spartan than usual, so you might be better taking the points. The breakfast is basically coffee and either granola, fruit, or oatmeal. You can get scrambled eggs and bacon, but they charge you extra for that option. I expected something like the breakfast buffet you get at a Doubletree or other Hilton properties. Nothing wrong with the food or service, the food in the restaurant is good, and between 4-7 there was a nice happy hour there. Just thought the continental breakfast wasn‚Äôt worth as much as the 1000 honors points would be.In the lobby bar, on Saturday night, there was a guitar player, Joey Edwin, laying down some really nice jazz. Great way to relax before going out to dinner.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: THERE IS A REASON THIS IS THE CHEAPEST HOTEL ON THE RIVER
text: Terrible service and on the less desirable side of the river.  There is a reason this is the cheapest hotel on the river.  The service was terrible and the rooms are really small.  You can find better options for the same price at Palmer House or Virgin.  There is absolutely no reason to stay here.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Location, Very Nice Rooms
text: First time stay at this hotel, picked it do to proximity of a conference and was very pleased with the rooms and limited interaction I had with the staff.  Some people had issues with the elevators, but they are truly very easy to understand.  Just pay attention to the car you are directed to when you enter your floor.  The top floor bar is a great place to unwind after a long day.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Hotel
text: I decided to stay here when the power in my apartment went out - so I splurged and  treated myself to a night in the city. I‚Äôve stayed in a lot of beautiful, well appointed hotels and LondonHouse is certainly another one. The building, reception, lobby bar, and room are beautiful. The room in particular is warm, comfortable, and upscale. The bathroom products are Malin + Goetz which I was very excited to see. My room was shower only, so if that‚Äôs important to you, you may want to make a special request. Subjectively, I will say that the reception staff is not what I expected. The woman that checked me in was cold. I booked through the Hilton app and wanted to use the digital key but without asking I was handed me a physical key. She was pleasant enough, but I felt like an inconvenience rather than a welcomed guest. This was definitely a transactional experience. The guy at check-out was much friendlier, but took a while to sort out that I wasn‚Äôt the guest he found in the computer when I gave my room number and name. I felt like I had to convince him he found the wrong guest. Eventually he said he found my reservation and that ‚Äúeverything is ok‚Äù but I walked away suspicious based on how he handled it. I received my folio and saw the stay post on the app so I guess it worked out. I hope the other guest doesn‚Äôt have as much trouble. I‚Äôll definitely stay here again if the price is right, but will know not to count on the staff for anything.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Loved this place
text: We had a delightful girl‚Äôs weekend here.  Room was beautiful.  View was amazing.  Very much liked the rooftop bar with the exception that it was a bit cold outside.  Hotel is very well located to restaurants and shopping. Staff was very helpful and courteous.   Will definitely return!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Beautiful hotel - highly recommend
text: Absolutely stunning hotel and great service. I had an issue with the blind and my room was changed the next morning and upgraded to a river view because of the inconvenience. I was at a workshop and the staff kindly moved my bags to my new room,all I had to do was pick up the new key! Really impressed by how quick and easy the issue was resolved. The rooms are beautiful, the views are fantastic and the location is spot on. I walked around the neighbourhood exploring late at night (single 27 female) and had no issues and felt safe! The gym is awesome too. Would highly recommend this hotel and thank the staff for their help!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great hotel.
text: We had a great stay at LondonHouse. The hotel is amazing, staff too.Beautiful views, if you don't mind the Trump monstrosity across the river.Location is good, close to the MagMile and lots of good restaurants.Parking was a bit pricey.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great Central Location
text: The views from our room (605) were spectacular. The hotel‚Äôs location couldn‚Äôt be better as it was a short walk from many of Chicago‚Äôs attractions. All the staff were efficient and friendly. Even though it was a bit chilly we enjoyed having a pre dinner drink on the terrrace bar. We had 5 nights there which we really enjoyed. We would have given it 5* but the breakfast wasn‚Äôt great. We found breakfast a couple of doors down though which was fine. The only other thing was that on a couple of occasions my wife and I  spotted ladies hanging around the lifts on the upper floors who clearly weren‚Äôt lift attendants and appeared to be wearing less than the minimum number of garments a respectable person might be wearing in April in Chicago. Policing this is a challenge for many city hotels I suspect. Anyway, we would definitely stay in this hotel again as the positives were overwhelmingly in it‚Äôs favour.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great spot
text: Hotel has a great location, wonderful staff, great roof top and provides an overall great staystaff is very helpful as to check in and check out and room are very comfortablehas a restaurant on the ground floor and I  ate "conference food" and it was fabulousgood place for meetings as well as individual stays

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: AWESOME STAFF! ABEL AT THE FRONT DESK IS A ROCKSTAR! ;)
text: My fiance and I stayed at the hotel this past weekend to celebrate our 8 year anniversary. From the time of check-in to check out, we had an amazing experience. All hotel staff were professional and attentive but I have to give a shout out to Abel because he went above and beyond during our check-in and offered my Fiance and I a glass of champagne to celebrate our anniversary. (very nice touch)I also have to mention the great location on the river, clean rooms, great gym, and beautiful rooftop bar. I highly recommend this hotel when you come to visit Chicago.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great fun modern hotel with awesome rooftop
text: Our favorite hotel in Chicago. Great location, modern amenities, friendly staff and service and wonderful rooms. My only gripe is I was offered a $15 upgrade for a ‚Äúview of the city and river‚Äù which I took since we were on vacation only to find outside window the view dominated by ‚ÄúT-R-U-M-P‚Äù of trump tower in our face. I guess that was the ‚Äúcity‚Äù part of the city view üòÇThe rooftop here was the deal maker though. Beautiful outdoor rooftop bar with great food and drinks with a spectacular view and feel. On the more expensive side which is the only reason we don‚Äôt stay here every time.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
text: I just spent 2 weeks at this hotel recently. Very satisfied with this hotel. Services were good and professional. Location is great to north or south Michigan Avenue. Plenty of restaurants around down town Chicago, and the famous Chicago architectural river cruise is just opposite the hotel.The only thing I reckon the hotel missed was there is no power point in the bathroom. So if you have a non battery shaver or need to use the hair dryer, you have to do it outside of the bathroom. Not a big issue, just annoying.Also, like most of the hotels in USA, power points are American type, so please make sure to have the international adapter ready.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Superb!
text: Curio London House Chicago is over the top! The staff was extremely accommodating and pleasant. Despite the size and the volume of guests, the atmosphere is calm and quiet. A perfect operation; centrally located with breathtaking views. Highly recommended.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Rooftop bar shady accounting
text: Had a couple bottles of Champaign.  Went to pay the bill and the waitress said "your card is not working".  Which is strange because my AMEX has no limit. So I gave a different credit card.  Signed my tab at the end of the night for around 1400.The next day, I noticed an 1881 charge...then two 394 dollar charges.  So I checked my other card (the one the waitress said wasn't working) and she ran about 2400 through on that card.  So for a 1400 dollar tab, they ran a little under 5,000 dollars totalSo I tried calling the club and left voicemails and nobody responded.  I called their bookkeeping office and left messages...no response.  So I started calling the GM Juan Leyva of the hotel, for three weeks.  No response.They left me no other option but to dispute the charges.  The bar there is fine, decent view outside.  But the customer service for what is supposed to be a high end bottle service club/hotel is a joke.  I will never return there.There are too many places in Chicago to have to tolerate nonsense like that.  I expect this from a low rent dive bar.  We won‚Äôt ever go back.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Our home away from home!
text: We love to visit the LondonHouse in Chicago! I am local, but my BF is not, so when he comes in we often stay there. I believe we have stayed about 10 times within the last couple of years. It has always been super nice. If we have had any minor issues, the staff have resolved. Also, we often get the corner room upgrade whenever possible since my BF is a diamond level with Hilton Honors.I would recommend the property to anyone visiting Chicago since it is a great location with great views of the city and river. Corner rooms get you a river and lake view!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Fantastic Boutique Hotel
text: This is a great hotel with very attentive staff. The hotel is beautiful and has amazing views of the river. From the minute we checked in everything was wonderful. The rooms are very nice however a double room has full size beds not queens so if three are in the room it is a little tight for sleeping. The bar area has a lively crowd and a DJ and the bartenders are very knowledgeable and fun especially Eddie ! My friend spoke to Juan the hotel manager before checking in and he was very attentive and followed up to make sure our stay was pleasant! He was fantastic!! We can not wait to return to this hotel it is our new favorite place .

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Excellent Hotel in a Great Location!
text: I was attending a conference and had registered late. Conference accommodations were booked out. I found this hotel and am glad I did. It is a Hilton Curio property and I have been very happy when staying at one of these properties. The staff were courteous and very helpful. The accommodations were excellent with large rooms. I was in room 921 which had an excellent view of the river and Wacker Dr. Another plus is that it is right next to Michigan Ave and the Magnificent Mile of shopping which my wife loved. Also easy walking distance to Navy Pier. I would highly recommend if you are staying in Chicago

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Stunning Views
text: This is a beautifully designed, clean and cozy hotel with incredible views (barring the hotel directly across the river, which isn't LondonHouse's fault).  I've stayed here twice now, and would absolutely recommend this hotel for work or for fun!  Exquisite but not pretentious.  Love.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: What a visit!
text: The hotel is upscale and modern. The staff was 5-star: from the bellmen to the front desk and restaurant. So much is within a few minute walk. I would definitely recommend this property. I look forward to returning in warmer weather when I can take advantage of the rooftop!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great place to stay, very helpful staff
text: Our stay here was fantastic! The rooms are so comfortable and the amenities are top notch. The beds are extrmely comfortable. The staff are extremely pleasant and helpful. We will definitively stay here again.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great location!
text: We had a wonderful time at this hotel.  The location was perfect and the employees were super friendly and helpful.  The fitness room was clean and had good cardio equipment and hand weights. I would recommend this hotel.

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Outstanding!
text: My boss and I spent nearly a week in Chicago at the LondonHouse on business and had an outstanding experience.  The rooms were very nice - everything we needed to be productive with work plus a beautiful view of the river.  The hotel is in a wonderful location and within walking distance to a wide variety of shopping, dining and entertainment.  The absolute highlight of the trip was our daily interactions with the bellhops or porters.  The gentlemen working the day shift are just phenomenal.  We became quick "friends" with Mark and Fikret and it was incredibly welcoming to connect with them as we would come and go.  They both went above and beyond to help us with recommendations around the city and even just to make us smile. My husband and I are planning a trip back to the city this summer and this will be the first place I go for reservations and look forward to reconnecting with "our guys" as we began calling them!

hotel: LondonHouse Chicago, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Great property - HORRENDOUS customer service!
text: The hotel benefits from an unbeatable location right on the river and within walking distance of all the downtown attractions. The heritage features of the building are a treat, the rooms are spacious and the views from the rooftop deck are stunning. The service from the front desk was appalling!!! The whole experience from check-in to check-out and post-stay was an absolute fiasco.Upon checking out of the hotel I was told by the front desk THAT I HADN‚ÄôT STAYED THERE - a remarkable statement to make to a customer who‚Äôs handing in their room key after three days in a hotel. I was told that there was no record of my reservation, my stay, my payment or the credit card I‚Äôd swiped on arrival.
